column3: 10 Minute - Write atleast a paragraph about people that you live with now or that you lived with in the past. This could be your family or roommates. What do they look like? column4: 30_minute - Identify one improvement that would make your city a better place to live for people your age and explain why people your age would benefit from this change. column3: I live in the Red Brick Mansion with five lovely roommats. They are all university students. Ellisa and Mandy study at UVU. They both both work in a waffle stores called 'Waffle love.' When the store need their employees, they will ask them to help cook waffles in wedding activity and family party. They both like to work out. As a result, they put the workout schedulde on the surface of the refrigurater. They invite the other roommates to come with them as well. However, the other roommates, Amilia, and I do not like exercise or outdoor activity. We only come when everyone is free the day as a roommates activity. Amilia is major in archit Amilia have similar interests with me in cooking, paiting, and watch movies. We spend a lot of time to hang out.
column4: A small improvement can bring huge effects on the new the generation.  People in my age usually get a lower salary comparing with people  in my age 15 years ago. Many of them rather to work abroad than stay in Taiwan to work as much but get paid less. Some employers would believe that people in my age are not resiponsible enough to give us better salary; however, it's not true just because we are younger and grew up with better financial environment. Reasons for us to get paid higher are that we are creative on project and we are willing to work hard if the company can treat us equally.       First,  our generation is called the Millianer. People are connected with the world in their early age since they have computer and internet. The various information online facilitates them to update themselves faster. People accumulate new ideas from internet to make a better one. As a result, employers should not define us as 'a group of strawbettey,' which means that we cannot afford any stress from outside world. We have different trait, but the employers can make a good use of it.        Second, If our government can leigulrate labor right more appropriately, it will motivate us to work even harder. People who work hard should get paid double when they work overtime. Comparing to people from last generation  that they are very diligent, but they get paid more. In contrast, people in my age work hard why we can be paid less.  Moreover, we are more likely to be willing to work for the company for a long turn.        To sum up, people are not only working for salary, but also we are pursuing a better life. We are not lazy. In contrast , we are very creative and willing challenge different ideas to make the world a better one.  Our government should take serious consideration to save this genernation from going abroad to seek better salary, but create a better friendly environment for us to stay.  If the improvement can happen somedays, the world will be a better one.

We have a lot of beaches very close to Elche (15 minutes driving) and visit them is the best thing you can do at summer.But all of this is only my opinion, you must move here to check that in person. I am sure that you will enjoy Elche.

column3: One of my companions on my mission is now one of my best friends. We worked hard together and we accomplished a lot of goals together.He is from California and he loves excersise. He is shy and quite but when he feels comfortable with the people around him he never stop to talk. He is tall and thin, the opposite of me but we are a great team. He is a funny guy and we had a lot of fun. Everyday I cooked the dinner and he always cooked 'quesadillas' (a mexican food) for the breakfast. Every preparation day, we played a tablegames. He wants to study psychology like me and he wants to study with me in the same college. He ends his mission this month, and probably we will meet again this year.
column4: 'Xalapa' ia a small city but it is beautiful. For young people it is a great place to live because there are many schools in different grades. The city is full with students, specially university students. The 'Universidad Veracruzana' is the most popular university there, because it is one of the best universities around the country. But the demand is excesive, so, there are many of other colleges and universities. The faculties buildings are extended in all the city. It is a great city not just for live and study but for being prepared in education and knowledge of the culture, arts and sports.The weather is nice, because in not extreme like other places. The temperature is usually around the 19 degrees Celsius. It is the best weather for avoid colds and cough however it is rainy everyday, but it is just because are some groves and forest in the city. Every park in the city have a grove.It is a very cultural city, so there are a lot of libraries, museums and other places to enjoy the mexican culture and other cultures because it is a multicultural city where lives people of differents nationalities too.Our government impulses the creation of gyms, parks and pools for the people can practice any sport.For distraction and relax on weekends, the students usually go to the cinema because is cheap or they go to the ballrooms. Parks in the nights have music for dance, and the young people gathering there for dance competitions. Or they just walk on the streets of the city and look the beauty moon; Xalapa is one of the cities where the moon looks so close to the earth, specially on October.There are many restaurants and those are open too late and close at the morning when the students are in the school.I leaved this city when I was 14 years old because my parents move but I returned when I was 17 but the city never change, just the students move and arrive new students. Sometimes I felt that the city is boring but when the people leaves the city like me, it is too easy to miss it and to want back.

column3: I heve been living with my own family for more than 8 years long. column4: Culiacan really needs a change to become a better place for young people. Nowadays, young people in my city are very loss. We have a lot of problems, like violencie, corruption, etc. They are many things that can be do to improve the quality of life for young people in Culiacan.    Increasing the number of recreational places in  Culiacan, might help to develop the mind of the young people in Culiacan. column4: I consider that Barranquilla needs more parks and along with it, campains to encourage young people to have more outside doors activities.With the impact that social media and technology have had in the life of young people in Barranquilla, the interest for activities like running, jogging, playing soccer, basketball, baseball or simply taking a walk, while eating an ice cream with friends, in a park have diminished and been almost completely forgoten.  The overuse of technology in this population has lead them to a sendentary life, full of leasure and a lack of interest for sports, which leads them to physichal and psychological issues.Probably one of the ways to address this problem in young people in barranquilla is building parks where they can go and have fun with friends and their own families. i consider that parks along campains to encourage them to participate in championships and some other outside activities will call their attention and improve the live they are living.

column4: My city has full of young generations. Almost 60% of citizens are young people. But the young people are not excited about their city. The reason is the air pollution. In the end of 1990, The prevalence of the air pollution did not exist. Because of the population of city was not reached today's record. Government of that time used to compell people to live in particular area. After 1990, Mongolian society and authority shifted to democracy. The weak government could not handle as much things and democracy was the thoroughly new idea to everyone. Only imagination that people have was the idea of 'doing whatever you want'. Also, economic of country was close to bankrupcy. To live and find better life, people were fleeing to capital city which was designed to specific number of people. There was deficiency of apartments. Thus, those people who came from rural areas could not find houses and the government had lack of abililty to solve it due to economic crises. So, people build thier own houses that heated by fire. From then on, it has become the root of air pollution. Now, 70% of apartments are heated by fire and our city is the one of the most polluted city in the world. People in my age are not pleased with that because it causes dozens of health problems. They are concerning about their children. In my opinion, the only solution could be our action, however, the government must handle it. If we use gas instead of coal air pollution will be dissapear soon. The morality is more important than any others. If people respect each other's right, not only air pollution could be solved, but every problem on earth would be gone. In conclusion, our generation people in my city are not excited, because of air pollution. We should not bank on the government, but we can make changes through good morality and usage of liqiud gas if we act together.

column4: My city SUZhou      Do you think our city need to improve? Do you feel our city need to more young people? For me, my city SuZHou is very developed. There are more than 10 million people live in my city. In my opinion, I think wage is one improvement that would make my city become a better place to live for people who have same age like me.     Why I talk about wage? Maybe cause by our population. I told you that how many people in my city. So we couldn't earn a lot of money when we graduate from college. In general, we can earn from 500 to 700 dollars for each month. Maybe you will say these moneys will be enough to live. I will say no. If you are native who have a house in SuZhou. You don't need to worry about the rent. We just need to worry about something that we need to use or eat. But if you are not native who have a house in SuZhou. You need to worry about your rent, food, clothes,etc. These moneys won't be enough. For example, you buy a cloth like Nike's coat. You need to pay from 100 to 200 dollars that you can buy one. This price is very excepensive, you couldn't do any thing about the price. If you want to buy, you need to save 2 or 3 month that you can buy one.    Now this problem become more and more important. Most of them couldn't earn more money in my city. So half of them will go back to their city to looking for a new job. But that couse the other problems. For example, a compeny who hiring a lot of people. They use a lot of time to training them. But when they finish training,  about half of them who ask resign and come back their city. It's waste company's time also waste these workers' time. For me, that isn't a good thing for everyone.     All in all, my city is very beautiful and busy. Now my city likes ShangHai and BeiJing become more and more developed. But the workers become a big problem now. So, in cerently year, my city's government give more and more advices about our wage to all the companies. They want to attract more and more young people come to my city to help us build our city. I hope my city can focus on our wage more and more, let us can live in my city.

column4: I think my city should improve their culture history. It's very important that people of my age should know were do they come from, who were their ancestors and what things had been sacrifice so we can live and have the things we have right know. At my country, people my age usually complains a lot of its country and many of them, or in this case, many of us don't know our country history in detail. Many of its national culture had been lost because in the city is trying to replace the modern with the antique, and it doesn't have to be like that. Modern and antique culture should be combined. Making this combination we would be able to adapt to new changes without loosing our culture and respect for our ancestors. I think more museums should be created, history should be strenghten in schools, love for their country and respect for it should be teach to the children by their parents.  There should be opportunities were young students can work for these museums and learn from them. Books about tales and stories from our ancestors should be accesible for the public. Contests of paintings, poems or stories from our past should be done, so people could get exciting of investigating and to know about our past in creative ways. In the supermarkets, the sales of other countries holidays should be less and sales from country holidays should increase. One example; instead of two corridors full of candy and masks for halloween (wich came frome Europe and the USA) ; they should have corridors full of flags, lanterns and typical customs for  the national independence holiday.  I think that if we improve in these aspects, people my age will start loving more their country. They would be proud of it but most important , they will fight to maintain these traditions and culture, because they have develop a deep love for it. Young people will start making the necessary changes and will start taking the right decissions so we can protect what we already have but also, to be open and be able to acept new technology to fulfill the modernday necessities. Also many of the nowadays political problems in my country could be resolved, because knowing about the past will help us to know wich things were useful and good in the past and wich things were catastrophic to our contry, speaking in political terms; and so we , the next generation, could be guided by these things and principles. I think that knowing about the past and to love it, either way it has been good or bad,  will help us to learn from our mistakes , learn about good principles and fund our culture in those good principles so we can have a better and faster growth in all the aspects of our life; but the most important thing about thats is that thanks to that we , the young adults, could be part of that big and good change.

column4: My city needs many things to be improved to be a better place to live in. One of them is pollution. Santiago has become one of the most polluted cities in South America which brings negative consequences to our helath and habits. If this could be solved people of my age could practice outdoors sports more frecuently. There wouldn't be so many respiratory illnesses specially in winter; there would be more outdoors activities and some scheaduled ones wouldn't be cancelled because of bad air conditions. In some parks there are many kinds of gyms for people to do excersise for free but many times air conditions do not allow people to use them so finally they prefer to go to an indoor gym to excersise but not all the people have the money to afford it. Others like doing running so you don't need to pay a gym for that but when the air is so polluted, authorities prohibit to practise any sports outdoor. Some people of different goverments have tried to solve this problem but all of them have failed. The solution is not simple, the city is located in such a place surrounded by mountains which do not allow the air move quickly so  pollution is, in a way, stucked in the air. A long time ago, one candidate to the presidency proposed to dinamite some mountains to solve the problem but that idea sounded crazy and it was desestimated. People of my age need to do some excercise and we have beautiful parks to do it. If this could be solved we will be very happy sto do sports because that is so good for everybody's mood. When someone practices some sports he/she feels better, happier and more willing to do good things, you better relationships and want to do share and do things to improve yourself. Besides, when people of my age practise sports they are teaching others through their example that sports are good for everyone. Pollution is something difficult to solve but I really hope that it could be done soon for everyone's sake.

column4: .                           Malls all over the world help people to enjoy visiting it. A bigger Mall in Provo would help people to enjoy more going to it . Even though some people may think that Malls are bad places to visit, Malls create  good eviroments where people can go as family and spend some time together. A Mall in Provo can be beneficial for different reasons. Some of those reasons are that family would have a place to visit together, and fun places would be closer to visit. .                           Families do not have a lot of places to visit together. Malls create that enviroment to families to go and spend time together. In a Mall families can visit different stores for the different preferences of the family in the same place. For example, in a Mall children can visit a store for chilchen, or they can go to a game store. Due to that Malls have stores very close to each other, family can go and visit cloth stores that are close to the games stores. For that reason, Malls are a good place to help families create closer relationships.  .                            Second, fun places are all over of most cities. Families have to drive to different stores if they want to satisfy the preferences of all the family. At a Mall, families would have everything close. They would not have to spend big amounts of money to visit different stores that the family want. For example, if family want to get icecream, play laser tag and they want to do both thing, they would have to drive to get icecream and after drive to a laser tag store. To resume, in a Mall families would have many fun places to visit without need of driving arround.  .                             In conclusion, a Mall in Provo can ve a very good place to improve the social enviroment of a city. With a Mall in Provo, there would be more people happy, and more people would have a place to relax on weekends. It is strongly recommended to build a Mall in Provo because it will benefit many familes and friend relationships. If a Mall is not built in Provo, families and friends would still have to spend much time driving to different places to find fun things to do.

column4: One improvement in my city in Ecuador in these days could be to build another bridge with the next city Samborondon. It would help a lot to everybody, because traffic is horrible by morning when people need to go to school or job. Because more of the people in my city is working in another city. You take like 45 minutes and sometimes an hour to cross two bridges. And frequently without traffic you can cross the bridges in just 10 minutes. But the point is that it will help to save time and  polution decreased by morning and evening.First  we always need time in our jobs  to finish an specific task and stuff, so for workers it can give him more time to spend with his family and maybe to return to home for something they forgot in a hurry. Also it's better for students. I was studyng engineering in Electronic and Telecommunications in Guayaquil at Espol University and I took three hours to go and return at home. But with a new brigde it would take just 2 hours. There are similar cases like this with many students and workers in my city. So all of us would be benefit.Another point to build this bridge could be with a long view to decrease the pollution by morning. Even by night there are many cars  and contamination for the noise of the cars. So our health could be better too. In conclusion to build a new bridge can help my city with the commercial activity, health and saving time. I would be very thankful with this.But I know besides that is a personal responsability to everybody to drive on time and carefully. If both parts work, I think many people can receive benefit now and in the future.

column4: As a matter of fact,  everybody wants to live in a city where everybody can live with out problems in order to live confortable. I am a man who works in an office of the government in Peru. I am a offcial of the Electoral Commision in my country. People who has my age and my status in my country ussually work and train in their professional abilities and they support their families. One of the things that in my country we need to improve is the way to avoid the rush hour in transportation from some place to another place in order to be confortable and share time with the family.It is very important to arrive on time to any appointment. Everybody feels better when he or she arrives on time to his or her job or any place. In the city where I live is really very hard to arrive on time to any appoinment because there are many vehicles in the roads and there are not many roads to arrive to the destiny. For example, if somebody works eigth hours per day and start to work at 8:00 am he has to left his house two hours before to arrive on time to his job. Then when that person finishes his job aproximately at 5:00 pm he has to face the rush hour again to go back to his home and usually he arives home at 7:00 pm. Sometimes, people study some course and it start at 7:00 pm until 9:00 pmand after that he could go back home. With this example it is easy to understand how inconfortable is to live in a city that has not many options to arrive from one place to other place in a short time because there are many cars and a few roads. All of the roads are full of cars in a rush hour. We spent more time out of home that with our families.In sum, It is true that everybody wants to live confortable, especially people who has my status and age that usually work and train in their professional abilities in my country, so  it is necessary to improve new means of trasportation in my city to avoid the rush hour and it is very important to design new roads to short distances betwen one place to another to be confortable and to have time to develop ourselves with our families.

column4: I am from Arequipa, in Arequipa we have a lot of cultures, that cultures are there along time ago. We speake Quechua and Aymara, I testify that we have a lot of taste in our food, it is so nice. I going to tell you, why our country and my City Arequipa is the most beautifull place to live. First of all, our culture is so rich, a lot of years, Incas, story, and music. We have a lot of music like Saya, Morenada, Diablada, Festejo, etc. It is not so simple because every song and dance have a story. In the highlands, Saya and  Morenada it is  a dance for the 'indios', 'cholos', 'negros' and 'serranos', names given for people from Spain, this people work all the day for food and in the night their dance represents the pain and how they think about the work and the death. They dance so rude and with clothes that represents the hell and the pain of their own people.Secondly the food and the buildings, you can eat more than fifty plates and a lot of drinks, we have some rituals and walks with 'Santos' for all the city, sufering the pain and the thoughts of our people. With a 'quena' in the hand, men walk playing songs, sad and happy songs, drinking alcohol or beer, going to the town crying, or just talking about something.The people are so nice and the food is kinda cheaper, we have a lot stories from the death or just telling parent to their sons, etc. For example Macchu Picchu, or Urus, how that cities were buildings and (one of my favorites) ghost, horror stories, and it is so nice to drink chocolate or some herbal tea, with your family, telling some story about 'Karisiri' or  the work or some activity. The family in my land it is so important therefore me and my mom are the best friends, she is my favorite girl and that kind of relationship it is the same for the rest of the families. The Institutes or Universities are good, is not excellent but it is very good, you can find friends your first day visiting the city, it is normal to have some problems, everybody have but the member of the church are so nice, you can trust themThats why I know that my land, my city it is a good place and choise to live. If you want to learn our culture or just live with peace and a reaaly nice chocolate, it is your city, it is your land.

column4: Doing big cities saffer fo their people                        How can people live in a big city without feeling safe? Big cities usually have a lot of transportation, opportunities to get a job, many schools, and they can be an amazing place to live. However, cities need to be a safe place to live and the people need to feel it everywhere that they go. The solution is pretty easy and it is possible do it and can be even easier if the the population help doing little things, and there are some ways to do it.                      When people thing about living safety, it is common to think about home, sometimes living with parents, going outside during the day and things that make them feel safe. Nevertheless, they can feel in the same way if they live, for example, in small cities where they know everyone. It is possible too achieve that feeling if they develop this type of relationship with the neighborhood. Then, anywhere, even big cities, can seem such as home. People can do it for themselves, but the government has a big part of the job to do.                       The government of each city individually, has to promote an environment for the population no matter what. Policing should be the priority, to protect everybody and to motivate the population to do even more good actions to help each other. The money to pay more policing is a big discussion, but the budget to do it could be used to prevent people to go to prison and make a difference and prevent intead of just use the policing and jail as forms of punishment. Applying this method of life not only need a budget by the government, but also a good primary education to develop these ideas since they are children .                      If teachers can teach math, science, geography, history of country, they also are able to teach each student how to live with good behavior. It is not enough just teach about it in class, but if the community in each school promotes more examples of good behavior, they will grow up better and knowing how to react for different situations, that they could not know only living at home. It would be helpful since everyone has to be at the school for many hours weekly and for many years during the hasdest time of their lives, the teenager. Because it is at this time that most part of the felonies start in the society.                 As shown, these ways can help the city to be a better and saffer place to live. The little thigns that everyone can do is helpful, and each person in the city has an important thign to do to help the city to be safer. The governmetn cannot do everything, but support the population by teaching since primary school how to have a goood behavior ia an excellent start.

column4: I am from a very small Siberian city. So small, that there is no university there. Because of this young people usually leave the city right after the graduation from a high school. For now, none of these options are possible.One of the main benefit of having the university and job oportunities for yong people is that it can prevent youth from leaving the city. A lot of people would like to stay in the city, but they do not see any perspectives. Very often when people move to another city for a high education, they prefer to not return to their hometown. The reason is because they already have some job oportunities in a big city. Aso they do not see how their high education can be usefull in a small town.This is how it is become like a circle. There are not many people with education who can make some new companies where high education could be needed. On the other hand, people with high education prefer to not come back to our hometown because they cannot see how they can use their high education here.Having a university in our town might be salvaltion to this problem. People coud get high education in our city and later they can use it in our city as well.

column4: Jordan is my country. It is located in the Middle East next to Israel. I love my country and I will never stop visiting it. However, Jordanians need to improve in many aspects, or even to stop doing certain things such as using connections to reach the goal without having any qualifications.Using connections when people apply to jobs, makes the highly qualified people unable to get it. Actually, it is not only unfair for these people but on the long run the quality of work that the unqualified will provide is unacceptable. Accordingly, it will directly affect the outcomes of each place they work in including academic, economic, and even on the personal level of relationships  . In addition, the qualified people wil leave the country looking for a different opportunity. The end result will be to lose these qualifiactions in the country that is in need for them. It negatively affects the future generations.I wish at some point this peroblem will get to end. I believe, this will give an equal opprtunity for all people, and the one who deserves will be the one who gets it. This will change the perspective of Jordanians toward their country. Moreover, this will encourage them to return back to their country because they believe that they will have the opportunity they are looking for. However, to be able to get the best out of it, then it is the government responsibility to put an end for all these actions. They should be serious and put penalties for whom who would thing to do it again.In conclusion, I believe that to be able to get our counrty into a different level then we should stop using connections to help us acheive our goals. We should work hard to deserve what we dream of. Otherwise, we won't find qualified Jordanians in my country any more.

column4: I came from Seoul. I have been living in Japan for about 2 years and 1 year in Canada. Considering my these expriences, I would like to say 'having good family support program' will help people my age to live better. One of oustanding which Korea suffer from is people are not willing to getting married nor having a kid after their marriage. This issue is globbally know n and other countries also trying to resovle this. Getting married late and not having a kid will cause 'Higher ratio of old generation'. So later, small group of young generation who lead economy need to support large group of silver generation.To resolve this issue, Seoul or Korea goverment needs to provide better family support program.  First of all, the culture of company needs to encourage marriage and having a kid. People are afraid of letting their boss know about their marriage or baby becuase of possible disadvantage of promotion. Especially for woman, using materity leave make them nervous that they might can not come back to work.Secondary, company or goverment need to improv baby care system. People in Seoul is sufferinig from finding baby sitters or finiding place for day care. Few companies has kid care program for their employees but most of companies are not. Day care program which goverment owns is very competiative to get in. There is a joke among people that we have to line-up at least 1 year before which mean before actually having a baby. Goverment needs to increse places to take care kids and to prepare better options to have baby care. Third,  companies need to encourage people useflexible working hour and evaluate their performance without any disclamination. People are staying at work for so long everyday in Korea. It seems like normal in Korea and sometime it looks like mandatory. This culture can not enourage our ages to have a family.  To let people feel that work environment support you to take care of family, this will enourage people to get married or having a baby after then. At this moment, we shuld not forget that not only allowing working on flexible hour but also there should be no disadvantage on their performance rating.I elebrated 3 exmaples what Korea can do better to make better plcace to live. My meaning of better place to live is 'the place family can live happily'. Theare could be better ideas. I would like to say if these 3 improvements are essential.

column4: The best place to live               I live in Provo is a really good city to live for the people the same age than me. column4: Making the decision to improve the school transportation for university students would be a great change in the city. This is not be necessary for some people, but it is for those that do not have a car. This would surely help students to feel motivated, to get up earlier to get to classes on time, and to waste less money in gasoline.   Motivation is something many students lack nowadays. In fact, this is one of the main reasons students performance tend to be low sometimes. Having better student school transportation would be a reason to feel the desire to go to classes. Moreover, having more buses for university students in the city would be an improvement, specially for those that do not have a car. Also, students will feel better emotionally because transportation is a reason to complain for many of them.Getting up earlier is not an easy task for university students. There are some that feel discouragement when waking up earlier knowing that there is no bus and that need to walk far to get on time. Having more buses would be help students to get to classes in time. This is surely a reason to wake up earlier because everybody wants to get to classes on time, but transportation is a problem sometimes. Having better school transportation would save time for students to study more instead of spending the time walking. The more buses available for students, the less money spent on gasoline. Indeed, when the school transportation is reliable there is no need for students to use cars. By doing so, money is saved, which could be used for other expenses instead of gas. It is necessary to improve students transportation in the city. In conclusion, improving the transportation for students in the city would be a great change to motivate students, to help them to get on time, and to spend less money on gas. By doing so, students performance would improve and time will be used better. It is recommended for the city mayor to take actions on this and to implement these changes. Transportation is always essential fo progress.

column4: One improvement  would benefit my city is a university like BYU. I am very impress of the BYU program. column4: I come from a city called 'Rennes', in France and it is  beautiful city with many places to visit  and many activities to do during the summer.I have been living there almost all my life so i know pretty well what could be improved, to make the youth generation to feel better and to feel like staying there. My city is a student's city which mean that we have a 2 big universities and many students coming from other cities, even from other countries. Those student's like to visit and to go out. The first problem is the people living outside. We are having a huge problem with all those people who just like to stay outside, with their dogs, they stay by groups in many places, usually around ATM machins, they beg for money, dring alcohol, fight and speak loud. Rennes is a city full of beautiful places and is restoring every year some areas, but those people just ruin everything, because it scares the population and the visitors, they don't feel safe., the city should get rid of them. As dancers, me and my friends we like, during sumertime, to practice outside or during winter, to practice in the entrance of a mall, when the mall is closed. And so the police officers, treat us just like them, we are not makimg any noise, nothing but dancing, but they make no differences and so they keep us from practicing anywhere but a close room, which is not easy to have.The city should work on finding a way to help them the best they can and not just let them being a part of the view, the environment.I do believe those persons have a huge value, but they are ruining it when they are just staying aroung and scaring the people.With this change in Rennes, it would be such another athmosphere, so many people would not decide to leave for a better place, but they would decide to stay and participate more in the aprovement. People would just feel more free to go around and have a walk downtown.

column4: My city has many things to improve. Considering that I live in Sao Paulo State, Brazil, all my life, I'm going to choose an important improvement that needed to be done in that country. The public transportation needs an urgent improvement.In Brazil we actualy have bus and subway, but is totally unsecurity and full of robbers. This need to change! The Brazilian's President need to invest more money on the safe public transportation and hire some cops to prevent robbers.This way, everyone in my city and not only the people of my age would be happier and I can explain at least two main reasons to sustain my point of view.First, the price of fuel is too high... It's very expansive to use private car to go around the city. Maybe this should sound a little wierd for a reader that lives in US, but in Brazil one pay $12,00 per galon...  It's just too expansive. That's why improving the quality of the public transportation would help more people to use the public transportation and, by doing so, save a lot of money.Second, there are many cars on the streets. Everyone can get a loan in the bank and buy a car there, even if one has no money at all. The problem is that the city don't support so many cars. So, right now, the traffic is just horrible. For example, in Sao Paulo city you can spend 4 hours in your car, just waiting for the traffic. This is a total disaster. If the public transportation was safe, I'm sure that many people would use it more and avoid this horrible traffic situation.In resume, improving the public transportation would make the brazilians life much better.

column4: 40% of the actual population are individuals between the 20's and the 30's. Actually, people that were borned after the year 1990 are called millenars. Millenars will be the responsible for the economy in the future and to take the decisions in the future, however many of these millenars share one thing in common: the unnemployment. One imporvemnet that we demand is better education opportunities, more jobs and new governements.Many of these young adults do not have good educational opportunities. Many bright minds are lost in low wage works, other are involved on drugs and others think that they are too poor to dream for a education. Many schools are really expensive or the public schools have a lot of demand that a lot of people do not have the opportunity to get into a school. AS a consequence they find a world in the drugs and the alcohol, they start doing deals that allow them to make money, so they think it is a good life. A reallity is that most of the young people that don't study is because they think that they are too poor to aspire to a education. WE demand more opportunities that include scholarshiops, more places to more students and high quality schools.One improvemnt that all the world needs is more employments. We see people expending money, new enterprises that invest in MExico, however we do not see new jobs or opportunities to improve. MAny professionals are doing the job of a taxi driver because they did not find a job related to their field of study. We demand the the enterprises hire millenars because they have potential, we do not have experience but we are willing to learn. If we demand to improve something is our governement. HE have studied in the history of the country and the world amny bad politicians that had harmed the country. We remeber many wars and we thought that we learned from them. However, we are in the same situation and we know the end and we are not doing anything to change it.We are young, yes. WE want to change the world, yes. column4: I would like to hang out with my friends in my hometown. When we hang out, we usually watch the movies, eat some delicious food and go to cafe to drink some sweet beverage. We can find anything we want to do and enjoy in our city. I think my city has many convenient places to enjoy, such as restaurants, theaters, mall, etc. But I think people in my city need more places where people can study for several reasons. First of all, In my city, there are only many places to enjoy spending the time with friends or families but not places to study such as libraries. people can enjoy when they spend the time with their firends or family. However, when they need to study for test or something else, They only can go to libraries.There are some libraries, but they have limited spaces. they can't accept all people who want to study in there. When I go to library, everytime I go there, I had to wait for the seats because there are too many people to accept.  Second, people who should study for many reasons usually go to the cafe. These kinds of cafe are very popluar for people who want to study in the cafe. if our city has these kinds of cafe, some people who should study can concentrate for studying in study cafe and others who want to enjoy their time with their friends can spend the great time in original cafe. In conclusion, our city needs some places for studying like study cafe. This improvement will be helpful for our city.

column4: How to make my city a better place to live for people my age and what are the benefits from this change? I would like to propose this two ideas: first, more places to do sports, like more free soccer matches, skateparks, of little gyms in the parks. And second, more activities at college or universities, like free yoga classes, chess championships, or more relax things for young people at these places. Now I'll talk about my first idea: I think my city needs more places to do free sports, because the young people of these days are too lazy, and they don't want to pay a gym; also they spend a lot of time closed in their apartments, playing videogames, just watching TV or looking at their smartphones. So, to have free sports places in the city will help to take their attention on going out of their apartments and make sports; they don't need to pay, so,they will go happy to make sports all the time they want, and their will be bussy doing something productive or healthy. The young people will be healthy with more places like these.And the second point: My city needs more relax activities for young people, because they are too stressed with their studies, their families (or because they are alone in this city), their social lifes and things like that. If they have a relaxed moment in the day, they'll feel too much better; they won't think about the studies, families or social life, they just will think about themself and they will take a time to rest; it have been comprobated that, when you are working and you take a rest of twenty minutes, your brain will work better, because it hasn't all the charge over him. Meanwhile, if you work and work without stop, your brain could colapse and you could forgive the things you was trying to do, or normal things you should do day by day, because you are colapsed. So, a relaxed time every day is good for our healthy and specially for the young people of this city.In conclussion, to have a better place to live in this city, we need healthy people and healthy lifes, and for that we will offer to young people free sport places and relaxed places to have fun and recreate between them.

column3: I live with my parents when I was stydying in University. My dad is not the easiest person to get a long with. But my mother would always be supportive to me and helped a lot in my life. Although my father is a very smart person and he helped me a lot as well with learning history and geography. He is a journalist and that's why he know a lot about everything.When I was younger, I played professional basketball. I had one of my best friends as a roomate whenever we had games on a road. I loved living with him because we always had so much fun together and had lots of thing in common.When I was serving a mission, I lived with many different companions. All of them were from USA and I had one companion from Germany.One of my favorite companons is Cees Hofman, we traveled a lot to the cities in our mission and we had so much fun together and laughed a lot. But we also worked a lot and one of the things I love about this person is his love to Russian people and this country.He taught me a lot how to love and care about other people and not judging them at first point when you don't know them.Now I am married and live with my five. column4: I am originally from Russia. I had lived in Moscow for the last several years, but my hometown is Rostov-na-Donu. So I would like to write about my hometown where I lived for a long time.I think my city has many problems, but one of them is lack of sport grounds and outdoor fields and courts so young people and teenagers could play some sports instead of just staying at home and play computer games. Or, what's even worse - to get into a bad group of guys which will have a very bad influence. I mean drugs, alcohol and other things like that. Because it's a very big problem in Russia and especcialy in small cities (although my city's population is about 1.5 millions, it still has such problems with young people).I am sure if there would be much more sport grounds and open courts and fields to play sports, young people would spend more time doing sports rather then sticking with a bad company and ruin their health even.Also, Russia is very weak at some sports. For example, we dont have a good soccer time now. If all the kids in Russia would have more support in that, maybe in 5-10 years we would have much more better players to play for our country.If we compare it to USA, and basketball for example, there is a basketball hoop almost by every house and there are outdoor fields ll over the neighborhoods in big cities. That's why USA has the best basketball team in the world.Another problem I think is a job and working places for young specialists who just finished the university.The salary might be so small if you want to work according to your speciality, so lots of students who just finished the university have to find another job to have a bigger salary.Our government should be concerned about that and how they can better provide working places for the young specialists.  We also still have problems with medicine and quality of the hospitals for example but it is another big topic for discussion and it's been better for the last 5-7 years as the government let city to have more private clinics to provide health care to people in the city.Tahir Hasbiullin

column4: In a inequal society, who will not like to acced to a good universities?. column3: I have lived with my sister for a year. She is from South Korea, and her major is second language teaching. She likes drawing and listening to music. Also, she loves teaching Korean. column4: Have you ever heard about Cheonan, South Korea? Cheonan is a small city in South Korea as well, so sometimes people do not know about that. However, I know that because I have lived in Cheonan for 15 years, and it is my father's hometown as well. As I say, it is a small town, so it has grown up fast since 2005. In contrast, it needs to make several improvements recently for people. Especially, there is an improvement which Cheonan needs to make is in terms of all services of bus, it would benefit in order to save money and make people happier than before.First, if Cheonan changed all service of bus, people in my age could save money because a lot of people in my age usually use the bus to go somewhere. Bus fees in Cheonan is the most expensive in South Korea. There is several reasons why it is so expensive. First, some people in the bus company stole all bus fees for 3 years. In addition, the police did not get caught them, so they did not pay about money which they stole. Also, people do not use the bus than other cities because my city is smaller than other city. In my opinion, Cheonan can decrease the bus lines which people do not use a lot. And then, my city decreases the bus fees for people in my age. That is why I think they could save money if they made this improvement.Secondly, the bus in Cheonan is so popular because the service is so terrible. Usually, people and bus drivers fight, and bus drivers are so rude to people. Almost all of people do not want to use the bus in their city, but there is just bus to go to other place except their own cars. I think my city needs to take care of it because these bus services make people in other cities think Cheonan is a bad city, and people are so rude, but it is not true.

column4: I live in a small Town call Pachuca in Mexico, it is a beutiful place to live very quiet place and chill,  unfortunately this town needs a couple of improvements and one of this is the public transport(bus service).   First people like me use  the public transport almost every day, when we go to work we use it,when we go to shoping we use it,we use this service for many of our activities, one of the problem with the actual service of public transport is that it is never on time, for one or another reason the buses  are always late, at morning when we need to be on time to work the buses are late to pick us up and as a result we arrive late to work, it the same for the students who need  going to school or for any person who needs to be on time in wherever, if the service of public transportation make a improvement in this problem many people will be glad, furthermore many people would be on time at work, school or wherever place they need to be, it should be great that we as user of this public transport could be on time as well as don't need to wait on the bus stop for a long period of time.  Second the buses that are used to provide the service are to old as well as in really bad conditions, in spring when the weater is really hot the buses don't have A/C  as a result the temperature inside the bus is so hot it is really insane, on the other hand during the winter when the weater is really cold the buses don't have heaters to provied a warm climate inside the bus,  as a result all the users suffer the effects of this getting sick  all the time. The service of public transportation have to do something to provide i better service or at least to improve the buses that they are using to provide the actual service, it would be great to travell in one of those units during the spring having a cool cliamte in side the bus or having a warn climate during the winter, users would be happier and they would not have to be worry about to get sick.

column3: My Parents During my childhood until five months ago, I was living with my parents, during this time I could learn many things from them, and also, they taught me a lot of things like, cook, to be autosufficient, and never give it up. Living with my parents is the time that I treasure more right now. I remenber my mon taught me how to make many receipts that my daddy likes as 'seco de pollo', and many kind of breakfast in each morning my mom love to make it. However I did not know how to do something, they were always there, beside to me, teaching me and guiding me, and giving me greats to improve my skills. They taught that I do not have to leave the things to the half, that i have to finish it, and those are the qualities from them, good persons, workers, lovely and friendly parents.
column4: Humble people is one of the improvement that Guayaquil city needsIn the current century, you can notice that millenial people want to improve and be succesful on their lives. However, they do not know how to obtain the success, and they do everything without taking care about  how their steps can affect to others. In adittion, with humble pople, we can get responsible people, hard workers, and good thinkers people.Responsiblity comes from people with values, being humble, is a value applied. Humble people want the well being of everybody, and more of their family, so they implement the responsiblity on their lives and their home. For example, in a family the man works, and the woman has to take care about the children, a man that is not humble, can waste the money he earns on games, or beer, but a humble man, knows that it money can be useful to buy food, clothing, or medicine. Those kind of thinking is that reponsibility makes to think in a person. To be responsible in your life, help you plan your priorities and get your goals. Humble people are hard workers because they already know the need of being autosufficients. In a world without hard workers we could not have anything we already have, because someone has to made it, and someone had to work hard and think hard to make it, why and to who. This quality can help because everyone can apply it, and we will be a city without lazzyness, especially on milenials people, because we are the furutre of the world, and we do not want people without goals and ideas to improve. Hard workers will always being welcome on each work field.  Good thinkers people have humility on their hearts and help other to find the peace on their lives. Good thinkers are people who have thought about their lives and have planned many steps to follow for a good life style. They give you another point of view of things and teach you how to do something intead affecting to others. Nevertheless the age, there are many  good thinker people, and this could be a good source at the time to improve. We could work as a team and get our goals. In conclusion, I think if Guayaquil city had many humble people, can develop, and were a city with good values, and you know that values make you be good person. Finally if we combined every quality describes before, we could have a real improve in Guayaquil city.

column3: I have lived with a few people during the course of my life, but the most time I have spent with someone was the time I was living at home. At first I lived with my two sisters and both of my parents. However, with the time my sisters were big enough to leave the house and go study to college. After they left I started spending a great amount of time with my mom, she likes to cook and watch movies. My mom did not had a job at the moment I was home so she mostly worked around the house, that got her really busy though. My mother is funny and very active, she is kind and generous. I also started spending more time with my dad, he likes going to the gym so I used to go with him. My father works for the Chilean government and his schedule is also very busy. My dad is quiet, a fan of exercising and watching sport in the television. I liked living alone with my parents because I learned much about them, I also grew closer to them and started realizing how valuable their example has been in my life. They have taught many things and I am greatly grateful at them.
column4: The city I grew up in Chile is not a big city and I am positive that many old and young people agree that it needs some improvements. The three things my city should change or add is a Mall, more parks and it should change and renew the streets.First, my city does not have a mall. Many people likes to spend their weekends on a mall because you can find everything there, you can eat delicious food, you can shop and you can play. I believe that people my age would benefit greatly by having a mall, they would be able to spend more time with their friends doing activities together instead of just going out and just talk.Second, another thing that my city should change is the number of parks. My city is not a big city, it has many mountains and many of the people  that lives there loves to exercise outside and they adore the nature, especially people my age, they often go camping or hiking. More parks are necessary because young people needs more motivation to go out and enjoy the nature. Also, parks would help people to respect the nature more and be more clean.Third, the streets on my city has some problems. You can notice it while you are driving, it is not dangerous but it is not comfortable either. People my age knows how to drive and they move around the city in their parents car most of the time. Renewing the streets would be a positive change because that would mean less accidents for young inexperienced new drivers.Clearly, my city has many great things but there is always room for improvement. A mall would make people more social, new parks would make young people valorate their environment better and, upgrading the streets would bring positive effects to citizens security.

column3: Two years ago, I live in Peru alone. Now, I have the opportunity to live with roommates in a private room. Definietely, my life is different. It is incredible, how cultures play an important role in our behavior. Before my time here, I did not think how my culture could influence my decisions. On the other hand, my roommates are outgoing people. Therefore, they enjoy their free time dancing because they are from Central America. One of them works in Nuskin and the other one works in a Dominican restaurant. Usually, they work in the morning but I study in the mornings. Even though our schedules are different, we plan something fun to do during Saturdays. Some Saturdays I need to work but my Saturdays off I have fun with them. I want
column4: Around the world, socities are attacked by violent actions. In Peru is not the exception. Even though there was a difficult time during terrorism, now the number of deliquents in Peru is increasng. Unfortunatedly, the Peruvian government is not changing the laws to eradicate the violence in diverse aspects. Therefore, Peru would be a perfect place to live if the Peruvian government changes the laws. The population of a country elect governors to live in a peaceful place. Peruvians want the same. However, the recent governors prefer to receive bribes from the deliquents, instead of changing the laws. The fullfilment of the law is ruled by the government. Therefore, according to the circumstances of a country, the governors could modify the law so that its citizens live in peace and foreign people visit and delight of its wonders. On the other hand, if the Peruvian government change its laws to punish the deliquents, the youth in Peru would change its perspective of life. Being that, the scenario of violence  is an inadequate environment to grow up. For example, many children and teenagers in Peru think that the laws in a country are optional. It is sad that every generation is losing the true concept of what are laws and how they can protect us. People around the world need to know that the desobedience of a law has a punishment. In conclusion,  Peru can be a better place to live if the Peruvian government stops of receiving bribes of deliquents, changes its laws, and promotes the obedience of its laws. In that manner the childhood and youth could be benefited in having a significant concept of law and obedience. When people increase their viewpoint about diverse concepts, they become better individuals in society.

column3: I lived with my mother when I was in Madrid. I liked to live with her for several reason. She is 58 years old. However, she seems to be 30 years old because she is very fun and helpful. When I lived with her, she was more my friend than my mother.  I loved to live with her and to share many fun time.

column3: Before coming to the ELC, I used to live with my family, in Saltillo, Mexico. My family is conform by my parents, Victor and Teresa,  and my two younger sibilings, Litzy and Daniel; however, Litzy, does not live with us; she lives in California with our cousins. So, my daily routine back in Mexico was  waking up early, around seven A.M. to go to the gym with some friends. Then, I would  come back to my place to take a shower and get ready for work (I fixed computers at my job) I usually came back home around six P.M. so I did not really see my family during weekdays.  Also, because my dad works until eight P.M. every single day, and my brother, Daniel, finishes school at six P.M.  So, yeah, Satudary was our day.
column4: I'm twenty one years old, and I'm from a big city in the north of Mexico; that means, it's kind of a dangerous place. There's mobsters all over that area of the country. Is not a dangerous place only for people with the same age as me, but for everyone. This is a huge problem that involves a lot of money, interests, even politics. However, at the same time, involves every single citizen.  I think we all are part of the solution. We need to  change our mindset. We need to start thinking about the well being of our families and  others, and our future. If we want to change the city, and potentially the whole cuntry, we need to go back to basics, to the principles our mothers told us when we were younger: Being honest, being responsable, being good people. I think is so simple that could  sound stupid, but it's true. If we choose to do the right thing in every situation, we could progress all together.If there would be more honest people, that means more  honest people working in politics. People with morals and principles, without the desire to get power by wrong ways. People that would honestly care about the well being of others, and the city in general. There's where people my age get involve in this plan. We are the future. Right now, I know there's guys my age studying politics and laws, getting ready to get important charges in the city. If they choose to stay honest and true to  basic principles we can change the city, and the country. And they need even more honest citizens to help them keep the security and the well being of the city. I honestly don't know what would be the actual impact of this, I just know it would be for the good of all of us.

column4: We have a lot of problems in my city that make our city bad. We have problems like traffic, environment, and crime. One of the most important is the last one because any of us are safe. We have a lot of problems because of the security. If we have better police we can improve this. We have at least 20 crimes per year and almost all of them are for young people. We should have more people to take care about our city. If we have more police on the streets and less thiefs we will be safe.First, young people usually want to go out even if there is any person that will kill you. In Bogota you can be kill just for your phone and that is a big problems. Thiefs know that young people usually have a good phone, for that reason they always go for them. If you do not give your phone they kill you but sometimes if you do they also kill you. Young people always want to use their phones and for that reason they are in dangerous. For instance, one my older brother was using his phone and a guy go into the bus and said 'give me your phone now or I will kill you', he had because any person do anything. Even if the police see that he/she will not do anything. Young people usually is kill because of their phones. Second, young people always want to go to any party. However, in clubs or in any party you are always in dangerous. Parents say that is better if their children are in house drinking, but there is a lot of problems with that. column4: If I could change something from Colombia should be the malls. In colombia we have many malls. Just in Bogota we have almost 21 malls around the city where people spend money and time looking always the same. It is a tradition of a colombian family, that sunday is normally to be in the mall. It is not funny that everysingle sunday expend time doing the same. It is important that the goverment decrease the number of mall construction and they start to build more parks. it helps the young people to be closer to their families, to relax reading or doing another activity that increase the stresful of daily activities, finally helping the environment.The family is the most important in our lives. Today,  the people prefer spend time in front of a TV than with their families, they don't know anything about each other. it is why the only day that they have the should be talking and spending time as a family. If the goverment created a park specially for picnics, bbq or activities with a lot of security. it will increase the number of happy families.  For example, I remember when I was a child my mother travel with me for 1 hour every sunday to sausality a little town in Colombia just to be with me playing with a ball or reading out loud. I loved those plans with my mom because today I can say that I love to be with my mother. The people need love and feel support by their family if their spend a really value time with them the society will gor up with more unity. Spending time doing relaxing activities is important for young people. Our daily live is so stressful and when the weekend coming we prefer spend time in parties or crowders places. my generation doesn't have time to relax or to be alone thinking about the future or the good alternative for their live. they should spend more time in outdoors activities learning about the world or just being alone with theirselves. When I feel stressful I need to walk without music and people just me and my mind thinking the best way to control and achieve all my tasks. Particulary in Bogota we don't have many places to seat and just think or do homework because we just have one library but this is so far away so if they change one mall for one relaxing space they are helping to the society to grow up relaxing.Finally,  the environment is important today. We are causing many damage to the environment creating more construction,  using more chemicals and products that generate pollution and create a visual contamination it is not good for our life or for the future generations. we need a city of peace and for sure we need this planet. the goverment should regulated better the construction because we are in a society that just think about money and consume. it is kill our planet and it is kill ourselves. for example, in just the construction of titan plaza ,one of the most important malls in Bogota they used 632 trees to created the lobby because it is builded with wood because it looks fancy for the consumers. it is not fair for the environment that just for our idea of rich or statues with use innecesary our natural resources. In short, many cities need more spaces to spend with family, relaxing and that helps with the environment. if the goverment has a lot of money to build more the will ahve money to create more parks that are helpful for human beings.

column4: Estudents in my city have some problems  with their schedule because they cannot  study and work at the same time.  This is a  huge problem because affect in different ways the students. The schools should  incorporate a program that permit students  to work in their schools because they could work in the same place that they study  saving time, and also they can be more independent. Student could work in their schools because this is a good option to save time.  In Santiago, students that work and study at the same time are very sacrified because they do not have time to share with their family or friend;therefore, they do noy have a social life. For example,  The person, who works and studies,  begins  his or her schedule ate  8 AM and finishes at 10.  In addition, this students prefer get married when they finish their studies because  they do not have time to date or spend time with their  couple.  With this change, this problem would change helping this people to  have a social life with less sacrifice.  The result would be  possitive.The other benefit is that students would be more independent. This means that the can spend  money in  their own stuff, such as books, clothe, shoes, fun activities, transportation, etc.  Nowadays, students need the support of their parents because  without  them, students cannot  pay the necesary things. Also, this change  affect in a pocitive way students because they can feel better if they are independent, and their minds would less worried. Therefore, this improvement would students feel better.In conclusion, saving time and being more independent are two thigs  very helpful for students if  they can study and work in their  schools. It would improve their life style, their schedule, and social life.

column4: I was born in a city called Belem, it is a small city situated in the north of Brazil, by the Amazon. column4: I am from Peru, specifically the city of Lima, the capital. Lima is a big city with a population of almos 10 million people. If there is a problem that Lima always have had, is the vehicules hard traffic. For this reason I believe that one improvement that will made my city a better place to live for people of my age is to improve the vehicule traffic sistem. One way this problem can be fixed is by the implementation of bikeways all around the city. Bike ways will motivate the young people to use them and by using them there will be less vehicules traffic, less contamination and young people will be healthier.Bike ways will motivate young people to use them. By using bikes instead of their own cars , young people are going to help the city  because the streets will be less crowed with cars. This way the city will look more clean and in order. For this reasons I think that the implementation of bikeways will make a change in the city that will make it a better place to live for people of my age.The implementation of bikeways in the city will make the city a cleaner place. This means that there will be a lot less contamination of the air. We know that vehicules contaminates a  in big amounts the air. If the gouberment implements bikeways in my city people of my age are going to start using more bikes and less vehicules. The use of less vehicules is going to clean the air of the city. For these reasons I think that The implementation of bikeways is going to make my city a better place to live for people of my age. The implementation of bikeways can have a big impact in the future of my city. Is going to make the air cleaner because there is going to be less contamination of the vehicules, the vehicule traffic sistem will be alot faster and organized and people of my age will be a lot healthier if thy use bikes instead of driving all day. For all of these reasons I think that bikeways should be implemented not only in my city but in every city.

column4: In order to benefit people in their twenties more companies and government organizations needs to allow graduated students to work remotely. Remotely jobs helps people to save time and save money. Studies show that more than 80% of people spend more than one hour every day on comute to their jobs. Many people who graduated from college are looking for jobs. If these new proffesionals have the opportunity to work remotely they will save time in their comute to work. Imagine this, one hour in the rush hour every day are 5 or 6 hours at week. Six hours in your car driving are 24 hours at month. In other words, people who spend an hour in their comute to work could save one day at month to do wathever they want. Also, people who spend more than 30 minutes in their car have higher levels of stress. This stress is not helpful for employees to achieve their tasks.There is not many jobs for every single graduated student. This is because there are not enough companies willing to pay for more employees. If work remotely is adopted in those companies, they will be able to hire more people. Consequently, more graduated students will have a job. This is because companies will not need to spend a lot of money in big facilities. If companies decided to move their operational facilities to smaller buildings they can hire people who is willing to work remotely and save the space in their building for other operational functions. Young adults want to have more time with their friends and families. This times are the best to live and nobody wants to spend their time in their cars. One hour of driving could be one hour of work out or hangout with friend if work remotely is adopted in this city. Employeers will save money in the rent of facilities and employees will save time and money.

column4: Sao Paulo, which is my city, is a great city. However, Sao Paulo could be a better city if the government had the desire to invest more in education and entertainment.First, education is a key for those who want to be succeessful, so the goverment should spend more money investing in education because this can create a better envirement for youth. Young people usually are looking for opportunities to gain good education and way to acheive their dreams. Consequently, If my city had a manner to change the actual situation, It would change the people's vision about Sao Paulo. The effects would be immediate because more people will have the desire to continue living in my city. In conclusion, the goverment should find a way to invest more in education becuase this will help to keep young people having the desire to live in Sao Paulo.Another manner to improve the style of the young people who live in Sao Paulo is to invest more in entertainment. Young people love to have opportunities to stay with their friends, and to have fun. Consequently, It is a wise idea to invest more in enterteniment such as shoppings, parks, party places, and others places like that. Young people are very excited, and they like to know new things, because of that, it is important to create more places where young people can spend time with friends. Concluding, investing in enterteniment is a good way to improve the life of those who have the same age that I have.In conclusion, Sao Paulo is a great city where people can be happy; however, there are several things that Sao Paulo can improve to create a better style of life for those who pertence to younf people. The best two ways to create a better city are to invest more in education and enterteniment because those things will benefit young people in a short and long-term. When people have education they can create more and influence more the sociaty, and enterteniment helps people to relaxe and to enjoy life.

column4: I live in the capital of Peru, Lima. Now, I really love my place of birth but there are some things that need to be fixed in order to people from my own age to feel more safe and secure. Things that I would suggest to be changed. Many citites in the Unite States have shown a major change just because a little change was made. With this idea in mind, Lima can have a great change in terms of delincuency that is directly connected with education and work.The biggest improvement I would suggest is related to work along with education. Being the largest and more populated city in the whole country, with more than nine million people, Lima has a lack of opportunity, specially in terms of work. This may be the reason why so much delincuency has been seen in the past decade. In 2009, this city was ranked by the Federation of Delicuency as the second place with greater rate of youth delincuency in South America. The implement of more jobs will definelitly make a major change in the country. For instance, college students usually are in charge of their own payment education, and with this , they seen themselves inmerse in many illegal trades in order to get benefits from the colleges or from work.By increasing the opportunities of work for college students, the rate of delicuency will surely come down, and the enviroment will feel more safe. For study and for work. It is interesting how many changes can be experienced jusby making a major change in one aspect in a specific place.

column3: Well, today I will talk to you about one of my best friends, who has help me out a lot lately, his name is Tim. column4: Today I would write about what I believe my city needs to improve to be a better place for people of my age, I'm originally from a small place in El Salvador, I lived in the main city (San Salvador) for the past 5 years. In this document I will address one important topic and the points of view regarding to it, and that is how the safety plays an important role in the young people's life and how if we improve this we can create a brighter future for the next generations.One of the mayor problems is that El Salvador (in general) has a lot of violence. Talking more about the capital, lately we are getting to a point when the people don't want to get out of the houses because they are affraid that something bad is going to happen to them in a bus, the street, in your job, school, etc. This affects a lot to the young people because they are living in a city that is controlled by fear and not love. If we improve the security of the city, for example having more cops or decreasing the corruption we will have a better society, but a higher level will be teaching the importance of sharing and loving all men. If we teach this principles in our homes, the violence will decrease. In a short term this would improve the relationship between fathers and sons, we will have a society that cares more about the importance of family and strive to keep it united, it would increase the employment, and the quality of life by itself would rise. In a long term the economy of our city will be way better, we could reduce the poverty in the city, help the new generations by having a better enviroment. People will like to invest in our city.  The decision to change is ours. We can decide to create that future for our generation, and most important is that we are lying the fundations for the next generation, the future that we build will be founded in the history that we do today. We can create that future if we strive to live in armony with our fellowman.

column3: Now I'm living with a friend's parents in Morgan here in Utah. They are lovely people, always helping me to improve my English and pricticing a lot with them. They look like my parents. column4: My city in Chile calls Punta Arenas. One of the improvement that I think it will make my city a better place for people of my age is more places for entertainment.
