column4: When I was a child I always was wondering why only adult people could buy things. One of the thigs that I used to though was: Why onle the big people could slice those plastic things. My dad also told me that: 'Those plastic things are credit cards, and you have to be really careful with them'. He had like 5 credit cards. Almost a big part of the people has at least one credit card. They use it when they dont have available money. A credit card is a really big responsability. Only responsable people should have a credit card. I thing that the young people in every countrie shouldn't be allow to have a credit card. One reason why only the big responsable people can have one is becuse they will know when they had to use it. Most of the people want  a credit card but they don't know all the responsabilities that it have. When you have a credit card you can use it all the times that you want, but every card has a limit. When you are on the limit of it you can't us it more. Also, you have to pay for the money that you use. If you didn't pay the money that you have been using; you are going to have interest.  Nobody likes interest because it always makes that you have to pay more that the money that you used before. People with a credit card only should use it when they realy need it, and use it in a responsable  way.Another reason is when you have a credit card you always want to use it. That is a big deal. Is a new thing for young people so they are really excited for that. The bad thing is that if you use it always later you are not going to have enough money to pay for it. You should use only the card when you need it. That is the main thing of a credit card. Even though is a new thing for the person that requires it, you don't have to use it always. Use the credit card only to buy something important, and only if you don't have more money for it. If you recently adquire one of those crazy cards tu have to be really careful with it. In conclussion, have a credit card is a real responsabilty. You have to be always carefull with that. If you doesn't measure the use of the card it can bring you some problems in the future. Young people, most of the times don't think in the future consecuences that something can bring. In addition, some of the best ways to use a credit card are only use it when you really need it. For example: at school to pay a tuiton, or to buy some food. Or things that you really need it and are basic things for your life. If you have a credit card or you are gong to adquire one you have to be really careful with it.

column3: I live with my brother and his wife in Pleasant Grove. They are so kind and they decided to help me when I arrived to United States. My brother is shorter than me and he is so funny. column4: Living in other countries could give a different view and it helps to identify some aspects that could help your own hometown to improve. If a city have  good tools it will give many good opportunities to future generations. Future generations will be benefit with good quality of life and education. One improvement that would make my city a better place to live for people my age is security because it could have a possitive effect in student's and young people's life and work's opportunities. Improving the security of my city will affect positivily the life of student. The first reason is because of the transportation system. Many student have to travel from their home to college for at least half an hour, and many of them carry laptops and important materials for their class. They have to be worry about the security of the bus because most of them ocurre in there. For example for me was normal to see every day how robber stold the backpack of student when there were distracted. Other reason is the security in streets. As I, many student leaved college at nigth, and it is so dangerous. A lot of people of my age have been abducted at nigth after a party or college. For these reasons, improving the security of my city would help to the life of students and young people.Another important aspect is works's opportunities. People in my city have to look for a job in the financial or center part of my city. It means time and risk because they have to leave early in the morning and back late at night. Sometimes it could be difficult for women to look for a job that not represent a risk. Young people want to feel secure going working, and lack of security limited us for looking for better options that represent a risk for our lifes, and we want the same for our future families. For these reasons, work's opportunities in my city is directly affected by security.There are many improvement that will benefit people my age and security is the principal because it could have inmediate and long-term consequences in our life. Improving the security may help student young workers to be safe and and to not be limited for job's adquisition. Also in the future it would have a possitive effect in the economy of my city and more people will have more opportunities to work and study. Security is an important aspect that would develop the economy and education not only in my city, it is in all the world.

column4: Train is one of the common public transportation in the world. In my knowledge, every country has trains. Especially in the countryside, the public transportations are not as various as in the urban. Unfortunately, people can hardly see it in my city. The timetable works inefficiently so it leads to a rediculous condition that when there is a train, there are just few people tends to take it. Since then, the time table should depends on the schedule of majority, like the time people go to work and school. The trains should be increased when there are many people need them and reduced when there is just a few people need them. It will be more efficient and match most of the people's needs.Hopefully, the trains system can be fixed and improved better in my city. I believe other poeple think the same with me and people's life will become better when this transportation is improved.

column4: Currently in my country, the importance of family has been declined by society. The young people are growing without the knowledge of the importance of the family. When people understand the importance of it, their homes are a better place to be. People that know the importance of it have a different way to live. The principles that they live make them a better people. People of the age between 15 and 20 should learn how important the family is and how to make of it a better place.         Why should people learn the importance of family? What effect would it give to the nation? Well, first of all, a person without education is not helpfull for the community. Education is received at home, but what happen with a house that does not think that family is important? The family is a large part of a human's life, and without it we are nothing. People should know the family is important because there is where we learn who we are. When a person knows how important his family is, starts to appreciate the thing that around him and that is what community needs now!.          Besides the importance of the family, the nation needs to learn that even though some families are not a good place to rise children, it can be modified. If the society starts to foccus in how to have better families to rise children, the future of them will be brilliant. Everything can be handle if we care about the importance of the family.      To conclude,  If we want to change the horrible future that we are looking coming now, we need to change a lot of thing, but the fundamental one is the wrong concept of the family. If the society starts to recognize the importance of family, the community would be a better place to live in. This idea is not only for one specific nation or city, is for the rest of the world because this is really happening. A family without pricinples is not a good place to rise a child, but also a child without the knowledge of the importance of the family is harmful for the community. The family eas, is and will be the foundation of the humankind and with it we can be better.

column4: Nowadays, most of people want to move to a morden city. They thought big city is a better place to live because there has more job oppotunity, better enviroment, and convinment transporsition. Why people want to move to a big city instead stay in their home city? For a adult who just graduated from a university, he needs to plan about his future. It all start from find a good job. Finding a good job is not as easy as we thought. Even though you have a great experience, high education degree and academic skill, if your city do not have many good job oppotunity, you still cannot get a good job. If they can spend money on other useful thing, it will make the city become a better place to live.          In concusion, the qulity of a city is very important for young adult. column3: I move to provo 3 months ago and I love it. People are very nice and friendly. I live in Glenwood with five American girls, they are from different places from United States. Tori is from American Fork, she is 22 years old, she is so funny and kind, she is studying at BYU and she is getting married at the end of this month. She is really busy during the week so I harly ever see her.Emily is from New York, she is tall and chubby, she has beautiful brown eyes and long brown hair. She also studies at BYU, she is so friendly and outgoing. She usually works in the evening. Emily gets along prettyb well with Alissa. Alissa is another roommate, she loves cooking and her food is so delicious, she is pretty good at cleaning the apartment, she loves watching movies and sleeping. She has a boyfriend and she likes spending time with him at the apartment. She does not like sports at all.Kylie is the quiest person in the apartment, she is always doing homework and I think she does not have many friends. She is studying at UVU. And finally, Kaori, she is from Salt Lake, she is studying art at UVU, she is my favorite roommate, we both like sports, watching movies and hang out with friends.
column4: I am from Oaxaca, Mexico. Oaxaca is a very small town located at the southest part of the Mexican Republic. It is a hot and humid place, people are really nice and friendly. There are many things that I love about Oaxaca, for example: The food is so delicious and cheap, the tradicional music and dances are wonderful and interesting, the arqueological sites are so impressived and tell you about the ancient people who lived in the mountains, there are beautiful beaches and places to visit. Even though Oaxaca is a beautiful place to live or visit I think it needs some improvements. The education in Oaxaca is very poor, it is very sad but it is a reality, every year education in my town is worst and worst. Goverment and teachers argue constantly, the reason is because the goverment wants to private education. In other words, all students need to pay to get education. There are really poor people who can not afford it, teachers are really concern about it because the only things that can help students to overcome poverty in the future is to get education. That is why many of the teachers protest againts the goverment, teachers and some parents block the freeways or close the school.There was a terrible riot last year in my hometown, the teachers, parents of the students and comunity blocked all the freeways of the state, closed all schools and stores, it was a riot. The government sent police men, helicopters to fight againts the people, it was awful. In addition to that schools are not well-equipment and some teachers are so lazy to work.I consider that education is crucial, having the best education can help people to think, act, improve and make changes in the society, community and family. Education can make a difference, specially if you are a college student. I think one improvement for my town is to have a better educational system. College students would be more prepared to serve their communities because the programm would be adapted to their community's need. Students would be able to contribute to the people and help the town to grow. Another benefit students become creative and independent, instead of studying abroad or outside the town, they can stay in their hometown and help the place to be more productive. Goverment should provide scholarships for students, having education prepare students for the future, they can have a better job and provide for their future family. I consider that one of the biggest change would be in the teachers as well, teachers need to be consagrate to their job, well-prepared teachers can motivated and encouraged students to achive their potential and they also can have a desire to help others. In others words, I believe that doing these things my hometown can improve and we will see the progress in 10 years, I know it can be possible if we are willing to collaborate and make an effort.

column3: Now I am living with my husband, his name is Edwin. He is my favorite and the best rommate that I can have. He loves to read and listen music, specially if that music is new or the artists are new. I love reading as well, so we can spend time weekly just sharing our readings or texts that we have read during the week or what we are reading. He is almost that my stature which is good for me since I was afraid to have a spouse shorther than me since I am a tall person. He is doing his PhD in microbiology and molecular biology, he is focus in cancer research. I find this very interesting and also very hard, I am very proud to be his wife and to share this adventure and experience with him. Besides, he just won a fellowship, so he is very excited like me, because he will be working during this summer in one of his passions: doing research, especially cancer research.Both of us like to do similar activities, and sometimes different ones. However, I think it is important and interesting to share some activities, but at the same time to learn different actvities or thing from eah other. Edwin likes to cook more than me, but I like to try cooking as well, we like to do exercise, so we run three days per week. Living with Edwin is one of the best experiences that I have had. I loveour little family, and I love being with him every day.
column4: Mexico is a beautiful plece to live, it has many places to visit, and its people is very friendly. However, for people that are around twenty or thirty years old is kind of difficult to get a job after their studies in university. This is one of the things that Mexico should improve, its job market.It is always excited to see students getting their degrees, but it is very sad and disappointed fro them, and their families, see them struggling to get a job. Young people and graduated students are full of energy and potential, they are ready to share their knowledge, and all those skills that they got during their bachelors. However, the reality is another one when they starts lookin for a job, and they find out that it is not that easy. Some of them prefer getting an irrelevant job to waiting for a really good job. This happens because they also need to pay their services, such as rent, water and light services, their food, and so on, that is why they accept the first job offer. Others prefer to wait rather than to be in a job that could be boring or different. The process to be waiting sometimes it is frustating for them, so they prefer to leave the country, to join a family business or to start building their own business, even though it was not their original idea or plans.There are many good companies or government institutions that hire graduated students by applying several dianostic tests. Although this is a good option for many young people, the real story is that many old people are still working, and do not want to leave their job at least they can give their job to one of their relatives. This is very sad, but it is true. Every year, many people apply for these jobs, but only a few of them are hired because there are not enough room or vacants. One of the consequences of this situation is that young people put their personal goals in second place. For intance, if a student just graduated, and he or she wants to start his or her family, they feel stressful because of their finantial situation. They also realize that it is not easy to get a job, so it will not be easy to buy a house, to get their own car, and they cannot even think about starting their family. One of the solutions that the Mexican government could try is to expand the job market, they might have the possibility to change this situation, they can stop those fake jobs that are only wasting time and money; the Mexican government has not only the power to controlled, and to create many jobs,  but the power to create well-paid jobs, and jobs with quality.To sum up, Mexico has the odds to improve its economic situation by using its sources such as its money, its companies, its power, among others. It has the potential to increase job offers and the job market, so that young people could have a good and happy future.

column4: Young adults in these days are having a lot of  influence in society, sooner or later they will be responsible for the future of their country, city or location. Government has a lot to do with them and how they develop the skills that they will need in  the future. In my city the government tries to do a lot for them but I think they could improve the education and this culture of studying to be someone in life, they should promote free education and they should encourage people to study. Santiago de Chile is a big city where a large part of the population is concentrated. Although they have been working to give students better opportunities to study, I think they should promote this in a more effective way, giving scholarships and helping students to pay their careers more easily, inclusive giving students the opportunity to study for free. A lot of young adults in my city do not have or possess a bachelor's degree and it is really hard for most of them to get one; If the government would give more scholarships and facilitate students the way they can pay for school, more people would have a degree, they would have a better income and they would have  happier lives, this would impact not only to the government income, but large companies, small companies, and society. My city should encourage people, especially young students, to have a better education and to fight for it. Many of the people in my city do not think that it is very necessary to obtain a bachelor's degree. Some people gets comfortable just getting an associate's degree and this is all that they study in their lives. If the government would impart a method or program to encourage people to study, it would have a huge impact in society and we would grow in many aspects. Therefore, government in my city should teach the whys of education and what people could get if they have it.To conclude, government in my city not only needs to teach people why is so important to study but also they should facilitate ways to study to people, if schools were free, if they give more scholarships, society would have an important change. Society would be more cultured, people would have more education and a better income, as consequence, the government woudl receive more money and we woudl grow as a country. Families would be happier, they would have more amenities and more ways to succeed in life. Individuals would feel more competent and successful because they would have a better education.

column4: One thing that I would improve in my city is transportation, not only in the variety of ways of transportation but also about trafic. This would bring a lot of benefits for people of my age because they are in a moment of life where they need to move from a place to other to attend jobs,  colleges, home, apoiments, friends, etc. and without a good transportation system is difficult to do so. Also being in a city where trafic is a difficult situation to deal with, this makes life harder.  One reason for this would be a good improvement is because people of my age need to spend a lot of money in college. For example, if the person life alone, he or she has to spend money in food, public services, rent, books, health insurrance, cloth, and of course, transportation. So, if transportation system is good enough, people won't have the necessity to spend more than usual paying for two or more buses in one trip, or spending time they don't have in trafic.  This not only helps people to acomplish thier lives now, but also helps people to acomplish their lives in a long-term. column4: Young Adults that live in Rio de Janeiro are waiting for an improvement. In these days, Rio de Janeiro has one of the biggest Young Adults in Brazil. It happens because one time in the past was a capital and also is a great turistic place. People that came to the city thought that could be a good opportunity to live there and make money. The problem is that today the city is with a lot of people and car, making almost always the traffic so slow. There are two reasons that Rio de Janeiro should improve the traffic.The first reason, people have to work far from the home usually arrive. People don't usually lives near of the place that they work. Almost of always they usually waste more than thirty minutes in the traffic. This thing became worse when have a car acident, or in other words the traffic almost totally stop. In order to solve this problem they should encourage people that work in the same place go togheter . If have more people in just one car, It will be better for the traffic and the streets will be less dangerous.The second reason, people take a lot of time to get in the appointments. Figuring out if someone needs to go to emergency in the city how difficult it would be. For example, people mark an appointment in the Hospital and they have to get there on time, but the traffic could not be helpful. Being late in appointments will take time of the person that is going and the person that is waiting. To solve this problem could be good if the government creat more trem stations or buses stops, in order to incentive people go in a public transportation. In conclusion, the Young Adults in Rio de Janeiro are waiting for an improvement in the traffic. In the city there are a lot of cars, that is not bad if it can be a full car. All things will be faster and less dangerous.

column4: I live in a small town in China----Hanzhong, where doesn't have many job oppotunities for the people at my age. This is why I always hope that there will be some smart businessmen come to my hometown to change the situation by introducing some new business oppotunities or develop a new industry in there.       First, they can come to do some research on site and figure out the resources they would like to invest. For example, tourism is one of a great oppotunities for them, because we have the most natrual scenery resources for those who have lived in big cities with serious pollution for many years to come and get some fresh air and enjoy some wild animals tour which will be cheap and worthwhile both in distance and relaxing in a short term and spiritually rewarding in the long run.      Second,  I hope someone could come to my hometown to experience all kinds of delicious food that are as of specialities, they can register trade marks for them and  sell them to the whole world. Thus, it will not only solve the problem of employment for young people, but also very beneficial to the investers economically, which will also help the business running in a positive cycle for a long term.      Last but not least, the government should also pay some attention to the higher level education in my hometown. Those cities where have more colleges turned out most of them have a faster economy boost too.  Since college students are motivated by all kinds of creative ideas of living a more colourful life, they would try to participate different social activities to promote the consumption and this will also help to multipy the economic structure of the city. If the government could put more money to build universities in my hometown,  more children will be going to the college to study instead of going to a further city where they can't see their family very often. Moreover, it will introduce more higher education oppotunities for those don't want to go to a college in another city in a short term, but will enhance the stability of the society in the long run.      All in all, no matter what measures it will  be introduced to my hometown, it will be beneficial to the people there, and it is a double win both for the government and for the people at my age.

column3: Right ow I live with my family. My family is the best family in the world. It is composed by me, my mother, my father, my two sisters, and my brother. My mother is extremely kind, she's allways ready to help me or my siblins. If I'm hungry she would prepare me something to eat, I love that. My father is organized, sometimes serious, and super intelligent. He is like the police in the house, that means that if he say something, everyone will obey. Also, he is a lovely father, he cares about us and shows us his love for us. One of my sisters is 20 years old, her name is carolina, she studied at byu for one year. Righ now she is getting ready to go on a mission in Brazil. Because of that,  she is taking a break. My other sister, javiera, is 15 years old. She loves to create things. She is always drawing or painting, or creating new clothes for her. Also, she likes parties and loud music as me. Finally, my favourite. Dont't tell that to anyone. My little brother's name is Felipe. He is 11 years old and his likes are almost the same than mines. We get along really good. We play together and tell jokes toeach other. Even though we are all different, our family is higly united. We love to have family activities like going to the park, or going to the theatre to watch a movie. Living with them is the best, I hope to be able to stay with them for a long time.
column4: Santiago is a great city to live in. It has a lot of good universities and shopping places. Also, it has some funny places to go, for example,  it has a lot of cinemas, paint-ball fields, bowling  fields, swiming pools, ice skying fields, etc. Even though people may thing is perfect like this, there are a lot of things that can be improved, specially for people arround their twenties. Some examples of possible improvements are the transportation and job offers. A crucial fact in santiago is how do people move from one place to another.  Many people uses the public transporation such as the subway,buses, or micri-buses. Even though these are fast ways of transportation. Most people prefer to use their own cars. The main problem in santiago is that thre are to many cars and the streets aren't wide enough to sustain all of them. Because of that, traffic congestion is too high. If streets were wider or better organized, it would be much better for people that lives in santiago.Another  issue that has a lot of people concerned is job opportunities for young people.  It is extremely hard for students to have an apropiated job and study at the same time. For that reason people wait until they finish their studies to form a family.  In other places there are a lot of part-time jobs that allow students to work and study effectively. One of the reassons why there aren't to many jobs available is because there are a lot of grown people that have no studies and need easy jobs to sustain their families,. Because this people don't study they can work a hole schedule and not just part-time, wich is more convenient for those who contrat them. If big companies would think more about this, they would facilitate more part-time jobs for those who can't work all day. In conclusion, Santiago is a great place to live in, but it could be better. Some of the aspects in wich Santiago could be better are in transportation and work for people in their twenties. There are some ways to improve these aspects, but they are hard. It would require organization, sacrifice, and hard work.

column4: Universities in Mexico      One of the biggest problem in Mexico is the Universities. When you finish your high school you need to apply for University. The problem is that there are not a lot of universities. Every year 15,000 people don't have the opportunity to study in a Pubilc University. The goverment needs to improve this situation because if more young people have the opportunity to study, Mexico will be better. In this essay I will explain the effects like addictions and better country.      The first effect inmediate will be less adictions. Reciently I read about the origen of adictions. One of the experts did a experiment. The experiment was with rats, this were in boxes with two bottles one of them with watter and the other with watter and drugs. The rats drunk the second one. After this experiment the experts made a boxes with things for to do exercise. However, they put the same two bottles. The results were amazing. The rats who did exercise drunk always watter but the others how never did exercise they drunk watter with drugs. In other words, if we never do somethig, we could do bad things.     The second effect is the long-term, a better country. If Mexico make more Universities all the young people could be study and be profesionals. This mean more education, more oportunities and a better place. Mexico have a lot of products and opportunities. Mexico is a rich country. Just we need to study and raise our contry.     Finally I hope we thinking about this effects addictions and a better country. Mexico has the potential for to be a better country. Just everyone need to improve and work hard. I know that it's difficult but not impossible. We need to have faith and be strong. Now Mexico is not the best country but it can be.

column4: More activitiesIf there is something that would help my city, to be a better place to live, this absolutely is having more activities. Pinamar is a turistic place that every summer a lot of people from different places come to take summer vacations. Because this fact, how important for turist, community and especially young people need more activities for to do. There is tree main things that can approve this petition: family benefit, show a different interest for new people to come, and to motivate young people to enjoy their vacation.One of the factors that contribute to a summer vacation are activities in family. Having more actitivies as a family can help to create a better union between all the integrants. According to new statistics, Pinamar is the city that many families from different parts of Argentina, prefer to visit during summer vacations. Beautiful beaches with an amazing forest landscape are the perfect ellection to have peace and take rest. In fact, during the last 4 years more adults and retire people were the most people whose visited Pinamar. But, what about the youngest generation? I lived in Pinamar for my whole life I know that we need more activities.  I am very sure that this kind of activities will change the enviroment of Pinamar and will help families to enjoy their summer vacations in a better way. Families really need to have more fun and especially the youngest.Having new summer activities in Pinamar can show a different perpective of the things that this city can provided for its turits. One of my friends who visited Pinamar two years ago was looking for take vacation in the way to sleep the whole day. For sure, he got to have excellent vacations wihtout stress, but what about their kids. They were bored until they hated this city. New activities as public pools or games sponsored by biggest companies can be the solution for young generations. I know that bechaes can be fun but there are good materials to used for create new activities. In others cities around the cost of Argentina, people go for things that are natural and uncommon. This can be parties in the beach, sprots completaly free, or even public concerts.Following the suggestion before, new activities always will motivate the new generation. This modern and virtual world is prepared for things that kids and youngs to received another point of trate. For example, when I was more young, soccer was my passion. Just playing outside with frinds was the world to me. Now, maybe kids need something diferrent, and technology can contribute. I suggest that Pinamar should invest in activities where young people can enjoy and learn at the same time. For kids and yong people, summer vacation can represent the idea to be separated from school or the normal routine but they still can used this time to learn. Enjoying this vacation means more than do anything, I know that this kind of things will preapare people until they will back to their normal routine. If there is something that would help my city, to be a better place to live, this absolutely is having more activities. Pinamar is a turistic place that every summer a lot of people from different places come to take summer vacations. Because this fact, how important for turist, community and especially young people need more activities for to do. There is tree main things that can approve this petition: family benefit, show a different interest for new people to come, and to motivate young people to enjoy their vacation.

column4: How Make My City Better               The yougest people can impact the world. I served a LDS mission. When I was in this beautiful time I learned a lot about the diference that a guy can be around his self. I would like to share an experience. I meet a young woman ,and she was twenty one years old. She had a lot of problems and she just wanted to die ,but me and my companion started to visit her ,and supported her.  In a couple of months she had a big change because she felt peace. althoug we have a lot of things to do every day we can have this advices presents in our mind, for to help another people and make our city better.          In essence, be friendly. Maybe that sounds so simple ,but if you put attention to the other people when you smile to them, or just you said hello to them. You will see they reactions ,and that reactions always will be positives.  Because being friendly can help to other to be comfortables, we have to develop this skill. column3: There was a time when I lived with four roommates who were really messy. I hated that from the beginning, so I tried to talk to them and explain why it was annoying for me to live in a disaster. At first, it was fine for them but then it became a pain in the neck becuase they started to fight with me. They would always say that I was the one who was causing the desorder, and I would always get angry at them. For example, there was an ocassion in which they left town and left a lot of dishes in the kitchen. Then, when they got home, they found a bigger pile of dirty plates and cups, so it caused anger in them and they started yelling at me. That day I had to remember the principles I had been taught at home and I willingly washed the dishes without rolling my eyes or doing any other action I knew would make them even more mad. This situation was a learning experience for me in order to learn that, in life, there will always be people who do things that anger and dissapoint, but that everyone has weaknesses and we have to be willing to forgive others.
column4: There are many problems that people in a society have to face but most of them are related to the conditions in which they live in. Renovations of infrastructure would be an ideal change that would be beneficial for my city for satisfaction and sane interactions between people.            Bogota is the capital of Colombia, there people can find many fun activities to do in their leisure time such as going to the mall, cinema, or eating with family and friends. However, when a person has free time he wants to take advantage of it and don't waste it, and the many holes on the freeway that he finds don't allow him to be on time to wherever place he wants to go to. There have been many situations in which people get stuck  inside a huge hole and have delayed due to their situations, so many have complained about this issue because it has affected a large amount of individuals in the city, and at the same time, they have blamed the government.             Additionally, there are many people who have experienced a discussion with those around them. This happens because many places are damaged and that causes disturbance among people in a same atmosphere. For example, there have been many times when the boss of a company traps with the edge of the carpet that is too old and it has to be replaced. That causes him to change his mood in a way that is not positive for neither himself nor for the employees. Companies have discussed this negative subject and have concluded that this is the government's fault.             In conclusion, these matters cause many negative consequences which affect individuals and communities that are trying to maintain a positive environment for themselves and others, but that the fails in the infrastructure don't permit them to do so. Renovations of infrastructure would solve many problems that the city faces so many times. People would have a better attitude and would have more sane interactions with everyone else.

column4: One of the changes that could really benefit the youth now and the nation in the future is to invest more in education. Two aproaches need to be used; to build more public universities and lower the studAt first, building more public colleges will facilitate the for the youth to be more prepared fot the market work. Brazil in general has one of the most high taxes in the entire world. The government justufy tose taxes saying that all the basic need are provided by the government such as health, education from basic to high, endurance and leisure time. Those arguments are not completely laying; however, the practice proves to be different. Since the public services are not good or have quality, whoever wants better things have to pay twice. Everybody has astromical expenses in daily life. With the youth is not different, having parents that can not afford for a better education and not earning a good amount of money themselves, a lot of them cannot go to Universities. In my city we have being competing for the same spots in public Universities that our parents were competing in the past. The great difference is that we now are almost the double of the amount of young people. The particular Universities are extremelly expensive, just high middle class to rich can afford most of them. Hence, building more public universities, one of the things that still considered really good in Brazil bacause what is said is that public university has the best education and the best students,  will help more of those young people to have access to superior education.Sencondly, still regarding education, diminish the taxes for student loans would give them what they need to start their projects in life. Even if the government build more public universities in my city, the gap between the number of young applicants and the number of spots is already so big that will be impossible absorve all of them. Many would have still to apply for private education. One of the ways that could help those studens of not being marginalized, dennying them the right of education, could be the student loans. With lower taxes and more time to pay for them, these young people could apply for a private education and do not be in great dept to start their professional life. They will be able to pay the loan while starting some of their personal projects such as buing a house, buing their own car, having a family or even starting a personal business. Having opportunity of education but go on a great dept because of that will help much a person's future, so lower that taxes for students loans and give them more time to pay for would be a great help. The economy also will be benefited for more qualified people working for the country, it is going to be the pay back for those loans. Concluding, education is what can change a nation life. Investiments in education will not just help the youth but also the entire country. And in the long term, the economy will grow. The econonomic grouth is the main goal of every nation.

column4: There is a improvement that would make my city a better place to live for people my age than before.  Korea is small country, but there is a lot of people who live in the city Seoul, so it is very complicated when we move. However, my city has a very convinient transportaion, and this make my city a better placeto live for people in my age for several reasons.          First, it helps many young people to move. In Korea, cars are expensive to byu to young people, so many young people do not have a car. However, we have convinient transportation, such as buses, subways, and taxies. They helps many young people when they move. The buses and the subways are available until the midnight, so it is very helpful to young people when they cannot afford to buy a car.          Second, it helps when we are in a rush hour. When we are in the rush hours, this convinient transportation help us to go faster than cars. Korea is a small country, but there are a lot of people who live in the city. Therefore, when we are in the rush hours, it will take long time to go somewhere. However, if we use subway or buses, we can go faster than when we use a car. There is a lane that is just allowed to bus, so other cars cannot use that lane. This makes buses to go faster than other cars. Also subways always work regulary, so we do not have to worry if we late or not.            In conclusion, the transprotation make my city  a better place to live for my age because we do not have a car, but we can still use our transportation. Also it helps to us not to late when we are in rush hours.

column4: Improvements are essential for a city to enhance people's living qualities. If people do something positively, they will change the situation of their cities. In my point of view, my city will be a better place if people in my age change their lifestyles, such as reading more books, working hard at school and doing more exercises.To begin with, reading books is necessary to people in my age. Nowadays, more and more people play with their phones for all the time, rather than reading a book and learning more knowledge from books. For example, my friends always stay up late playing with their phones. Some of them play games on phones, and some of them text with their friends. In face, they do have books in front of their beds, but there are lots of dusts on books. They think that it is time to play, rather than reading books. In this way, many people in my age lose some knowledge about lives and virtues, which can be read and obtained in books. If they choose to read books, even though just an hour before going to bed, they will change their minds gradually. They will gain more knowledge day by day.Secondly, working hard is always a way for people to be successful. However, some people in my age think that their parents can help them forever, so they do not need to work hard. For example, I met a girl in my high school, who paid much attention on how to make up everyday in the morning. In this way, she was always late for class. Furthermore, she never did her homework, since she thought homework was useless to her. She thought that her parents could help her all the time. With some people who do not work hard, more and more people will lower their qualities of lives in the future. Working hard can let people obtain a successful future, or they will lose their ways. Thirdly, with high pressures living in my city, people need to do exercises regularly. If people in my age choose to do exercises after school, they will not feel stressful and tired for all the time. Also, it will help them complain less than before. For example, all my friends who study in America tend to go to the gym after class. Most of them think that because they did not do exercises previously, they complained about the hard work for all the time. Nonetheless, with working out, they adjust the metabolism step by step and live in a health lives. If more people in my city choose to work out after school or work, they will live in a positive and healthy life.In conclusion, if people in my age work harder, read more books in the rest of a day, and do more exercises in the gym, they will obtain many benefits from it. According to the changes of their lifestyles, they will influence more people who are older or younger than them. Gradually, my city will be a better place changing by people's behaviors and lifestyles.

column4: I live in Bogota, Colombia a very big and crowded city. One improvement I would make to my city in order to become a better place to live not only for people of my age but to everyone would be the transportation. Why? Because for people of my age that are studying in college, we usually need to wake up earlier than we should because of this problem. So I think I would implement a special bus for students that are going to collegue,  in order for this to work I think that we would implement a schedule for students depending on what collegue they are attending and how much time will it take to get there. For the people that work or that are not studying in collegue I would  like to start the construction of a train so we can have different ways of transportation. Right now we have what is called 'Transmilenio' and it is very helpful but it usually is one of the most crowded places to travel. Also we have the what is called 'SITP' that are regular buses and we have 'Taxis' but they're really expensive and for a city as big as Bogota it's not helpful because there is too much traffic. We already have what is called 'Pico y Placa' and it consists in that people that own a car depeding on the day, they will only have permission to transport or use it from 8:30 am to 3:00 pm and from 7:30 pm to the end of the day. This method has been helpful but is not enough, that's why I think we need to implement buses and train transportation in order to improve my city and to make it a better place for everyone.In conclusion I think that by making these improvements and if all of the citizens agree with this, it would so much easier and it would have a great impact in the city,  we all want what is best for the city and of course for the country.

column4: My name is Mauricio and I am from Mexico City and let me tell you something, Mexico city needs more than one improvement so it can be a better place to live.First of all I have to tell you that my city is full of interesting places like museums and beatiful parks and even there's a huge zoo, but one of the biggest problems is the public transpotation. The problem relies on the bad habits of people they are not used to keep the things clean or even deposit the trash in the right place and I think that part of the reason of that it's because usually there aren't many places where to put the trash in.I'm twenty years old and I don't have a girlfriend but it I had one I would like to take her into some romantic place near to the city and that's something that I would changed of my city we need better places to spend time with our loved ones.Another problem is the insecutrity, people lie with fear because it's really common to be robbed one in a month, every one would benefit if the security and the police was better.For example, one time I was going to school, it was 6 in the morning and I took a bus so I could get there faster, then a huge guy came and he started yielling all the passengers and he said 'give me everthin you have and if you do so I won't hurt you'.  I was scared that was the very first time I was being robbed. I prayed and he took our stuff and then he left the bus. I was really gratefull with my Heavenly Father because he had a gun and he was ready to use it. Nobody was hurt that day but everyday in Mexico city there are people having the same experiences and sometimes they don't have the same luck as me.Also public education it's not good at all, teachers don't care about students and that affects the way kids grow up, that make students decide to stop studying because they don't feel interest about school and bad teachers. Although not everything is good in my city I've learned to live with it and my parents have taught me how to deal with this situation.Hundrends of years ago the catholic church took control of everything in the country, they taught people to fear God, but eventually people stopped following God's commandments, and they became wicked, now the church of Jesuschrist is established in Mexico in it has helped me to learn and become a great man one of the things that I'd like to change in my city is the way people reject Lds missionaries if people listened more to their message their lifes would improve so much that they would never be the same.That would benefit not only my genaration but also the genereations to come, I know it because I've seen it in my life and I saw miracles by the hand of God so I know that the more people obey God the more they progress.Even when my city is not perfect I love it because despite every bad thing there, it's a beatiful place to live and know.

column3: My Roommates     In the past I lived with so many people, beacuse I left my home when I was eighteen, so I have a lot of experience. column4: New Changes in My City     My country, Uruguay, is a small place in South America. Is one of the smallest places in my the continent, and also is very different in comparasion with another  latin coultures. Uruguay is charaterizared for to have italian traditions and for to have more old poblation than younger. Some of them are moving to another countries, because Uruguay do not have many oportunities for them.  Because of that, would be better if the government do some changes.    One important change for my country would be improve the education. The young people need more motivation in the school. Today in day, the education is not advanced, and many students are dropping school because they do not feel motivation. The schools need more practices and less theory.       The salaries are lowing every year, specialy in young pople. Many of them needs to work while they are studying, and some times, they drop the shcool for to work. If the government offer plans for students, or reduce the taxes to companies that hire students, would be a better country for the students. Also with this, the country can improve the economy and earn more professional people.     Uruguay needs more fun. Is a quiet country, made for old people. We have a lot of beaches and fields, but is not enough for the young people. The country needs more fun places, not like pubs or danger places, but places for to be with friends, or for example, places when you can listen to music or to see theatre with family or friends. Another good idea is to have talent shows when all the coutry can participate. I like this idea because we are only three million people and it is possible.       Many students need aid for to continue stuying.  Some of them lives in the field, far away to the city. Only in Montevideo, the capital of the country there is the university. Is impossible for many students to travel for to study. So a good idea is, to build other universities in differents parts of the country, for example in the north, when there are poor people and less education.      In the current days, the language is very important. Uruguay, have border with only two countrys, one of them is Brazil. We have many bussines with that country and is important for the students to learn portuguese. Some private schools offer this benefit, but will be awesome if the public schools start to teach portuguese for all the students. All the schools teachs english as a second language, but the quality is bad. If all the schools improve the english level, the students could be a better oportunities to get a better job and study more. I can not imagine my country with this!     The Uruguayan govern is very liberal. I think that we need more publicities for to help the young people to stop to smoking tobacco and marihuana. Also the alcohol is very popular and many accidents in the streets happen because the people is drunk. If we have more publicity and the price of those products are high, probably the people can stop to drink and smoke.     All of these changes I think are good for to imrpve my country and for to help the young people to stay in the country. Uruguay is a amazing place for to live, but if the government do this staff, will be a better country for all the people.

column4: I think there is on main problem with my city, the city of Montevideo, and that is: security. Starting with security, the city has had a significant increase in violence in the last 4 years and it keeps being ignored by the goverment despite the fact that most polls show that it has increased by nearly 30% and arround 90% of the people living there agree that they don't feel safe anymore. The improvement proposed by Lacalle Pou, a politician who was running for office last election but lost, was that goverment should stop giving money to people that is on goverment programs and dedicate that money to build more jails and improve the police force. His proposal is very logical, population is growing and so is crime, we can't expect that the jails will hold as many criminals now when they where built in a time that crime was the lowest. And while I think his proposal will help a lot, I don't think it's enough. One more thing that I would add to that is to stop restricting the police force when they are dealing with criminals, for example, there was an implemented law in 2013 that prohibited policeman from shooting an armed threat even if he was aiming the gun at them or at a civilian. There are many more examples about how the law in Uruguay protects the criminal more than the law abidding citizens including police officers, who are out there risking getting shot every day by these people.If both of these politics should happen to be implemented I think the change would be immediate, when criminals think they can get away with almost anything that encourages them to continue with that lifestyle and when they get beneficts from the goverment because they don't have a job they are not going to go out there and get a job and help the economy. By cutting these benefits, improving the prisons and helping police officers to apply the law in a way that will benefit the law abiding citizen you send a message to criminals that the people of this country won't put up with crime anymore.

column4: I currently live in Provo, hence, I'll write of the things that could be improved here, at least in my hunble opinion.The first thing I noticed to be missing is the infrastructure. Some people do not own a car and it would be great to be independant and go places by bus or train. Having more frequent buses would be beneficial in many ways. The valey would be cleaner because of less air polution. Being able to hop on a bus instead of driving your own car would save the trees (that are so hard to grow in a desert).Secondly, the ability to read or simply relax in a bus would benefit the students health as well. I hear people complaining about crazy Provo drivers and I think this crazyness comes partially because of all those young students who are in a hurry: in a hurry to get to their class, to that date or even to eat lunch. Many get tired after their studies and work, and therefore not really able to think that there are other hurriers.Continuing about the improvement of infrastuckture, I think more bus stops need to have these little glass houses to protect the people from rain and sun. Having a clearly marked bus stop would be also great to avoid missing your bus stop. A soft recorded voice that anounces the current and the upcomming bus stops name in the bus would be also of great help in this regard.Another aspect of the improved infrastruckture, in my opinion, and I dare to say inopinion of many local people my age, would be having bike roads. It would safe the headacke to both: the drivers of vehickles and the drivers of bikes. It would also promote healthy life style by helping people have at least some work out while going to/from school or work.By increasing the numbers and routes of buses, marking the bus stops and making them more people frienly, and having bike roads, the students in Provo would be healthier and happier students. I also think it would make Provo streets safer, because the tired and hungry students, and even the eldery people of Provo, would be prone to ride buses or bike on the seperatelly for them made roads.

column3: There are 4 people living in my apartment including myself. I am roomates with Dani, Sara, and Emily. They are very different from each other. column4: Mexico city is one of the biggest cities in the world. Even though Mexico City is a great place to live for young people, having better and cheaper ways of transportation would make it an even better place to live. Mexico city has three main public transportation such as, bus, taxi, and metro. However, the two most used in my comunity are buses and taxis.Although there are many bus routes through out the city, my comunity only has a few since it is a residential area. Most people have their own car, so there is a lot of traffic every day and at every hour. For example, if people in my city had access to a bigger diversity of routes, most people would use public transportantion rather than driving one car per person. This would reduce traffic and pollution significantly.Another way to make my city a better place for young people to live, is having the public transportation's prices more affordable. For example, there could be especial prices for students if they presented their student ID. Cheap prices would encourage students to use buses rather than their cars. Therefore, the time spent in traffic would be dramatically reduced, and people could use that time in many other ways.To sum up, there are two ways to make my city a better place to live. The first one is having more routes and schedules available for public transportation. The second one is to have more affordable prices for students in order to incentivate the use of buses rather than cars. I recommend that the Mexican government consider how much time the citizens waste on traffic, and think of how much happier Mexicans could be if they had more time available to do other things they like.

column4: Countries around the world are worried about their citizens in differents areas on their life, like education, jobs,  recreational activities, health etc. Those areas are really important for them because allowed people to have a better life style. In my city there are some things in one are that it need to improve in order to have better recreational places for young people and families. A good city to live shuold have, green areas, places for sports and theathers.        One improvement for my city is that It need more green places. Most of the people around the world really enjoy outdoor activities, usually due to the strees that came from offices, stressfull jobs or sometimes just cities. If one city does not have enough green places people will be more stressfull because they will feel that everything around them is just grey and with concrete. In my citi there are not too much green places, like parks or places like those, so I can see how people get really stress about that. column4: I come form Nanjing, a big city which is located in east of China. As a huge city with more than 80 millon population, pollution is the biggest problem in Nanjing. Our government tried many ways to reduce the emossion, but all these strategies affected little. We still suffered from heavily smog.  For this reason, I will try my best to find a way to improve the air quility in my city, help people breathe clean air. I will call people pay more attention on environment. The best way I will to do is calling public to plant as many as trees.    Trees can absorb CO2 and other kinds of green house gases. CO2 and other kinds of green house gases are the main harmful materials which compose smog. If we have enough trees and grassland, plants will reduce pollution and clean air. On the other hand, trees and other kinds of green plants can docrate our city and relex stress atmospher in one city.  For example, the central park in New York is called green lung, and it is a very famous place to live. Many arts,  writers, and drawers express their feelings about the famous park. Many of them say that we should earn money at first then zero in on environment. If I call they to give up short-term benefits, many of them will struggle with me. But for long-term, for example, 20 or 50 years later,  when the trees grow up, we will have forests and woods. And the most benefit is our air quilty becoming better and better. All persons in my city will get offer form these plants.This is my main duty to make my city better, I will try my best to call people focuse on environment and plant enough trees.

column3: As I was growing up, I had the blessing of living with my entire family. As a kid, I did not understand that it was a huge opportunity that God had given me to learn how to become a better person, because I am the youngest of five, so all of my siblings and parents had more experience than me.I have two brothers and two sisters, all of them are very different from each other but it works somehow. I feel like our personalities complement each other because every one of us have something that the other one does not have. For example, my older sister is very responsible, and that is something that I lack, so she helps me to fulfill my duties and responsibilities.I am the tallest of all of my direct family members. My sister that comes right after me is the shortest. I wouls say that she is my best friend, because we have this connection that is very hard to describe. We always laugh at the same things, we like to do similar things and we love spending time together.I would say that my oldest brother is the most intelligent member of our family. I just don't understand how he understands everything so quickly! I wish I could be like him. He is getting his MBA here at BYU this month.My other brother is the most innocent of all of us, he is always looking for opportunities to make people feel good and serve them. And, as I said before, since we are all very different from each other, I do not have that gift of selfless service, so this is something that I need to learn from him. He is currently living in Chile and he is on his final semester at college.
column4: I am from Chile, specifically from Santiago, the capital of the country. It is a great city to live in, I would say that we have everything we need in order to have a comfortable life, but just like everything else, improvements are always necessary to keep improving our life quality and the quality of the city. One of the things that would be benefitial for the people in Santiago is more subway lines. We currently have five lines that cover some of the most important parts of the city, but there are other areas that need this technological invention in order to be fully connected with the rest of the city.I say this because there are many people who live at least an hour away from their jobs, so they need to leave home very early in the morning (at 6 AM most of the time) in order to arrive at their workplaces on time. There has been a couple social movements to promote the implementation of a new subway line, but the city government has not listened yet.In addition, the subway trains are not as harmful to the environment as the buses that are currently transporting people in the city. Santiago is one of the most polluted cities in South America, and this has happened because some people have not had the vision of how the city can be in the future if they do not contribute with simple and clean habits, but this also has happened because of the pollution that cars and buses produce, so less buses and more subway trains would be an ideal solution for this ongoing problem.Also, when people go from one place to another using the subway, they do not need to worry about their money, because they just need to pay once and they can travel as much as they want as long as they do not get out of the subway domains. In other words, they can make connections with other subway lines, go to the opposite direction, etc. Nevertheless, when they use buses, their bus ticket is only valid for one hour after they used it, so if their usual trip takes more than an hour and they need to take a second bus, they have to pay two tickets for traveling just once.In conclusion, more subway lines would be ideal for Santiago to keep growing and become a developed city soon, because even though it is already a great city to live in, this change would impulse it to be for sure the best city in South America.

column4: Having the opportunity of visiting my country after living for some time in the US gave me a different perspective about events. People living in a country for years get used to the service that their community offers. Costumer service is different in every country and it is also based on the culture. Culture can decrease or increase the level of kidness and education that costumer service should have. This specific field is the one that needs to be helped in order to increase the marketing for Ecuador and also to challenge the current society for the future.When tourists visit different places they expect to feel different and learn. Kindness is the door that opens opportunities. When people who work at stores or restaurants will treat the clients as they were the only costumers, they will feel different. Nowadays, one wants to be treated well and respected, but if they do not receive that, they will not answer as well. Definetly, if Ecuador would increase and apply a better costumer service, they will be able to increase the tourism, production and marketing.With a better costumer service, Ecuador will be able to prepare its society for the future. When someone receive something great, they want to give something great. With this new tradition in the country, they will now exactly what they want. The same will happen when Ecuador as one society change their costumer service, because it will lead to future changes. Thus, when someone will be treated with amability and kindness, they will want to share it and this is how it will progressively change future generations.In conclusion,  Ecuador will be better if some traditions stay in the past. Costumer service is a weakness of this country and if it is improven it will lead to many future changes. The society needs this example to grow and improve for the future. When the time comes that those aspects will be improved, Ecuador will turn into a better country which will challenge future generations as well.

column3: I live with my family. Me, my mom and my step father. We live in the little town by the Provo.  We all have different schedules of work and school. For example, I study from morning to afternoon. Also, I work from evening to late night. I work at the BYU police department that is why I have late work. My mom's schedule is different than mine. She usually at home. My step father works from morning to evening. My step father works at the hospital. Therefore, I do not see him often. column4: One of the main problems that my city have is coraption and buracrasy.  All the taxes that we pay goes to not right place. The taxes goes to the poket of the mayor of the city.  Also, they use it not in the good way. Usually, they spend the money of the people for their personal needs.  I would opine that if the coraption and buracresy would stop, my city and country would have better life.  First of all, if those people would stop taking taxes and using them in their needs, we would have better schools. Many schools in my town are old. Some of them builded in the USSR time. It was long time ago when they had good recunstraction. Most of them soon will fall of.  If the taxes was used coreactly, we would had a lot of new schools. Also, the money for the need of the school comes from the students of the school. Each year they gather money for the fixment of the school from the students. This money not comes from the goverment or from the taxes.  Also, nobody knows why there is not enoght taxes to support the schools.   It is not only a problem that could be solved without coraption. One of the main problems is hospitals. column4: Santiago is a big city and is one of the most modern cities in South America. It has in comparation with other cities a good public transportation where the subway is very clean and used for most of the people there. Even though the publuc transportation has many advantages it has a few disadvantages that could be improved and would make big differences in the lifes of many people, especially young people that have to take the bus and the metro to get to ther universities on time.     Every morning it is a challenge to get in the bus. Most universities have their classes in the morning and when many people want to get in the same bus it is very difficult to do it. Not only college students need to take the bus, but also many people going to their jobs need to take the bus as well.      When during the day going from one part of the city to another take more than one hour , in the morning that time is twice the normal time. For college students it is very hard to spend two hours in a bus to get to the university. They have to study and doing so in a bus it is very hard or impossible. One of the causes to this problem is that there are not exclusive streets just for buses.  When many people are trying to get on time to the city center they take taxis, buses, their own cars and the traffic is terrible every day.       One solution would be to build exclusive ways where cars are not allow. By doing that the traffic would not be terrible and people would be able to sleep more, have enough time to eat breakfast in the morning, spend more time with their families, not be stress for taking the bus on time to get on time to their jobs or university and if this happen it would be benefitial for everybody making possible to more people use the public transportation and not use their cars which would cause to have less pollution in the city in people would be able to enjoy of the mountains most of the time are cover by smog.    People in my city are expecting to have this changes. having one or two extra hours per day to enjoy doing other things instead of waiting for the bus on traveling in the bus would help the citizen to be happier and be less stress. Building exclusive ways just for public transportation is a big change that the city of Santiago needs to have.

column4: Before moving to Provo, I lived in Kiev which is the capital of Ukraine. It is a beautiful city with many parks, rivers, museums, schools, restaurants, etc. There is also a great quantity of historic places and streets with ancient European architecture. It is a pleasure to live in Kiev. However, there is one thing that needs improvement, and I believe that young people living in this city will benefit from it. I think that there should be more sport stadiums and recreational places in Kiev.There are many families with young children living in different areas of Kiev. However, there are some parts of the city that don't have any places for sports at all. I believe that all children should be involved in some sport activities, as it can help them to maintain a strong character and healthy habits. There should be more  soccer stadiums in areas near the public shools, which most of the children attend. Soccer is the most popular sport in Ukraine, and the majority of people enjoy not only watching, but also playing it. Many parents would be very glad to have their children learn how to play the sport that everyone in the country loves.Another important reason to build more facilities for recreational activities is that the youth has nowhere to go to during the free time after school. Young people prefer to either stay at home or just walk around the streets, spend a lot of money on restaurants, or even clubs. If there were more places to go to, have fun, and develop different skills, the youth would go and spend time there. I strongly believe that there should be more places like that in order for the youth to be healthy and educated. Finally, having many places to do sports or recreational activities helps families to spend more time together and maintain trustful and friendly relationship. It is also a good way for the city to enter a higher level of prestige. As one can see, building new facilities for sports and recreation can help the city in many useful ways.

column4: I would improve the public transportation in my city. People from outside of our city, and the citizens they ask for and this is something that they need to improve, the public transportation. In Brazil, our taxes are one of the highest in all the Latina America, and there are a lot of families who prefer have some food at home than spend their money in cars or motocycles. Given this, citizens in my city have to use public transportation a lot because of the taxes; there are not another way to go to work, not even train or subway; and buses are always too full in certain times of the day.First of all, one of the problems in Brazil is the taxes. Our government ask for high taxes for small or medium companies and the big ones normally have lower taxes. If we think about what they are doing it is terrible because they are taking money from people that do not receive high weight and they are ask to pay more taxes. For this reason, my city have more and more people using public transportation because it is hard to keep some money with high taxes.  Also, pay taxes it is important for the improvement of the city, but they normally use this money with unnecessary things like paint streets, or bus stops.Second, when employees are starting to work, most of the time they need to use public transportation to go to work. It is very rough sometimes because when you need or have to get out of the bus and there is a bunch of people between you and the door it is a streeful day. Some people smell really bad in the morning, I do not know why they do not take shower or clean themselves because when you get in on a bus it is impossible not to smell such odor. Also, my city do not have train or subway yet, so people need to use buses most of the time.Third, my city still planning to build a subway to make our lives better. However, they do not strat all the process yet, so we basically need to wait for it. Until there we use our friends ride, or buses to get to work, and there are some times of the day which the buses are completely full of people, and they smell really bad. So, when we need to take the bus it is a sacrifice to go in, but not as India or africans buses are. There is one thing which I just cannot understand which is that we do have a bunch of buses, and there stopped or parked. For me thi do not make any sense. Many people need buses to get to their work or even to come back, and they still need to wait for at least 20 minutes or an hour until the next bus passes by.In conclusion, if I could improve something in my city I would opine about the public transportation because it is a bad quality, and many people need to use it.  Some of the reasons that I chose this topic was to talk about three important points: citizens in my city have to use public transportation a lot because of the taxes; there are not another way to go to work, not even train or subway; and buses are always too full in certain times of the day.
