column3: In my country I lived with my family that is composed of my father, my mother, and my sister. Then, I went to the United States when I was 17 years old to study and improve my English. Since Fall semester 2016, I live in an apartment that I share with three other girls. They are older than me, and two of them are sisters and the owner's daughters. These sisters, Hannah and Delaney, are Polynesian, they are very nice and very messy, they lived their dishes everywhere and didn't wash them. I think hat it is because it is their apartment but if they rent it they should take care of respect other girls. Hannah and Delaney study at BYU to become nurse. The last girl, Jane, is a super nice girl too. She also studies mathematics at BYU. She is very intelligent and very busy. However, when we saw each other we talk like we just saw the other yesterday. i love Jane, sheis like my sister. In addition, my sister who came back from her mission in December 2016 love her too. They speak Japanese together and we love make plans together. Last Sunday we asked a friend to take pictures of Jane, my sister Lindsay, and me. It is great souvenirs tht I want to keep before move to Idaho. It was a great experience for me because I had never lived in an apartment with people that I don't know before. My first experience was a good one, now I enjoy and I'm a little it stress about meet my five other roomates in BYU Idaho. I think and I hope that it will be a super experience as it was these two semesters.
column4: I'm from Tahiti, it is an tropical island in the Pacific Ocean in French Polynesia. Furthermore, my country is an island, it is very small. People there like to do fishing, surfing, singing, dancing, or just be on town with friends. However, teenagers and young adults don't really have place to have fun. In Tahiti we have like little attractions but most of them are for children. I think that an improvement that would make my city a better place to live is to have a attraction park.First, create an attraction park will permite people of my age to have fun. Many of them don't know what they can do of their journey. They have two choices: first, go back to their home where, in most of cases, their parents drink and hit their children; and the other solution is to stay sit next to the road with friends and smoke, drink or thing like that. Most of them prefer to be outside with their friends, but they are still nothing to do, so, they do things that is illegal, such as make tags or fight with other people. Have an attraction park can permite them to always have to do something. In addition, it will create good place to go with their boyfriend or girlfriend. Second, it will change from little attraction that we had since many years. People are bore of them, they tried to go with friend but all, or most, of the attractions are for children. I remember that don't have an attraction park missed me a lot when I was in Tahiti. Also, it wasn't just me, my sister, our friends, and other person in our Middle and High School had the same feelings. Because of travels, we were able to know what is an attraction park such as in France or United States or New Zealand. Attraction parks make people happy, they forget their problems and it is just like if they entered in a new world.To conclude, I think that create an attraction park in my country can be an improvement that would make my city a better place to live for all kind of people. It will create jobs, and also a place to relax, play and enjoy with friends or family. People need to take some rest, they can't work witout break or they will be depressing. Attraction park is a new world that create dreams and forget problems. In addition, people will be able to work better, and have more ideas.

column4: Tantoyuca Veracruz City Change        Tantoyuca Veracruz has been a great city since long time ago, due its weather, people, culture, and some things more.     However, there have been some challenges with young people, especially 20-25 years old, that's why I would like to talk about three things that could benefit those young people, especially with their studies. Transportation, Computers and a good place to live in.     There have been a lot of challenges with the transportation due a lot of students doesn't have cars, motorcycles, bicycles or something like that, it would be great idea if the goverment provide them at least a bicycle to each student so they can have the oportunity to go faster wherever they need to go. It would also be better if the students aggre to take care of those bicycles. It would be amazing if the goverment help them with those resources.     I have met many students who do not have computers to do their homework and they need to go to stores to rent computers, they spend money, time and almost always it is tired. That's why I have tought that woulg be great if the goverment make an idea to help them to provide students access to a computer without spend money and waste a lot of time. For example the goverment could create a computer center where each student can have access with their ID student, and in this way students would have a easier life.    Another challenge that I have seen is the students housing. A lot of students do not live in a good place, many students live with strangers due it is cheaper for the students because the landlords ask less money than others and sometimes it is complicate because it is difficult for them to do not have problems with their landlords. Many students need to walk a long time due where they live is far away from their school. It would be a spectacular idea if the goverment or somebody else start a construction close to the university which have enough buildings so each student can live in.       I think doing those things the comunnity will love more to the goverment. In conclusion, I think if those things happen, the students life and the students' parents life will be happier, easier and more comfortable.

column3: Right now i am lviving with a Venezuelan girl. She has been my roomate since I came to the United States, and we became best friends. She has dark hair  and skin. Also, she is short but has a well proportionated body. We are opposite physically and also in our personality, but we complete each other which makes our relationship very strong. My roomate really enjoys to dance. It is one of her favorite things to do on weekends. Although she hates working, she worked most of the year. column4: My country due to its small size does not have many universities. Some are Public and others are private. Public universities are free, and private universities are not as expensive as universities in the United States. However, students are not very encouraged to attend university, and it is univerities responsability to change that. This essay will state some of the problems to Uruguay's universities. First, they are all located in the same area. Students all around the city have to travel to the center of the city to go to shcool. Although Montevideo is not a big city, sometimes this journey takes more than 2 hours due to the traffic because everyone is headed to the same place. If universities could have more scattered centers around the city, the traffic would not be so stuck and students would not have to travell for so long. Second, public and private universities do not offer the same majors. Due to the economy in Uruguay, public universities cannot afford to offer some of the most expensive majors. Therefore, students have to change their majors or go to a private university.  For instance, those students that want to study graphic design cannot do it in a public university, so they have to go to a private one and pay significant amounts of money. Third, universities do not have many extra curricular activities. As mentioned before, Uruguay's univerities do not have enough money to build soccer fields, indoor pools, or to form teams of any kind of sport. Consequently, students who are interested in playing  sports have to attend a normal gym that could be really expensive. This is discouraging for students especially because excersising is becoming more and more important in the country's culture. To conclude, Uruguay has many problems with it's universities. They are not located in a convenient way for students. Also, public and private universities do not offer the same majors which is unfair for students. Finally, universties do not have sports teams. If all these aspects could be changed, students would be encouraged to go to school, and they would be happier with what the country has to offer to young people.

So, pollution has been increasing and increasing. Many of people is suffering by the toxic gases that are given by the fabriques and old cars, which many of them are broken. Good industries in specific places tried to fix it, they used different ways to do it but it didn't work at all. So, many people started to moved on but the air was also contaminated. And about cars, many companies which sell cars tried to have good prices to get new cars. So they tried to stop the use of old cars that used to contamined the air but people prefer to be with their old and broken cars. So, it didn't work neither.One of many solutions that law department should make is create a law that all of the fabriques and industries must be far away of the city, and they also have to make another law that can't allow the use of cars which are broken. At the beggining it will be hard because a lot of people love to be inside their cars and if industries and fabriques are located far away, people wouldn't like to go so far away from their homes to their jobs but as I saw in other countries like Dutch, a lot of people prefer to use bike instead cars. column3: My family is the most important people I have. For me, living with them was the best thing that could ever happen to me. I have two younger sisters, Andrea is 25 years old, she is engaged. Jimena is 20 years old, she is studying business and marketing. They are my favourite roommates in the world. I always say to them that they are my heart and soul. I live for them, and I will die for them. Andrea is the best friend I have. She gives me courage to do the things I'm scared of doing. That's why I ook up to her. Andrea is tall and chubby, she had overweight in the past, but she has lost a lot of weight in the last year. She has long straight dark black hair, small and happy eyes, and a small mouth. She loves watching movies and TV series like How I met your mother. That's her favourite show. She and her fiance have their own restaurant and they have started working in there last month. Her schedule now is complicated, they work since noon to midnight, but they have to prepare things in advance before opening the restaurant, so they are never home.Jimena is the happiest girl I know. She is always positive and looking for the bright side of the problems. She is short, with long curly black hair. She has big eyes and the most beautiful smile I have ever seen. She teaches me the importance of faith, of putting others before me. Even though she is the smallest at my house, I like to believe that she is the wisest also. But she is persistent and smart, I know she will do anything she wants to accomplish in her life.
column4: Lima is the biggest and most populated city in Peru. Almost all the companies in the country have their main offices in Lima. Therefore, it is always crowded and with heavy traffic. Our transportation system is not working right. To be completely honest, we don't have a transportation system that works at all. In Lima it takes a very long time to get from one place to the other. For this reason, transportation is one biggest improvement that I think would make my city a better place to live for people my age. I would implement a new transportation system to connect the city, reducing the necessity of having so many cars.People my age are usually full-time workers. This means they have to go to their offices every single day. Some of them have field work, which means they have to move around the city a lot. Transportation in Lima is so complicated that it can take you half an hour to get from one district to the other, even if you are going 10 blocks away. It is very complicated to drive in the traffic of Lima. Walking is sometimes faster, but some distances are so far apart that walking is not an option. Riding a bike should be a good option, however, peruvian drivers do not respect the rules, so it is very dangerous to ride a bike in Lima. Therefore, I would implement a new transportation system with a network of metro, trains and buses that will connect the city. This will allow people to movilize from one place to another and reduce traffic because less people will require to drive their own cars to get where they need to go. They will be able to take the train, bus or metro and they wouldn't have the concern of having to think about where to park. An underground transportation system could release the amount of traffic in the city and since that costs less than paying for car loans, gas, oil, and any other things cars need. It may also help people save some money. Another benefit of developing a new transportation system is that the city's pollution could be reduced drastically. Nowadays, Lima is known for its grey sky without stars. You can never see stars in Lima, not even during a blackout. The air is so polluted that Lima has the highest amount of people with breathing problems like asthma. There are some days when you cannot look more than 10 blocks aways, because the air is so dense that it does not allow you to look further. Developing a transportation system, specially if it includes metro, trains, and buses, will decrease the need of having to own a car to be able to movilize where you need to go. Which means that less cars will be driven around the city. Diminishing the amount of cars being driven affects directly the environment and reduces the amount of smog in the air. Probably, in a short term, the changes wouldn't see as significant. However, in the long term, the city could have a clear air, and a better quality of life for it citizens. Since the world is being more and more polluted every time, taking care of our air could make a significant difference in the long term. All in all, developing a new and solid transportation system that is integrated and precise, could help reduce traffic and pollution in Lima. This will reduce the amount of time spended going from one place to the other, and at the same time will dimish the contamination of the city allowing its citizens to have a better air quality.

column3: People who are around you can make a really big difference in your life. Especially those who live with you.  I have the best roommates ever. One of them is John. He is from Washington. He speaks four languages: English, Chinease, Japanise, and Tai.  John is not tall, has a dark hair, blue yies and he is very athletic. John usually has classes from eght in the morning and till two p.m. After that he goes to work to Missionary trainig center. There he teaches yang man how to be a missionaries in Thailand. He also teaches Tai language. John is really positive person. He likes watching movies, taking picturess and he likes sports. column4: One of the major problem in my city is traffic. It takes very long time to get from one place to another. The government of the city is trying to find the solution to this problem, but so far the situation did not improve. One of the things  can make a differnce is to provide more opportunities to ride bicycle.  For that the city has to make sure that there are bicycle lanes on the roads.  By providing bicycle lanes the number of issues will be solved such as: traffic and safety on the road.     Many cities use bycicle lanes to reduce the traffic.  In europe a lot of people ride bikes because it is easier to get around then on a car. Each road has a bicycle lane that provides opportunities for people to ride bikes and not to use cars. This stategy is so effective that many other cities in the world start using this method.  Cities like New York invite their ctitzens to ride bikes during the summer in order to reduce the traffic. In order to provide that option major streets of new york were recostructed and bicycle lanes were added to the streets.    Another problem that bycle lanes solve is safety. It prevents accidents and insures safety of the bicyclists. Also people feel more confident to ride bicycles when they have additional lane for them. Being confident provides less stress and as a result bicyclists make less mistakes on the roas wich leads to less accidents.    I think people in my City underestimate the difference that bicycle lanes can make. It will reduce the traffic and will provide safety for people who ride bicycles. People of my age would really appreciate opportunity to use bicylce more in every day life.  Providing additional lanes would make it safer and attract more people to this activity and as a result will decrease traffic.

column4: Having a new police officers, and new law security services will helps Mexico. Mexico has a big diversity culture, it has different kind of food, and it has many places to visit for vacations. There are three things that Mexico can improve for to be a better place to live. Investing, studiying, and buying new things are not easy for people who live in this country, but if the Goverment works together with the police, it will make a big and good difference.     First, investing in business is good for people who wants to make a good profit, but the secury system does not help a lot. People are afraid to be rober while they are making good profit. For example, five years ago one of my family's close friend was kidnaping while he was working in his own company. For example, when I was studiying my degree, I used to take the bus every Friday because my dad could not pick me up. One day, after school a man stop me, and he asked me for money. I left all my money to him, and I was scare. Nowadays, mexican people are afraid about that     In conclusion, the police in Mexico is not good enoug. The goverment from Mexico need to fix many things in this country. Also, mexican do not feel confident to ask for help to the police because most of the time police officers do not help at all. column4: During a work we keep all our attention on things that have to be made, but what about having a rest? Many people say that it is very useful to have a rest every one work hour. Game mall wil be a good improvement for a city because it will be a place that is in the downtown, it will be a center of all touristic events, and it will be very cheap.       First, mall will take place in the down town, in the very center of the city, so it will be very easy for everyone to get there. column3: When I served on my mission, I lived with three American sisters. That was my first time to live with foreigners. The experience was interesting. Since we were from different culture backgrounds, sometimes it was easy to have misunderstanding. It took a while for us to adjust ourselves to be used to each other. One of the American sisters was the cutiest one. She is really easy going and likes to try new things. One time when she saw I was eating chinese spicy noodles with chopsticks, she wanted to try as well. So, she took half an hour on using chopsticks to eat little spicy noodles.It was almost time for us to go,but she still had a lot left, I asked her to use fork,but she said 'I need to use chinese to eat chinese noodles'. She made me laugh so hard. I love being around people who like chinese culture and trying new things.
column4: People around my age in my city are busy with making money.It is good that when people work hard for their lives.However,when people do not know how to control the balance between life and work,they will get into 'trouble' easily,which means they will get a lot of pressure. It can be good when the stress transfer to motivation when we know how to manage our emotion.Nevertheless, people today only focus on how to make money faster and easier , so sometimes they forget about how to love themselves.Personally, I think that government or companies can help them. First thing they can do is to build up a system for helpng people record their emotion situation.Through this system, people can see how work influence their emotion.It can be a warning to them when they are sressful with their work, so they can take some actions to fix the problems.Also, the companies can adjust  their work when the system shows the person is struggling with the work.Second, in the city, the government can build more clubs which are for people to relief their stress.In these kind of clubs, people can talk to people who are professional in phychocoly area, they also can have some healthy social life there.I think these two ways temporarily can make people realize it is important to pay attention to their mentally health and in the long-term consequences, it is good to help them have  healthy lives.Both the government or companies and people themselves have to take that responsibilities to balance people's lives and work.

column3: I have been living with my aunt and uncle here in America for several months. column4: Every place has different benefits for young people who live there. This benefits are very important because  help with they development of the city. Here in Provo, young people has many benefits, such as the security and the clean streets. However, one of the things that the Provo goverment should improve is the bus service. Even though provo has bus service, this is not very efficient, and the students can't enjoy it even they need it. If goverment improves this services, the students would benefit in different ways. First, they would spend less money, and they would waste less time.       The improvement of the bus services would benefit students spending less money. First of all, most of the studends have to pay their school, and college is one of the most expensive things. Some students have cars because their rental aparments are far away. This is another bill that they have to pay. However, if the bus services improve, they don't have to buy a car, and spend money in gas. Bus is chipper than pay often gas and security car. Students and young people don't have to be worry about how they will do with the transportation in the city because they know that the bus service is effective and they will spend less money. Even though you have to pay to use the bus service, this it can be chipper and a very good benefit for students and young people.      Second, the students would waste less time. One of the problems that the bus service has is that is very slow. Each bus takes 30 minutos or more to take it. If in provo there are more busses to use, the students can use them, and they won't walk or run to classes. Most of the college are huge, and most of the students don't have a car, so they have to walk to classes. However, students don't use the bus service because it's very slow. If the bus service was effecient, students can use them, and even study in the bus. With a good bus service, people who live far away from college, they will be able to have more time to study. For example, I live far aways, and it's very stressful to think that I have to wait for a bus for 30 minutes. The improment of this service will help students to have more time.   In conclusion, a good bus service wil help young people to spend less money and to waste less time. Most of the young people are students, and students are very stressful and busy with college. With a good bus service the good consequences are many. Young people from other cities will come to Provo because they know that they don't have to worry about transportation. They will spend less money and time. If the bus service improved, they benefit for students are many.

column3: As a international students, living with the roommates that I don not know is normally. Sure, this is very different with live in my hometown. And I want to describe in three different ways. column4: Nowadays in my city, Hong Kong. It is facing some kind of big problems for the people, who is in my age. The people live in Hong Kong have a lot of stress. Living in Hong Kong is harder than other city as I know.  For my view, I think the there are three way that my city could be change. Such as educational, housing, and health problem.      First, I think the education is one of the important way to make our life better. However, people in my city are difficult to take the highly education.  In fact, there are only eight university in my city. That are not enough to satificed all the students, who tried to apply the university. Furthermore, the tutions in my city is experience. Most students can't afford the cost of the education. Otherwise, students have to loan for pay their tutions. When students finish their education, they may use ten to fifteen years to pay their loan from government.    Second, people in my age are almost ready to get marry. In my city, people live in a very small area. Mostly, they have to live with their family. If they get marry, then they must to leave their family. However, the housing is expensive in my city. I read a news last month. It mentioned that if a couple want to buy their own house. Their parents have to pay the thirty present deposit. Afterward, that couple have to spend more than twenty-five years to pay the rest of their house. And one of the condition is they must have health body and have a job in the future twenty-five years.   Third, health is important for everyone. It is because people in Hong Kong have ton of stress, it caused some health problems themselves. For my experience, when I worked in Hong Kong. Normally, I worked from 9:00a.m. to 6:00p.m. However, it is improssible. I needed to work overtime from Monday to Friday. The companies in my city that do not care about your life. They requested you work even you leave from office. Mostly, my manager would call me at 11:00p.m. after my working time. It made me felt stress. It is because I cannot leave my cell phone, email, and computer. If I miss one call, it would cause me a big problem.   In conclusion, the people that live in my city in my age, they cannot live for their wish. They live for money, house, and job. Also, they cannot achieve the 'work life balance.' I love my city, but these problems make the people and place worse. If someday, the people in my city can take the education easier, they can afford their own house with their family, or people can live healther than now. I believe that could be a better place.

column4: Mexico City is a very polluted city, however, it would be a better place to live in if the people living there were more concious regarding three main points that would help to improve the air quality in the city, such as car pooling, recycling trash, and placing the trash in the designated places.Many people drive alone to their jobs, wich cause many cars, taking a few people to the same place. What I propose is to car pooling as much as it is possible, if a group of collegues share different owner car each day, they will not just save money, but they will help to prevent the rise of pollution in the city, which is a very serious problem. In addition, I think that another way to decrease the pollution in the city, is to make different campaings in order to promote recycling as a common practice for people living there. For example, when I was in elementary school, we had a project to separate plastics and paper at home and also at school; at the begining it was hard to do so, because we were not used to that, however, the more we did it the easier it became. So, it probably will take time to see the benefits, but for sure they will appear.Moreover, I have noticed that many people are used to leave the trash in the street and not in the designated places. So, I propose to make bigger places for the trash which allows people to throw wastes in the right place. Finally, I think that if people are better educated to improve air quality, that would help to make Mexico City a better place to live in.

column4: Not many people know about Kosovo. It is a country in eastern Europe, people that have visited really want to go back and visit it. Although there are cities that need to improve they tourism. A city called Peja, is very beautiful and peacful, but there is somthing that is missing right now, mountains need to be protected and the lake needs to be clean so the fish would come back. The city I live in is very unique. It is sourrended from magnificient and beautiful mountains from the north and a marvelous lake on the east. There are people that like mountains and there are some other people that like the like. It really does not matter. What it matters is that, wherever they go they mantein the environment clean, and they do not make damege to the plants. As long as they will try to keep the environment clean that will help everyone enjoy their trip, rather lake or the mountains. The people sometimes do not consider, the importance of plants in Rugova Mountains, what they care is to go up to the mountains and cut trees and sell them. Isn't this horrible? Yes, that is something that we try to improve in my country, we want people to know that they can not just go into the woods and cut the trees. They should understand, that what damage can cause to the environment. If people in my country improve they behavior and do not throw trash around the streets would be very helpful. The waste that those people throw is leaking into the lake. The chemical bottles or whatever they throw away, is causing a very detreminal to the fish or any other creator that lives in that lake, and people do not consider that as a potential to stop doing that. If everyone would just make a donation, and allocate the money , we would have a deep clean to the lake and we would save the fish that are everyday diseperaing. column4: If I have the opportunity of change my city it will be just one thing. I will create a law to control the visual contamination. The visual contamination is a huge problem in my city because there are thousands of banners, graffitis, advertisments for every where.  Important companies get public spaces to put big advertisments in historical buildings and even park for the recreation.  The people can not enjoy the landscapes or another things, instead they only see letters and more banners.  For there reasons with the creation a local law I will pretend reduce the use of public spaces, huge advertisements and bring more peace to the people.The public spaces are for the people for the citizens of the city. But the trees and even beautiful avenues had been invaded for comercial banners that caus strees because our mind are not able to process a lot of information, the colors of the letters and shape is some confused in most of the cases without a good shape. For example in my city there is a famous historical building but if you see it for outside you only can see advertisements, graffitis and telefonic cords, so on.  This kind of the contamination reduce the quality of life of the people. On another hand, there are thousands of important companies that are not controled efectivily for the local gobernements. They are free to put banners and all of kinds advertisements for every where, important avenues, freeways,  restaurants, malls and even rural places. Against this there are nothing effective, there only laws to get taxes for these kind of publicity but there are nothing for reduce or decrease the proliferation. The visual contamination affect the quality of live of the people because produce stress, disconcentration, especially for the drivers and create a sense of disorder in the people. They can not contemplate the landscape and live with peace or enjoying our historical buildings and the beautiful architecture. For these reasons, I create a law to reduce this contamination to increase the lives of the people, reduce effects of the marketing and globalization and make the difference in my city and even inspire to others to do the same.

column4: Nowadays my city is overcrowded because the main industries and better schools are there. For that reasons people begab to move from rural areas and other close places to the city. Traffic congestion is the principal problem in my city but it can solve with the following possible solutions.First, promoting walking and cycling. Waking and cycling can reduce significantly traffic and make people happier and healthier. Using cycles and walk reduce the use of cars and reduce carbon emisiSecond, using public transportation helps to reduce traffic jam. Using public transportation can move a lot of people just in one vehicle and help to reduce the carbon emissions. For instance, you can move around 50 people for one place to another and reduce the number of vehicles on lanes. Finally, using intelligent transportation systems ease traffic congestion. Intelligent transportation systems help commuters to identify which roads are heavy and also help to know the weather conditions that prevent potential accidents. For example, people can receive on their smartphones inflormation which route is crowded or where is an accident. Traffic congestion is an issue that is frequent in crowded cities .In conclusion, traffic congestion and pollution is a problem which have potential solutions available for each one. It is not necessary to wait for government measures to ease the effects for this problems. People need to have the desire and convintion that it is possible and they will be benefits when they work in it.

column3: I am going to talk about my roommate Megan Carther. Megan is 24 years old, she is almost 6 feet tall and she has a very athletic body. She is taking 17 credits at BYU and have a part time job as well. Megan is one of the most inteligent people that I Know. What makes her the person that she is now is that she is very servicial. She loves to clean the house and serve others.           Megan is very strict with her schedule. She wakes up at 6:00 A.M. every day. She goes to the GYM for an hour, then she takes a shower and eat breakfast and then she starts cleaning what she needs to clean. After she is done doing all the chores, she starts reading and doing homework. At 11 am she goes to class. She spends all day in school. At 5pm she goes to work. She works every day from 5pm to 11pm. And after she finish working, she starts doing homework.          Megan is the person that can be called 'perfect'. Everything she does is perfect and correct. She is the Relief Society President in the ward and she does a marvelous work. The only thing that she needs is a boyfriend. She is very shy with guys and too strict as well. She has to relax a little bit in order to find a boyfriend and finally gets married in the temple.
column4: Guatemala City is located in the middle of Guatemala. Guatemala is located in Central America and it borders with Mexico, Belize, El Salvador, and Honduras. Guatemala has both oceans, the Atlantic Oacean and the Pacific Ocean. Guatemala is known as a very violent country, as a very corrupt country but at the same time as a very beautiful country. Guatemala has the most beautiful landscapes that you can ever imagine.                    Most of the problems that Guatemala faces is the violence and corruption. If the president and all the council in Guatemala stops stealing money from the government and starts using the money to help people, Guatemala will change. The lack of schools, public health, and good hospitals makes inhabitants to loose control and to start doing bad things in order to receive attention and meanings.                  The main reason of violence is lack of food and money. What makes people steal? No good jobs opportunities and that leads to poverty. A racional person will never steal if they have the meanings and if they have food and a safe place to live. People steal because they need food to eat and clothes to wear. They do not have money because they do not have jobs. They do not have jobs because of two reasons: there is no job or they are not trained to get jobs. They are not ready because they do not have enough education. They do not have a good education because there are no schools. There are no schools because there are no money to prepare the teachers and there is no money to build the schools. What Guatemala needs to change is the government. The government should return all the money that they stole and then with the money everything will start to change.                       If guatemlans have a better education and more posibilities of better jobs everything will change in the country, not just in the city, but in the whole country. The solution probably will take several years, but the consequences are going to be big. People will change and their mentality will change.

column4: Santiago is an amazing city with a lot of future and potential. However, young people is getting lazy. Boredom is dominating the city! Of course there is a solution for this. Actually, the solution for this is the same solution for all wordly problems or issues: soccer. Soccer will increase the young citizens physical activity, diminish depression and other psychological issues, and probably make the city a more attractive place for tourists.      First, people in Santiago is getting fat. Government has taken some measures about it, but they have not worked. In order to fight this global issue, it is important to incentivate physical activity. There is no better option for this than soccer. People love soccer! If the government invest money in soccer infrastucture, tournaments, and advertisments; they will have healthier schools, collegues, and families.     Second, Santiago is a very contaminated city in every sense, and it as been reflected in people phychological illness. Statistically, illness as depression, are increasing dramatically. The best solution for this, according to experts, is practizing a sport. Chileans favorite sport is soccer; therefore, Chile should incentivize this practize in order to reduce psychological issues.   Third, cities, such as madrid, had been empowered by soccer (speaking about tourism). Today's global sport is soccer, and if a country is good at this all the rest of the world is going to put their eyes on it. Chile has good soccer players who won the American Cup last year. However, this can increase if Santiago's government concentrate its efforts on this topic. If they do as it was illustrated before, the interest other countries manifest for Santiago will experience a raise beyond expectatives.      Conclusively, an amazing city, as Santiago is, can be improved by the development of today's most important sport: soccer. It will increase the city physical activity, decrease the mental issues, and increase the tourism in it.

column4: Many countries have this problem about unbalanced populations around the world, it also happenes in my country. Many youg adults move from hometowns to cities becuase there are more job opportunities in cities. One improvement that would sovle this problem is creating more job opporunities for young adults. All citizens will be benefit by this new policy, such as the high quality of lifestyle and the developing relationship between families.First, having more job opportunties will attract many young adults have more desires to come back to their hometowns and countries. People will leave their hometowns and countries because there are inadequant job opportunites and less salaries. For example, creating more job opportunities and increasing payments will help people have sufficient money to support and forster their families. Therefore, it is quite significant to create job oppurtunities and rase payments to attract more people to move back. This improvement will balance the whole society to have higher quality of lifestyle.Second, the long-term consequences of this improvement is developing the closed relationships between families, such as parents. Many elders and children are abandent because young people need to work in other places. Many educated and societal problems are caused because of unbalance populations. For instance, many grandparents do not know how to educated their grandchildren because of the age gaps. If those young people come back, those problems will solve and the relationships will be better. Hence, this is the long-term consequence of this improvement. Cultivating a good relationship takes time and their generations need those young people to help.In sum, there are many improvements that young adults stay in their hometowns and countries. If the govenment can provide more job opportunities and raise payments, more and more young people are willingness to go back. More and more different levels of populations will have many benefits in the future, like  optimal relationships.

column3: Throughout my life time, there's ben several people who have served me and loved. This is why I want to give a great shoutout to my awesome mission companion whom I have been as well friends with and have spent time together having fun.To me, a friend must be somebody who invites me to try new experiences all of the time, things that edify my and get me out of my comfort zone.Andrew has been such an example to me. People at times say we look similar, but his a lot cooler.He loves being in touch with gospel related things, his time is never spent in vain. He loves serving and doing everything in his power to help you out.He'll never say 'no' but will always have  better answer to give you when you're not right.He's very worried abot his responsabilities, he doesn't miss one, he's on top of everything.Living with him, in the mission and after, has been a great experience. Shows me that the Lord doesn't let alone at any time.
column4: I'm from a third world country where most of the things are private and limited. There is an endless list of things to improve, because the goal is to form a place where a future group of young men and women may learn the basics of success, a place where society doesn't deny anybody the opportunity to progress. Since there is a ton of things to talk about, I'd like to emphasize one that I've noticed is holding many from progression.About 7 years ago, the Government created a new organization, which was encharged of the direction of the recent graduates from high school to college, or anybody who wanted to study in what became 'public' universities.Studying privately meant to much of a sacrifice if the family was poor, so getting through a test to apply to a public university seemed to be a great opportunity. However, this way of applying limited many of the desires of these people, placing them where they didn't want to be, but at the same time, filtering the ones that actually wanted to be prepared.As years passed by, new policies where made in order to study for free. The test that is taken to allow people to study has a top score of a thousand, and many different carrers required, or demanded, students to get very close score.This caused many to be where they didn't want to be, since you applied not for just one career with your score, but four, and it all depended in availability.People took the chance to do something different from what they originally wanted, and as time passed by, they ended up withdrawing. That is a feeling most people have when they're not comfortable.Policies continued to change, and the opportunity now to study at a public university became muchmore limited. Lately, the government decided that only students from public schools are allowed to study at publich universities. All these many students that went to private schools could not have the chance to be at the  public universities.Private school, elementary or high school, are not necessarily expensive, but parents choose these options ensuring the safety of their children because public school are very dangerous.This is why many parents are taking the risk to send their children to foreing countries, to become better prepared.The solution sounds to be a change of people's minds, since they are the ones who choose who they want to govern them, because to change a governor is much harder.I love my country and I'd love to be part of the inmediate solution.

column4: The  city in my country is a good place to live in . It is a populous city that so many young people at my age are likey to come. But how it could become a better place? Government should encourage young people to build their own buisness by some beneficial policies.        First, the city has a big pupulation but not enough working oppotunities. Young people who are just graduate form college do not have working experience before and the working positions are not enough. As a result, there is a saying in my city,' graduation is unemployment.' Many young student cannot find a job after graduation. So they had to studying for a higer education or just stay at home. If the government take actions to help young people to run their own besiness, they can work for their own.     Second, the policies are potential because the need exists. Encouraging young people to run their own business like opening a company could not only build a job for that young people, but also build new working positions for more people becuse the company need employers. Government can reduce the cost of buliding a company so that it is easier for young people. Furthermore, the government can build the business union to help young people running their buisness so that they can make success easier.    Last,  this action is beneficial in a long run. We can see that it helps reduce the unemployment. In one way, some young people can work for themselves. In other way, more working positions were created. Then it helps the local economy.For instance,these new private businesses borden the market. They can do some new busness that the existed companies barely do before like online shops. Also more compines means more taxes. the government could use these money to invest new busness.   In conclusion, government should makes some good policies to encourage and help young people to build their own buisness. It can not only reduce unemployment but laso stimulate the local economy.

He is a very nice guys who always invites friends to play video games. He is always playing video games and watching tv shows. Another guy who lives in my apartyment is Ben. And another guy is Steve. He is a nice guy, although he does not speak to much and he is always playing on his ipad, but still he is a niuce guy. I like living with
column4: An improvement that would make my city a good place for people my age is to have places to do physical exercise for free. In my city there are many people who like to do exercise; however, not all of them have money to spend in a Gym so it would be good to open areas with exercising equipment like in other cities. Some benefits of opening areas where people can work out are that people can save money, people would be more healthy and in shape. There are some cities that provide parks with exercising equipment where people can work out for free. This would be very good to the people in my city because in my city if you want to work out or do exercise you have to go a gym and pay a tuition. Therefore, if the goverment opened this kind of areas with exercising equipment , more people would  have access to place to work out and others could save money.Another long term consequence for opening areas with exercising equipment is that people would be in shape. A problem in my country in these last years is obecity because they do not have a correct diet and because they do not do exercise. However, if the government opened these areas, more people would go an exercise because they do not have to spend money and also they could go at any time because it would  be a park a public place. As a result, there would be more healthy people and in shape.In my city there are many places to eat with friend and family, to go dancing and also parks. Nonetheless, there are no places to work out for free. I think this areas would make a good change among people my age because they will have a fre place to spend time with friend and do exercise that most people my age do not do.

column3: I am living with an American family right now. They are parents of a very good friend who served his mission in my country, Peru. They are wonderful people. They are kind to me. Everyday they are doing things to make me feel good here in their country. They are old people so they saw me as if I were their grandson. Sister Wilde is a musician. She conducts the hyms at Church and sings beautifully. She is an amazing woman. She also cooks pretty well. I love her food. I was missing my home but because of her I feel better now. Now the, about her husband, brother Wilde, I can say he is a great man. My first day here in the States he gave a me tour around all the city so that I can know better the places. He works from Monday to Thursday so he always has time for his wife. I really love this. I love this family a lot. I am going to miss them when I have to move. I will be eternally grateful to them for eveything they are doing for me so that I can feel like home. This marriage is so amazing.
column4: As a young adult, I have seen that there is a big lack of places who can consider holy around my city. I am member of the Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints and I would like to have places where people my age can feel safe and welcome. There is a Church close here but that is not enough for us, I think we could create a program like in the States to have all the young people united. I have many friends in the States who has been raised here or have been studying for a long time, and there is a big difference in them. They have meetings, parties or opportunities to connect with people their age and with the same standards. I can't see this in my city now. This makes me feel sad sometimes because I would like my friends can have the chance to live like in the States. This is my first day here in Provo, Utah and wow, it is really amazing and holy. If all my Peruvian friends could be here I know they would enjoy this a lot. I know that it is not a good idea to bring all of them here but I am very convinced that we can do much to create a program in Lima Peru to help the young people, especially Mormon people to be and stay in holy places.When I think about holy places I don't think only about temples or churches, but places like a friend's house or activities where people my age can feel the Spirit and be together far from the Satan's wickedness. I have always thought if there are people building discos or clubs to get money selling alcohol or ciggarettes, we can do all the contrary creating healthy activities for our Mormon community outside the States. We could use more our churches during the week. They are places where we should be more often. I dream with the day that we can hang out with friends and feel not so tempted or in danger.  Imagine the impact that we could have in some years. I could name some of the inmediate consequences: Young people with a stronger desire to serve missions or get married at temples. Wow, is not this amazing? It is. We can do this a reality. Dreaming is not sufficient. We have to do things now to change our future and of those who will be born. We can do that the Provo's culture expands around the world creating programs and healthy activities. We do not need to invest a lot of money to do this. To start we can use our own buildings more.  I don't know how this works in other countries but in my experience today we tend to use the Church only on Sundays. With more activities for young people we would have the building open all the week and full of people. Imagine this again and let's do something to make it real.

column3: My live now is very different than before for many reasons. In the past, I lived with my family in my country, and I just studied but not worked. I did not have roommates, and my mother always cooked delicious food for me. I spent time with my family and enjoyed when I went enough activities with them. Now I live in another country and without my wonderful family. My family is my roommates and my friends. I am studying English in a good program at BYU, and it gives me the opportunity to work in the campus. I have to cook my food every day because I do not have to my mother close me. I miss to spent time with my family because I have always think that is the most important for me. In conclusion, now my life is very different than before for theses reasons, but I feel very grateful to have this new experience to living in another country.
column4: The Most  Powerful Weapon for Changing my City     The most powerful weapon for changing my city a better place is the education for many reasons. First, the education is the main key to eliminating  the poverty. Second, the education brings great oppportunities to achieve your goals. Third, the education helps you to live in peace and love.      The education is the main key to eliminating the poverty because it is an investment. You invest your time for studying in different institutions to learn essential things like read, talk, and write. There are many young that is out to school because do not have the wish to learn more. It is a great problem because when they are adult, they cannot have sufficient money to survive.     The education bring great opportunities to achieve your goal. When  you obtain a good education whatever you study,  you can get a better job. Having a good job is very important to live with commodity. For example, many student decide to study in other countries because this is a great opportunity to have enough experiences that after they will put into practice in the future job. You can be succesfull if you study.      Furthemore, the education helps you to live in peace and love. The most important of learning is to be able to teach other people.  One of theses examples would be the amazing mothers when they have to teach to their children like read, talk, and count. When you help another person, you feel happiness.     In conclusion, for theses reasons I think that the education is the most powerful weapon that can do what my city would be better. The education always gives you great opportunity to be succesful.

column3: I arrived here like 4 days ago and I have met awesome people. In this moment, Im living with 5 Americans. They are really nice with me and they are teaching me many things that I don't know, specially because everything is new for me. My roomate is very kind. His name is Boone, he is from Michigan and He will be here for the rest of this year. He has a girlfriend that he met during his mission in Arizona and she is also really nice. Her name is Blake. Boone likes to play soccer and basketball. We like to play bowling and we enjoy talking about our future plans. There is another roomate that is really nice. His name is Mikel, he served his mission in Argentina, so he speaks Spanish pretty well. He loves Disney movies and he has a big box full of movies. It's great!!! What I like about them is that they understand that I need to learn English, so they are helping a lot. Thay always want to talk to me, they invite me to many activities and we really enjoy being togather.
column4: I have seen many great things here in the United States. Things that I have never seen before in Colombia. One of those things that I like most is the quality of education I found here. For me, It's really nice that you have the oportunity to aplay for any University and at the biggining of your semester you have the chance to take General studies and during this procces you can think and ponder about the carrier or major you would like to take. So, students here have the chance to change it if they realize it's not for them. That is great, because is Colombia is so different. In Colombia you need to know what you want to study and sometimes it's really difficult to be accepted and if during your major you realize that it's not for you.... they don't give you the same oportunities that you can find here. I sincerily believe that if the goverment applays ideas like this, people from my age could have more aportunities in their futures lifes.  Thinking about the long - term consequences of this improvement I would say that the situation in Colombia could be better. It's so sad to see people in Colombia who has a nice major but for any reason  they are homeless right now. Can you Imaging this? Study so hard for 4 or 5 years and then don't find a place where you can aplay the things you learned. Doctors or Profesional people driving taxis or something like that, just because the can't find a place to work. It makes me really sad. That's why I feel so blesed to be here. Studying in this University and In this place. I want to give my best because I know that with the education Im going to recieve here I will have more oportunities in Colombia. This is what I want for city and for my country. I want a better education, with the same oportunities for everybody. And I know people my age would be so grateful with this change.

column3: Right now I live with the Raymond family. There are for people i theire family. Ronn is the father of my friend Dax. I served on the mission with Dax and we became good friends. He is a really big person, he plays football at Utah State University. His father Ronn owns a small buisnes and he is a good man. He also has two daughters. One of them is eighteen and she is a senior in high school. Other daughter is fourteen and she plays soccer in school. Their mother is the nices lady that I know. She takes care of her children and her husband every day. The whole family is really talented. Everyone has o hobbie and is good at it. I love spending time with them
column4: Today I want to talk about my hometown and the things that can be better in it. I live in a big city called Odessa thats placed in Ukraine. That is beautiful city that has over one million people living in it. This city is right by the Black Sea, so it has a lot of turists every summer. If I would have chance to change something in my city, probably I would add more bicycle lines on the rodes. This will help to prevent traffic in down town and also a lot of accidents with cars and bicycles on the streets. Talking about people my age I will say that everyone will enjoy this change. A lot of young people ride bikes and they always have problems on the roads, because they dont have enough room with cars. Other benefit is clean environment. If you are riding a bicycle you are not poluting the air. We have a lot of people coming every summer for vacations with their familys and I think that they will enjoy good environment. On the other hand drivers will feel more comfortable driving their cars, because they dont need to worry about people that are riding bikes. Everyone will have their own lane on the road and if no one brakes driving rools such as crrosing double lanes everybody will be safe. There are a lot of benefits for people of my age in this change. I am twenty two years old and I like two ride on my bicycle. If I will have a separete  line on the road for riding a bike it will make my life safer, because I go to fast and a lot of times drivers in a big cars can not see me. Talking about long-term consequences I would say that everyone will learn how to drive safely and drivers will start to respect people that are ridding their bicycles, because they will not be on their way. Also more people will start using bikes, because thay will feel safer on tha roads.

column3: Nowadays, I live with my little son. It is the the first time that I have the responsibility to care a child. It is significant  this time because I learn about sharing time and a chils. My son has an active schedule. He weaks up very early, after that he likes to play the piano then eats breakfast. He enjoys his elementary school. Since six mounth ago, he speaks english more fluence than I. Every afternoon, he does karate. Finally, at night he usually reads his books. We enjoy reading about pokemon, peterpan, and superman.  Hi is friendly, humble, and proactive. Since he was a baby he likes to share his toys with his friends. Certanly, hi is my best roommate.
column4: It is well known that my country (Peru) has many problems. The principal problem is relate to young people, they do not have public spaces and they spend their time in negative activities. My government has to implement beneficial programs for young people. Building public places and incrementing the investment in education will be the key to develop a new society.First, more public places for young people and families. My town has a huge problems,  there are not enough public places to practices some sports. In addition,  young people use their time in negative activities, such as gans or drugs. In contrast, Provo has many public places for families, young people, an so on. This will be a good example, and my authorities should copy those examples. It is clear that more public places will help in a short-term because young people will develop health activities; and long-term because young people will avoid drugs and there will be less gans. Second, in relation to education. Authorities of my country must invest in schools. Since elementary schools to high school, even public universities. The money from taxes has to be used in more computers, books. Moroever, it is well known that many students do not have breakfast. The government must implement a food program for all student. It will help not only students, it will help the society. In short -term, this program will increase  rate of students at school. In a long-term, it will be beneficial for the society. It is evident that education is the key to improve my city.In conclusion, young people are the future in a socierty. Peruvian authorities have to develop beneficial programs, such as building  more public places and investing in education because young people in five years will decide who will be the next president, they have to be educated

column3: Since Sring of 2014, Im living with the same roomates. They are Litzy, Eva and Ashley. They are so nice and clean. Eva and Litzy are also my friends. We shared a lot of adventure togueter, such as, we went to Disneyland 2 years ago, the first concert of Litzy, etc. Litzy likes listening to music, plays flute, whatches movies and eat. On ither hand, Eva likes to sleep, watch series and listening to music. I do not talk a lot with Ashley because she is with her friends or family almost all the time. I really like the environment that we have in our home because it is very peaceful and quiet. My roomates are a really good roomates and also really good friends. we like to talk a lot, also, we like to do activities togeter when everybody has time to do something. All of them are in UVU. They are studiying different majors. Everyone of us is very different in many ways, but we live good togeter.
column4: I am from Lima, Peru. Lima is a beautiful city. It is located in the coast of Peru, in front of the ocean. Lima is a city when people can do different activities such as surfing, go to the theater, go to museums, etc, but there are some things that make people to do not do this activities. There are many things that the government need to improve for make Lima a better place to live.First, Lima is unsafe. Lima is an unsafe place. Compare with Provo, the city where I live in, Lima is very unsafe. In Lima in everyminute a crime is happening. A lot of people is tired of this because make them to de afraid and alert all the time. Also, there are places that people cannot go in several times as night or there are other places that they cannot go in all the day because it is always dangerous. The government should improve the security in Lima becaus eis decreasing the national and international turism in the city.Second, Lima has really bad streets. Almost all the streets in :ima are destroyed. This happening for many situations such as earthquakes, the excessive weight, etc. The government did not give to them the maintenance that they needed and for that reason the structures are not good. This is causing people to be very mad because everyone is paying taxes for the maintenance of the city, but this is not happening. The government should fix the streets for make the city more beautiful. Third, the trafic in Lima is caotic. The trafic is Lima is horrible. A lot of people spend more than one hour just waiting for the car to move. This is not just happening in some parts of the city , this is happening in almost all the city between 6 to 8pm because that is the time when people go out of their jobs. Some of the people who are more affected by this are college students and employers who are in the central part or south parth of the city because it is where the trafic is more horrible that other parts. Also, the way how the public and private transportation is organizate in Lima is not the best. The government should improve the organization of the transportation for make the life of al lot of people better. Finally, Lima has several things that make it a beautiful and unique city , but there are things that are disturbing their populations. Some of the reasons are security, structure of the streets and traffic. this things are affecting the life of the people and make them more unhappy. The government should improve all these things for help people to have a better and calm life.

column3: Living with my mission  compaions is easier that live with extrange people. I live with two of my companion from my mission. Their names are Randon and Christian. We alredy know each other then is easier know there personality and habits.
column4: Sport is a important part of the live of everyone, also more for young people that have more capacity to practic it. This is a city that do not have enough places to practices sport. As a important part of the dairly life, having more place to practice sport would be a better place to youth. It would make them  being less stressful and out of drugs.     Frist, being less stressful is a very important part of the life for youth, then having paces to practic sport with help them. With all the stress that youth precent because school, work, and taking important desision is essential being helty to do not have to care about that. A example of that is there are many people that use running to have time to forgot about their problems of all the thing that they need and be less stressful. Fortheremore no every one like to run, some people like to playing soccer, tennis, bascketball,  etc. If young people do not have the space to practice this sport they just will not do it. Then it will make then do not practice sport and make them more stressful.     Second,drugs is a general problem  in the youth in this days. Youth are more likely to being in drugs that other people because they do not have others thing to do. With the bad influence in the youth, is very dangerous give them the chance to try drugs. Even though drugs is a personal desision, the enviroment can have a good influence in that desision. To illustrate, when youth is involve in sport they do not have enough time to be tented in trying drugs because thery are useing their time. column3: I just barely got married, so I am living with my husband, his name is Joshua, but he prefers people call him Josh; thus I will call him Josh while writing this paragraph. Josh is tall, white, and has brown eyes and brown hair. Right now he is studying at BYU computer engineering; he is finishing his bacherlor's degree, and will be done by the end of the year in fall semester. It means that he wil be receiving his diploma next year. Josh is also working part time at Verizon, he is in charge of programing advertisements for the company so people may know about discounts, promotios, gifts, etc that the company can give to the customers. Josh is very organized, and love to help people. He is very patient and has good attitude. He is also very smart and committment with his assignments at school and work. He is a good son, brother, friend, husband, in general he is a good person.
column4: The city I used to live in Colombia is a small city, its name is Barranca, and there are a lot of improvements that I would like to metion; however, I will emphazise on education. Barranca is a rich city on natural resources, oil is one of them, there are a lot of companies around the area, but just a few universities. Barranca needs more colleges because people have to improve their level of educations; thus the economy in the city will improve.First of all, the more education people obtain the better living condition they will have. Barranca has all the transportation that it is needed to take advantage of the economy. It also have an gigant refinery of the most important company in Colombia. They work to look petroleum around the area to transform it into products to consume such as gas. However, corruption in government, and some other companies that want to monopolize the market do not allow people in the city improve their living conditions. That is why, it is not convinient for them to bring more univiersities that people may obtain high education, and then get a better job or possitions inside a company. The universities that Barranca has are not good enough to supply the demand of the oil market. Those schools try to do their best, but when a young professional who has graduated from one of this college is going to look for a job, those companies reject this young because the school does not have the qualities to educate this professionals. Therefore, this young people would not have the opportunity to improve their living conditions and make progress in their lives. Second, the more universities, the more options people can choose to study to become educated and help with improvements in the city. When people obtain more education, it is more likely that a city become more civilized, clean, and well known. Cities where there are poor levels of educations are more likely to maitain poor living conditions. Barranca needs a lot of schools people can choose want they really need to study to work on improvements in social, cultural, healthy, economy issues. However, in this situation, education is only for rich people who have the opportunity to pay for their children's education in a different city that offers what they are looking for to obtain the job they want in the time they have to come back to barranca to work. So there is going to be same people or family who is going to be rich because there are the only ones who have this opportunies. In conclusion, education is most powerful key that goes against porverty. Barranca as a wealthy city in many diferent natural resources needs more school that bring posibilites of improvements, and help young people to grow and improve their living conditions helping the city to grow in the same way.

column3: Now, I have the opportunity to live with roomates. They are different as me but it is one think that I really like. I am going to describe to of them. The first one is Nancy, she is from Mexico. I met her at the ELC, we were classmates. We started to live together 4 months ago. She likes cook and listen music. She is really active and it is one thing one think that I really like because when I do not have energy or I am not positive, she makes me feel better. Other thing that I really like is that she has the same job as me. That is important for me because I need to wake up early and does not matter how much noisy I am. She wakes up at the same time as me. However I cannot practice my english with her. And as a consequense Dayana is here. She is from UTAH, USA. She is really nice. Like Nancy she is very pretty positive. And she has the patient and time to practice with me mi English. She works at the MTC as a teacher because she is a return missionary. She has the spirity. She always has different ways to solve a problem, including my problems. Have roomates is one of the experiences that I really like.
column4: The place where we live is important in our life. It is not only for us, it is for our children and our grandchildren. We have to take care and try to make better for us. Because we are here, I am here, you are here, and all of us are the person that we can make the difference. The improvement that would make our city better place to live is clean our streets. It has many benefits as make that we love our city, stop the pollution and be an example for people around us. When people love the place where they live, they enjoy go out and try to find things to do. In many cases look their town clean make people happy, does not matter that they are not doing excersice, the action that involve only go out and hear the bird singing make them happy.We live in a place where the pollution have a huge problem nowadays. It is not necessary go far away in looking for trash. We can go outside and see that we have trash around us. If we start to take out and clean the streets. column3: I live in an aparment with four roommates. They are the best roommates I ever had. They are always there for me when I need something and I do the same for them. One of the most things I like is that they keep the apartment clean and pretty organize. I just can spend time with them on saturdays and sundays because all of them have to work and me as well, but those days we spend the day together and we watch movies from the church. All my roommates are in BYU, so they have to tons of stuff every single day. I love them because they are very spiritual, so I can feel the spirit when I am at home. We are always them if one of us need each other and for me that is a really good thing that can come from roommates. About their personalities, they all are kind and calm, but sometimes we get crazy just because we have the confidence and we start to do silly stuff. If I have to leave I will miss them with all my heart.
column4: There are a lot of things that my country should improve to be a better place to live. I have always thought that it must be difficult to improve or increase an element to make a city a better place to live because it requires time to do it.  If I have the opportunity of choosing one element to improve in my country it would be education.  There are two main reasons of why I will choose education. The first main reason is because there are a lot of children or even teenagers that are not being educated correctly and firmly. The second reason is because education is not being a career that a teacher do with passion.       Nowadays, teaching children and teenagers is very important because they are our successors and they must learn much better that the actual generacion if we want to make a city a better place to live. Education is the motor, battery and the principle fundamental of our life, everything is turning around education and we have to learn well. However there are some children and teens that are not being educated correctly and firmly. Most of them do not want to go to school and they do not want to learn about courses at school.  Why is this happening? For example, in Chile, most of the children and teens are getting tired of studying and doing homework, but I can infert that maybe teacher are not doing their jobs very well and this can be the consequence.      Education is not being paid correctly as it should be. There are a lot of people who love teaching, but they do not earn good enough for their stuff and daily lives. For example in Chile, my country, I experimented that my teachers were tired of teaching very well but earning pretty bad and it is still being a huge problem because teacher get sick of teaching and they start doing their jobs but without passion. A carrer that do without passion, can become really bad for you fisically and mentally over the time.      In conclusion, I would improve education in all its senses because it is essenciall for our life and for our successor. Education is one of the most important things for our success and future and we need to try to make it better. The change start for you even though other person do not do it, just try to start making the change or improvement by yourself and give the example to children. Education must be teaching with all passion and effort because by this we can start to make our cities a better place to live in.

column3: Living in Provo, Utah and in a place where you have different roommates is a good experience. In the past I used to live with a family and now I am living with five American girls.  These girls tought me many things in life. They have different personalities, but each of them is special.  All of them are BYU students, they work during the morning at the campus ansd at the MTC in Provo. Something that I like living with them is that when come back from school or work, someone will ask how was your day, or how was work, and also they will ask you if you had something interesting during the day. Then, if someone want to watch a movie or a tv serie episode, all of us will join at the living room and watch it. I realized that these girls thought  me how to be part of this family now. Maybe in the future they will need to move out, but I will always remeber them as a part of this experience called 'student life'.
column4: Looking for a place where to live is something thayt everyone will choose. One of the improvements that the city where I live right now can do is to have more places where we can spend time learning different languages such a emarging schools. People in different ages can learn another languages when they are children or teenagers instead to wait until middel school or high school, they will develop another skills with their second language, and be able to support others during the transition of learning another language.Firsty, learning another language could be a challange in life. Most of the time people do not take that kind of risk about learn a foreign language. It  can be helpful in life; especially because children  and teenageers are in their grow up transition,  children are be able to learn so fast which shows us that they will have an anvantage from others. As a second point, children and teenageers  can develop new skill when they learn another language. column3: During mi mission there was a timen in which I lived with other 2 elders in the same apartment, besides my companion and I. It was super fun. However, when the elders from the office brang the base it was super hard to get it to our apartment because we lived in the 5th flor of a bulding, and the base did not fit in the elevator. So, it was three in the morning and there we were in our pijamas carring a base using the building stairs. I will never forget that night. Our apartment was small, it was perfect for two people but not for four; I lived one of my best experiences in that appartment anjoying the friendship with the other elders.
