Because this city has a large number of elderly people, a improvement that the city should do to improve life quality would be a golf couse, because that will incentivate old people to socialize, exercice and compite.                Fisrt, golf is a calm and low pace game. This type of invironment help people to have time to socialize and get to know one another better. Elderly people especially use to appreciate games that are slow and gives the opportunity to chat and tell jokes and laught. FOr example, my uncle Bentz, after my aunty Joann passed away, met his second white, Morgan, at the golf course where they used to play together .                Second, golf is a low impact sport that requires lots of flexibility and elasticity. Those are two aspects that old people usually dont concern about and later they can develop issues and pain. Any type of exercise in beneficial to people of all ages, but elderly people need extra motivation to keep them in moviment. For example, my gradnma Anna used to go to the gym during all her life  time with my grandpa, they were gym buddy's. When my grandpa passed way, she got depression and felt so desmotivated to keep going to the gym. After a friend of her invited her to go with to a golf game, she fell in love with the game and ever since that day still playing it weeklly.             Last,  the competitivity of the game is a health and good activity to be engaged. Team players can work on strategies and ways to get extra points. Another benefit of the golf games is the funny and exciting rewards that they offer after the game. Participants gather together to find out the winners, the loosers that scored the worse, and to celebrate. Those rewarning prizes and fun and bring to the elderly people motivation.              For all those reasons, the city should have a golf course focusing the majority of the society, the elders. With this improvement the whole society will gain more advantages and elderl people will be going less to do procedures at the hospital, because when one is happy and has friends, its overcome trials faster and with more motivation.

column4: Young people are sometimes confused because ot the school, their families and relationships. However, one of the most important improvement where people should improve is Education's life. Taking advantage of time, responsibilities and good opportunities are three important aspects which allow young people to improve the Society by .First, taking advantage of time is when people organize their activities in order to be active and proactive. For example, there are a lot of campaings and activities created with an especific purpose, and also these activities have value for the curriculum vitae. Sometimes people use as an excuse their schedules because University is the primary responsibility. However, there are people that work and study at the same time. It is because they organize and have a plan every day, and thus they graduate. Therefore, is people take advantage of their time the excuses are not necessary.Second, responsibilities  mean when people respond by actions, but in time. Sometimes it is hard to take decisions because people is afraid to fail, so they decide to quit. Nevertheless this is the worst choice they could ever do because improving is result of constance, discipline and practice. Attending to the school, cleaning the house, getting a job are some responsiblities that young people may learn and become mature. Society may improve is people is conscient of their responsabilities and never wait until things are done. If people want to live in a good society, so they have to take the responsibility to keep improving every single day.Finally, good oportunities are the key to be successful because they give the experience to respond and be involved in different scopes. When people is young, they might not know what is the best thing to do or the best job to get. All the experience allow the people to get knowledge which makes the people smart, also experience  helps the people to realize which aspects people should analyze in before situations. There are professional people who have gotten different jobs before the one that they like the most and they are professional. People should learn by opportunities because all of them have benefits that help life in Society.In conclusion,  taking advantage of time, responsibilities and good opportunities are three important aspects that allow young people to improve their society  because they will benefit to the rest  in the future by Education's life.  Even though some homework apparently can disturb, the constance and discipline are good tools that young people are able to use in order to improve the place were they live.

column4: One of the improvement that make my city a better place is the educational model. In the last years my city experiments an increase in the people who are studying that's why the goverment decided to create many new schools and high schools buildings. They change the way that the people learned, give more challenges for young people too. They do my city more active. The principal characteristics that change were: the infrastructure of the buildings, the method to teach, activities for students.First, I want to talk about the infrastructure of the buildings. The goverment decided to create new buildings for students. the students can be more motivated to learn and they are more happy, because they can be free and feel the country are interested in the future. They have more space to learn and practice sports. They have new computer labs. when I was a student all was different because I had to share a computer with two or more people, existed a lot of people in each high school. Now all of this is better, you can learn more fast.The second point is the method to teach. Years ago when I was a student the teacher had to be a professional for be a teacher, Now the situation changed, because If someone want to be a teacher, they have to give some exams and study more, be professional is not enough now need to has a master degree or a phd. column3: When I was in my counrty, I was living with my family. I have parents and three little sisters. My mother's personality is interesting because she is basically calm and kind, but if she is tired, she usually becomes offentive. My father's personality is always calm, and he rarely gets mad, which I respect.   My three sisters are students. She has to take an important exam in order to go to high school in next spring, so she only studies hard for the exam. My third sister goes to junior high school and joins basket ball club.
column4: My city is not urban, but it is not rural. Currently, there is no specific and huge problems in my city; however, in the next 50 years, some problems, such as an aging society and a lack of jobs, might occur. To improve my city and continue to be prepoteous, branch stores of many huge companies should be built and take care of other companies in my city comsidering two elemetns in my city: average age of the population and small comapnies in my city.   First, introducing many huge companies will lead many young people to come to my city in the future. The avarage age of the population getting higher in my city, which will be a huge problem in the future and cause an aging society. However, if many huge companies take a role in my city, even young people can easily find their jobs, and they will not need to go to huge cities to find jobs. Also, huge companies have a power to make people stay in the area. For instance, several huge companies have built their branch stores in my city this year. Consequently, the stores need people who work for them, and many people from various generations try to move to my city because the city has huge companies' stores. Therefore, people will stay in my city if huge companies will be introduced.   Second, the types of my city have been urban. This year, the main station in my city has been rebuilt because of one remarkable event, and my city is now famous and popular for people in my country and even in foreign coutries. By rebuilting the station, the scene has changed, and it looks urban. Small companies still play important roles in my city. However, if huge companies take care of the small companies, the small companies will be able to improve more by supports from huge companies and catch up with the change of my city. If huge companies do not take care of them, they might be faded away because of the change in my city. Hence, small comapnies will be able to be more successful if huge companies will be introduced.   Two problems: avarage age of the population and small companies in my city will have been solved by introducing huge companies. Huge companies have a power to let people stay in my city. Small companies will be supported by huge companies in order to maintain their businesses. In conclusion, in the future, my city will be more preposteous even though it now seems to have no problems.

column4: One improvement that would make my city better, would be to not allow the city to have so many bars and to restrict students in the hours they have acces to it. Students are used to going to bars or pubs after the classes and that represent a big damage in their life, not only for students but also for the city. If we reduce the amount of bars and pubs and the accesibility  , we would be avoiding other problems such as : delincuence, accidents, fights in the streets and it would be helping  students to perform in a better way at school.First, students usually are tired and want to do something different after class, that is why most of the time they go to the bars and pubs after classes. Which represent an increasing damage for them and the society. If less pubs are allowed in the city , it will make the students to go to another place and do something more productive. Probably we will not be able to see the consequences inmediatly but in a long term it will represent an important change for the city and the students because they will choose another place to go making more effective their lifes or at least not a problem for the city. Second, in a long term it is going to be able to afect the city in an effective way, because, the accidents and violence in the streets are going to decrase. Bars and pubs are one of the reason of several accidents during the night time in the city. most of them are cause by sudents that have been consuming drugs or alcohool after their classes. If we decreased the ammount of pubs and the accesibility to them, it would help to the police to control this problems in a more effective way. Also it will protect the cithizens and the student to suffer accidents and crimes. In conlusion, reducing the ammount of pubs and bars in the city and also specific to restrict students to go to them. If these places are not available, students are going to have to choose another places to go and it will increase in a long term the security of the city. column3: Leaving with roomates are the best time while I am living in Provo, Utah.  I live with five roommates in Glenwood apartment, which is good community to know new people. column4: One improvement that would make my city a better place to live for people my age is transportation, espectially a bus. Most of my age they are working and they do not have a car, so transportation is very important for them, so they should deserve a good trasportation for two reasons: they can save time, and they feel better going to work.To begin with, they do not waste their time to wait transpotation for a long time. Transpotation in Thailand is not good enough for people because it has not provide a schedule time for people yet, so people have to wait a bus unit it come. On the other hand, if people can check the bus schedule, they can save and manage their time. For example, I had been working at Siam Kubota, which is Japanese compary for two years, I had to wait a bus around 30 minuts every day. Sometimes, I could take bus early and got the office early around 15 minuts, but sometimes I got the office very late because the bus came late. I cound not manage my time and I also could not save my time to do other things such as study. In summary, Improving transportation in my age is important to people because they can save their time. Second, people will feel better and happy before they are going to work  if transportation is improving. People always get mad or unhappy when they almost are late to work because a bus comes late. They will feel nervous and bad to be late. Furthermore, they are afraid that their boss will get angry. Those feelings are not good for employees because they should feel good and ready to work that they will be able to do very good job. To illustrate this point, in my story, I always felt bad when I was late because my boss was very stick and I did not want them feel disappointed about me. As the result, I had to wake up early to take a bus. As you can see, transpotation should be improved for people in my generation who are working. In conclusion, transportation, especially a bus, is one of improvement that my conutry should take care about it. Not only can people save their time, but also people feel good and fresh to working.  Transportation should improve for working people as my age. They will able do very great job for their work.

column4: Around the world, there are many good examples of technological cities such as New York, Tokio, Bejing, and others. One of the important aspect to improve in a city is the transportation system. In Bogota, many people think that having more malls, industries, and buldings is better than improving the transportation system. However, improving the transportation sytem such as roads and metros, those can bring many benefits for all the citizens of Bogota such as making distances shorter and saving time.Bogota in the capital of Colombia, which is the biggest city in the country, people take long time moving aorund the city. Many people like to visit different place in the city, but sometimes they do not  becuase those are far away from their houses due to there are not free ways or big avenues to travel. Free ways are big road, which facilitade people to travel faster than other roads of the city. For instance, if there were one free way from North to South, and another from East to West, those will be a great benefit making distances shorter.The other improment will be having a metro system. Metros can carry as many people than other services on, and metros have their own roads to go faster than cars or other transportation services. Having  a metro in Bogota can benefit many students and workers. It will save time to them in several situationes on their daily lives. Although, many students do not have cars to move into the city; they will use the metro. Furthermore, with multiple metros into the city, many people will be happy becuase the can travel faster and save time in their days.Becuase making distances shorter and saving time is important to Bogota's citizens. Building new roads such as free ways and implementing metros into the city are good improments for the city. If Bogota implemets these improments, many people will live happier and not stress about the crow road that today Bogota has. Also, multiple could have extra free time to do other things, saving time with faster services of transportation such as metros.

column3: A few months ago, I was living in Brazil with my family. My family is composed by my parents and one older brother of mine. Also, my parents work in the morning and afternoon, so I would see them just at night. My brother, different from my parents, does not work. He studies at the medical university in my city and studies all day long. My father is a bank teller and my mother is an English teacher. The most interesting thing about my parents is that they are very different. My father is very pacient and calm; on the other hand, my mother is not pacient at all and always with a lot of energy. My brother is very calm too at home, but when he is with his friends, he turns to a completely different person.
column4: People nowadays find several ways to improve and develop their talents. However, in my city, it is very hard to find a place where people can practice their skills, specially with music. There are not many places where people can have access to different instruments or people to teach them. Stated that, one beneficial way which would make my city better is building a place for people to learn how to play instruments. The first reason to build this place is because it will bring several benefits for young people. There are many studies that support the idea that studying a new instrument will have the capacity to improve people's brains. For example, it is a fact that anything that people learn can have several benefits, and learning an instrument if not different. People will be capable of being a better multitasker and will concentrate better. Additionally, it can help people to see the world differently. Music can change people's lives and learning how to play an instrument in order to practice music, will help them to improve them as a person.The second reason is that nowadays it is very easy to find people willing to play an instrument. As stated previously, playing an instrument bring a lot of benefits, which make people have the desire to play them. However, it is very hard to find a place to learn them, and for this reason, building a place to teach people will result in a great amount of people willing to learn. Furthermore, it will atract young people to that place and they will have the opportunity of improving their skills and enjoy playing it.The third and last reason is that it is enjoyable to play an instrument. Since ancient times, people admire music independent in the period of time they live. For example, two centuries ago people enjoyed a lot classical music and people would come to concerts to listen to them. Even though people nowadays do not enjoy classical music as before, people are still looking for ways to learn an instrument. This happens because playing them is fun and enjoyable. People feel good while playing an instrument and it awakens their creativity.In conclusion, building a place in order to teach people how to play an instrument will help them a lot to develop their brains, it will atract many people to play, and it is enjoyable. For these three reasons people should also consider the idea of building a place like this. People will find a way to improve them as people. Also, music open doors and people who play it will aquire the multiple benefits that comes with it.

column4: Better public transportation should be implemented in my city because where i live there is an increasing number of students every year and public transportation is very poor here. For example if a student missed the bus they have to wait for at least 15 to 20 minutes when the next bus comes, or if they want to travel to a different city and they miss the train, they will have to wait for an hour, which makes imposible to be on time once they missed the first train.Some of the benefits that it would bring to society is the flexibility of the schedule of the buses and trains that would make transportaion easy for students. In addition student would prefer to take the public transportation because it would be cheaper and convinient for them, whic would be an advantage because the usage or cars would decrease, therefore; levels of pollution would decrease too.By improving public transportation students performance would improve too because student who do not have a car would me able to move from one part to another faster. column4: I lived all my life in Lima, Peru. I love my city but it needs urgently a little bit of order, people of my age right now are not the same of the last generations, we are having too many obstacles in our lifes, and I will give specific examples of that.The first reason is that the cops in my city are very corrupt, you can buy them so easily, nowadays too many teenagers are in drugs or pregnant and that is beacuse there isn't a restriction for them to buy durgs or alcohol or to enter to a motel, if we let them to do this kind of things that aren't good even for adults what can we expect that teenagers won't do it.Another reason is that the goverment doesn't worry about our education, sadly in my country if you don't have enough money to be in a private school you won't be able to have a good education. Most of the people from small cities or poor sides of my country and city don't have even a school near their houses, and if the parents didn't have a good education eighter, they will never encourage their own children to go to the school. The president and goverment need to focus in what is more important for the next generations in our country.The last reason but not less important is that in my city most of the people can't find a good job even with a profession, the normal profit for a peruvian is 800 soles that in dollars is around 250, with we can barely mantain ourselves, this make people to travel abroad looking for more opportunities, but even to travel we need money and visa that is also hard to find. We need opportunities in our own country, in our city, we need to be able to have a family and live in calm.If we continue like this our country is going to break, we need to do something for poor people right now, we need to build more schools everywhere and with a good structure for children, we need to make a diference for the next generations if we want a succesful city, we have a lot of potencial that that we doesn't know how to control, we can have more teenagers working and studying than in drugs if we do something for them.

column4: Most people in Macau are not well educated becasue everyone works at the hotel or cansinos, they think they do not need to get high education and they can get a well pay job. This is a main problem for people around 18 to 26 years old. The best way to help or fix this issue is the goverment to provide more scholarships for people whom wants to study or get a higher degreen. Scholarship can help students love school more and withouth worries, and it can help students want to become a good model to others and help them to understand the improtant of schooling. First, scholarship can help people focus on study and do not need to worry about money. For exmaple, tuition is very expensive for most students, students need to spend time to work more than 25 hours to earn meony to support them self to keep living and schooling. Studnets have many fee need to pay each month, such as: rent, insurance, food, gas, books etc. Those fees are a burden for students. If the goverment can provide more scholarships for students, students do not need to work too long to support them self, they will have more time to study, it helps them to do well on tests, get a better scores and enjoy their student's life. Scholarships can help students become a happy and hard working student.Scholarship can motivate people want to study and help them understand the improtant of education. When people know that they can get scholarship from the goverment, they will think about why they need to go to scool, why the goverment will provide scholarship for them, and  what are the reasons behind for the scholarship. People will think more deeply and want to find the answer. When people know that education is very improtant for them, it can change their lifes. They want to go to school and study more. On the other hand, they know that if they go to school, they can get scholarship from the goverment, they will try harder and study harder to get in to schools. Also, when those hard working students around theri friends, it helps their friends understand the improtant of school, they will want to become like them too, they will study hard as them. Because of this, scholarship can has a good influent for the students and the society. It can studnets to be motivited and be passion about school.In conclusion, one of the best ways to help Macau's goverment to improve is to provide more scholarship to students. It can hlep students easy to focus on school without worries. Also, it can make students have a better understand about the vaule of edecation. It can help students have a disire to get higher edcuation and become a good example to other people.

column4: Outline: Thesis: My city needs more spaces to do outdoor activities, because it is important spent our time with exercises and enjoying the nature.TS #1: My city needs more spaces to do outdoor activities, because is important spent our time with exercies.TS #2: My city needs more spaces to do outdoor activities, because is important enjoying the nature.                                                                                                                                                                   Improvements in my City                       All the cities around the world have special carachteristics and some of them need improvements. My hometown in Brazil is my favorite city in the world, because I was born there and I my family live there. However, my city is not perfect; it has some social problems and its structure is not good in many points. We have social, political and economical problems, but I am pretty sure that we can change this situation and make my city a better place to live with our families. My city needs more spaces to do outdoor activities, because is important spent our time with exercises and enjoying the nature.                        My city need more spaces to do outdoor activities, because is important spent our time with exercises. Sometimes, in my city, I want to go to the park with my dog, but I do not have options to enjoy my free time. My city does not have special spaces to play sports or just walk around. In my opinion, it is a problem, because it is important to do exercises everyday. When we do physical exercises, we can improve our health and we can be more happy. I think that everyone needs to do exercies at least three times each week.                        My city needs more spaces to do outdoor activities, because is important enjoying the nature. Enjoying the nature, listening the music of birds, watching the sunset, and breathing pure air are the best things to do during the outdoor activities. However, my city does not have spaces to do these things and I always miss this aspect. In my opinion, the government have to invest in more spaces, because people can be more happy and they can have more quality of life. The nature is one of the best things in the world and we need to enjoy it wisely.                        Doing exercises and enjoying the nature is important in our life, and because that my city needs more spaces to do these activities. I am pretty sure if this improvement will be do, people can be happier and certainly they will have more quality of life. I think that the population can reivindicate this improvement to government and then my city can be a better place to live. I love my city and I miss it everyday, but I have more quality of life in the United States and my willing is that my city can be good like Provo, for example. All the cities needs some improvements and in my opinion we can make this improvements by ourselves, because we always need to reivindicate this points.

column4: Every city needs improvement for the sake of their civilians, but my city needs a lot of improvement on the streets. The improvement that the city needs on the street is fixing the following problems that can be include in one category and have the following sub categories, first  fixing holes on the road, fixing the sidewalks, and replace the signals on the street. First, the roads in santiago de Chile, have a lot of really deep holes on the street. Some people do not even buy cars that are close to the ground, because the holes will make their cars have a lot of trouble. Also, the trouble gets bigger when it comes to the winter, because people who drive can not see the deep holes and their cars feelt on the holes, so it is worse on winter than on  other seasons. On the other hand, fixing this problem will help civilians to not have to take their cars to the repair shop so often. Also, will help people to do not have accidents while trying to evade the holes. Second, fixing the sidewalks would be a really big improvement. Santiago has a lot of old people, this means that having old people with bad sidewalks will develop eventually in a lot of accidents for these people. Also, the sidewalks in bad condition makes people be obligated to walk on the street wich can develop in people being run over by cars. Fixing the condition on the sidewalks not only will provide a safe place to walk for older people, also will provide more safety for the population. Third, the replacing of the signals on the street it is a fundamental improvement when it comes to street improvement on the street. First, replacing the signals that got run over, lost or stealed is the first thing that the city should do. Second, putting new signals where it should be signals where there are not. On the other hand, these improvements will have a really good impact on people, but not only people, also on the drivers. Fixing and putting new signals will help drivers to drive more carefully and safe, and will help people to know where they should cross the street or do certain things. To conclude, the improvements that the city of santiago de Chile should to on their streets are fixing the holes on the road, fixing the sidewalk, and fixing the signals. These improvements will have a good impact on people not only on short but also on long term.

There are too many countries where  education it is not implemented, also becouse of the poverty of some countries people dont have the money to pay a good education. In addition  there are some countries where women are forbited to achieve education. The consecuencues of this  impact in the society with a slow evolution of their economy and alows to encrease the levels of violence, I think the best solution of these problems is free education and also gave the youngest the opportunity to persue them with iqual opportunities.        Second, education  fortifie the self steam and reduce the violence in a country. I think when people is educated, have the opportunity to learn and make questions about polics, culture and morality, this questions make the human being more vulnerable tho change their actitudes about certain topic and sometimes to modefice their behavior. In addition  the cities with a higer level of education has a low percentage of violence on the streets and llow percentage of people on jail.  I think violence in my country may have and end if the goberment implement programs  related to free education, this could be beneficial for reduce the rates of violence and empower the self steam of the yungest.        In conclution, there are many neccesities that needs to be resolve in my country but one of the most important neccesities are related with education. If the goverment implement this free education the percentage of poverty and violence will reduce and more people will have the tranquility to walk on the streets and also a free education will proviede the knwoledge the the youngest people need to reduce poverty by the implemantation of social, cultural and politics proyects.

column4: Nowadays, there are some problems in my country such as getting a job, entering the university, or something. Also, these problems need to change. So, I want to talk about these problems and that need some solutions or change what I want to. There are some reasons and examples.      First of all, people want to get a job. However, it is not easy. Many companies don't want to hire many employees because now the companies' economic aren't good. Also, the companies want people who have a lot of higher skills such as English skills or computer one, and something. So people have to get a lot of skills. For example, one of my friends who prepared for getting a job don't have English skills. Also, she wanted to be hire the company. But, the company didn't want to hire her beacuse she doesn't have that. So, she had to prepare for English skills and get a interview about a job again. Therefore, I think that the companies need to decrease about their hiring standards.     Secondly, nowadays people want to take a rest or enjoy their life. But, in my country, there are just a few things or places that people can enjoy when they have an enjoyable time. For instance, my friends and I wanted to enjoy the holiday when we was able to take a rest. But, we couldn't decide to go where we took a rest because there was nothing that we could go. So, we was so sad and we had to spend time with nothing to do. So, I think that my country need to make some places that people can enjoy something.      Lastly, now students want to go to the university. But, nowadays, entering university' standards are increasing. So most of the students have to study a lot during theire high school's life. So, many students want to apply university easily. Therefore, I think that univerisities need to make diverse ways about apply to schools. Also, it can give many opportunities to students.      For these reasons, people can get some benefits from these changes. Also, they can get a job easier than before there is change. Then, they can enjoy their time or holiday with specific things. Next, students can apply the university what they want with many diverse chances. So, I think that these changes that are getting a job,making a place that can enjoy something, entering the university can make a better than before there are these changes in my country.

column4: One improvement that would my city a better a place  for people to live in my age is to have more opportunities for finding a job. column3: Right now I am living with my two roomates, Andre and David. It is really interesting to live with them because I have learned so much with them. They have good personality and skills and they are always trying to help me with the things that I need. We have a good relationship and I am glad for that because it would be terrible to live with people that you do not like.David is a student person, he is smart and he works a lot. Andre spend most of his time doing projects in the university, he is a smart guy and also it is hard to see him during the week. column4: What improvement would make Sao Paulo a better city? Sao Paulo is a huge city located in the south of Brazil. Most people know Sao Paulo as one of the biggest cities in the world. I am from Sao Paulo and I know several places there. Some people knows Sao Paulo as a 'city that never sleep' because you can find  several entertaining places to go does not matter the time. If you want to eat something fancy, tasty, or healthy, you can eat does not matter the time. Of course that all cities in the world are not perfect and they need some improvement, especially  talking about a big city. If you watch the news, the traffic and the violence are always notice. Sao Paulo needs to improve the traffic and the security.The traffic in Sao Paulo needs to improve a lot. Fifteen million of people lives in Sao Paulo right now and can you imagine how to drive is with that high number of people? Is not easy and it is totally stressful.  The worst part is that people sometimes buy more than one car, and the traffic get worse everyday. It is not easy to spend at least one hour driving to your work every day. People there are not happy with this situation and for sure, the city needs to do something to improve this issue. In my opinion, to resolve this problem, the government should set a new law that prohibit people to buy more than one car. Doing that, the number of cars would decreased and the traffic would flow more. The security in Sao Paulo is one of the negative characteristic of the city. The violence in my city has increased  every day and that affects people not just with my age, but people with all ages. The statistics show how Sao Paulo is becoming one of the most dangerous cities in the america. That is a sad statistic because Sao Paulo has a impressive history of people who used to work and people who used to live in peace. In my opinion, the government should hire more police to help the violence decrease. In conclusion, people in my age  are suffering in Sao Paulo because of the traffic and violence. Of course that exists several other issues to improve in my city. People needs to do something about it like protesting or talking to the government to make it some improvement possible. It is sad to see how big cities are destroyed by the violence and how stresfull traffic affects every one.

column4: Many could say that Bogota needs a big arena to hold great shows. For instance, they argue that a big arena would led young people attend to great concerts of famous international artists. Nevertheless, Bogota needs a new big library. In fact, there are two aspects that would improve in the live of young people with a new big library. Having a better place to study, and having  access to a better literature are some of these aspects.   First of all, a new big library would give young people in Bogota have a better place to study. There are small libraries in Bogota where young people could go to study. However, a big library would give young people a more comfortable place to study. To illustrate this, a new big library could have better appliances that woul help young people improve their studies. In addition to that, a new big library with better computers would improve the young people experience while learning. For instance, new computers led young people learn faster and better.   The second reason is that a new big library would give young people access to a better literature. Young people in Bogota needs a new space with an extensive literature collection. For example, having access a better literature would help young people be more prepared for university and grad school. Additionally, young people have to adquire a habit of reading, and a big new library would help doing so. For instance, if young people have a good selection of books, they would be more likely to select a book that they want to read.     In conclusion, it is imperative that Bogota would have a new big libray. Having a better place to study is very necessary for young people. Also, having access to a better literature would help young people creationg good habits. For these reasons, the government in Bogota should build a new big library as soon as possible.

column3: People around us have a strong impact in our lives. In my personal experience, I could be able to feel a strong influence from my roommates. Living in a different country with different culture and costumes has brought many sweeping changes to my personality. I learned to be more humble and patient and all thanks to my roommates. They all are from this beautiful country and I am the nonly girl from Latin America. They are so interested about our culture and that is something that I totally appreciate. I am the person that works earlier at home. The rest start working at 8 am so usually the bathroom gets a little crowded from 6:30 to 7:30. My roommates used to saying that they admire my efforts for working that early  and going to school right after my work shift. They try to make me feel better and are always aware of me. I have been influenced for thei attitude to contribute with  everything they can to create a good environment where you can feel like home. Since they are so respectful and kind I try to do my best to follow their example. Some of them likes joking and others are more serious but when time to support each other commes they never hesitate. I totally love the people whom I live with.
column4: Public schools have been criticised for a long time in my country. Citizens used to compalining about the way public schools provide the necessary for students to enjoy a good environment for learning. Most people agree that many improvements should be done in order to improve public schools education. This improvements would have a strong impact in the way how people of my age can use tools for making their learning meaningful. Some people has shown some solutions to this problem. The first one is about paying a certain amount of money to the school where their child goes. This payment will be used for that school to make improvements such as new equipment, building modifications and so on which would beneficiate students to have a better environment around them for learning. However, some say that they pay enough taxes to the government to agree paying even more so this solution was considered not feasible for most of the people. Second, having programms or activities sponsored for any private company to gather money to destinate to school improvements. This solution got more support than the last one. This propose was putted into practice during a short amount of time. Certainly many schools were able to gather enough money to accuire more computers and expand their computer labs. Others, destinated that money to buy some books for students whose possibilities were less than others. This possibility has increased the number of child that are not able to pay for their education but decided to go to school and take advantage of this opportunities.  Finally, asking for donations. Some schools tried to ask for international donations which for some resulted successful.  Those schools refered to their own system as 'poorly supported by the government' as a strategy for calling the attention of international institutions. This strategy tried to reach the simpathy of the people and have them donate some money for the cause. As explaned before, for some schools this has been a successful plan. However, my country's  education's reputation decreased in great  manner internationally. Schools paid the opportunity cost of using this strategy. Getting a better education could be greatly influenced by the environment where you study or the equipment you use to make it possible. Having better resources to use can change the way you learn in short and long term positive consequences as explained before. Thankfully many solutions have been already putted into practice to reach this goal.

column4: Having a great job can cause many good effects in Itabuna city. Any big city requires factories, industries and companies because young peole would stay and help Itabuna becomes the richest city in Brazil. To explain better why jobs would be the most important factor that would cause a great impact, it is necessary to point out three important things, such as Itabuna has a great university, it has many people living here, and it has history.                       First of all, students would think twice about leaving Itabuna if it had opportunities of work. We all know that the University of Itabuna is one of the best in Brazil, but where are these students? why they do not stay here? The lack of opportunities of job makes these smart students go out of our cities.They need a good job in which will offer a comfortable life, and Itabuna should bring more companies and factories in order to hold these students. Furthermore, the University helps a lot giving a great education and preparing them to become good leaders. If they stay here, we will have positives effects. For example, if engineers stay in Itabuna, they will build great houses and buildings. Also, they will help our city to be more clean. Thus, offering good jobs will hold our smart students in itabuna.                       Secondly, Itabuna has one of the biggest population in our state. This number of people would be very useful in our bussinesses, which relies a lot of workers. If we bring companies and factories, our economy will warm. Creating jobs is the best ways to prevent unemployments, and our people will have ways to afford their necessities without help from public programs. Itabuna does not take advantagens from having a vast population in the state. Many people from everywhere come to Itabuna to buy their necessties, and build their own bussiness in their cities. In fact, creating jobs for our population will help a lot our city to become richer.                       Tird, many people come to Itabuna to visit because of its history. As we all know, people from everywhere come here to learn about Brazil's history. Itabuna does not have some system in which we can make money from this. We should create better hotels for these people, and them they would come back. Also, we should have some kinds of activities, such as cultural parties. Hence, these people would love to come back creating good relationship with our city, and this would also create jobs for our students.                       In conclusion, we can see that creating jobs is one of the improement that our city needs to do, and this improvement would help a lot of sectors, namely Itabuna has a great university, it has many people living here, and it has history. Our city has a lot of potencial, and we need to start think about enhancing this sectors now.

column4: Governments can develop different plans and strategies for the progress of a country, province, city, town, etc.  My city is one of the most important cities of my province. However, the city development has been very slow the couple last years. I think one improvement that would make my city a better place to live would be new technology. Technology would help people to have a better education and to increase jobs opportunities.First, technology would help to have a better eduaction because it would help to the students to learn faster all the subjects. Using videos, movies, computers, etc the class environment could be more dynamic and fun. This method would permit the students to comprehend  the class and retain more information in their brains. For example, my friend's math class was really hard to understand for her, until her teacher start to use a computer program during the class. Techonology in my city would help in academical success.  Second, techonology would increase jobs opportunuties. Every company needs to acelerate the production  in order to get more incomes. Technology allows to the companies to produce more in less time. With this implement, companies would need more employees to manipulate the machines. For instance, when one company introduced new equipments, they  would hire more people to train and to  work with them. The benefit of technology in my city would have a significant impact because it will help people to get a good job. In conclusion, technology would make my city a better place to live for people of my age because it would help people to have a better education and it would increase job opportunities. Technology would help all the people to have a better academic preparation in order to respond favorable to the globalization changes in the society.

column4: One thing that can be better in my city is public trasportation, to build new routes and put more buses specificly for students. On the other hand, the japanese guys have the tradition to keep everything clean, so they have their own acessories and they do not like to share them. column4: There are many problems that Sao Paulo is facing to, especially regarding public transport. Everyday and everynight the traffic is huge, increasing the stress and violence inside the society. They face a lack of organization, causing too much problems and barely no solutions. For that reason, if they start to think how they can solve these challenges, they will find more peace and a great development in the society. Besides many reasons, if they organize a cheaper way to rent a car, and having specific days to allow cars to drive, it can be a good beginning for solving all problems.         First, The process to rent a car is universal, however, some places are more expensive than others. The economy in Sao Paulo is pretty high; it means that renting a car can be more expensive than getting a public  bus. Therefore, if the government starts reducing the price of rental cars,  it will be acessable for everyone to get a car, being less stressed about the violence. In opposition, there will be more traffic in avenues, causing more pollution and other problems. In summary, it is very important for the society, changing public busses for rental cars. The organization starts being easier to have.          Next step is about specific days that cars can be driven on the city roads. Sao Paulo is the biggest city in Brazil; in other words, there are many people that depend of car or public bus to work or study. Then, traffic occurs because many people need to leave at the same time. For that reason, if the government creates a control method of cars driven around the city, there will be a great progress for everyone. Such as specific number car tags cannot drive on Mondays, or all cars that have the number six as the last number, these cars cannot drive. In opposition, even though there will be this law, many people will break or even ignore it. Nevertheless, there will be more organization and less traffic on the roads and avenues.          In Conclusion, Sao Paulo need to be fixed for many reasons; but if the government starts the process to have cheaper cars to rent, and the control methods of cars, it will be possible to see a evolution of this society. There will be a significant decrease of violence and stress. With these methods in action, everyone can be happier to do their things and the government can worry with important things and better resources to help the society for being safer and more comfortable.

column4: In our days many people want to be healthy, and for this reason, more people go to the gym. In my city, we do not have a gym, and almost half of the population has to go to another city in order to go to the gym. In my city, a gym would be an significant improvment, especially for people of my age so that they can stay healty, and they can become better at sports. The first reason in wish a gym would be an improvement in my city is that people need to go somewhere to stay healthy. In fact, exercising help considerably the body to eliminate bad substances in the body. It also, by wheight lifting,  help muscles become stronger. Moreover, People become more attractive when they practice sport in a gym. All these reason help people become healthier and not fatter. For example, If people just stay at their home they will become fat and they will not be attractive as they could, and they also may have some health problems. Another reason is that if my city open a gym,  people and specially young people of my age will be able to improve their skills in different kind of sports. Furthermore, they will be able to specialised in the sports they wants because they will be able to go more often in the gym as the gym will be in the city and so closer. They will not have to go far away in another city to find a gym. For instance, if the gym is in another city, young people will struggle to go there often because of transportation problems, or waste of time during the trip. Moreover, they will become better at sport because many young people of my age in my city do not practice sports, and if a gym open, they will be able to practice sport and find some hidden talents that they possess. Some of them may pactice gym until they become olympic champions.In conclusion, the potential immediate that a gym will generate in my city, is that people will all start to speak about it and they will all stop to go in other city to go to the gym, it will withdraw some traffic in the streets and they will also be more people wlaking in the city to go to the new gym. The long-term consequences of this improvement is that people in my city will become healthier and that young people of my age will become better at sports and might become Olympic champions.

column4: Mexico city is one of the most bigest cities in the world; as a result, the air pollution is a common issue in that city. The city has almost 25 million people whit millions of cars, factories, and industries producing air pollution. The city needs urgent chances in its policies in order to improve the environment. The two main changes that can be done are regulate the trafic, and improve the public transporttion.    The government should make some chances to improve the movement of the cars in the city. A single person can spend more than 1 hour in trafic every day wasting gasoline and time. The goverment should try fix and improve the time and the link among the stop lights. This could save time and energy needed for cars. In addition, the goverment should ask to police officers to accelerate and improve the transit of cars in the most transitated avenues. This two simple but effective actions could improve the movemet of cars in the cities making the air cleaner for population.    Also, the public transportation mus be improved and increased to serve to the population and save energy. Public transportation is something that can save time, space, and energy through takeing many people in it with the same direction. It is well known that no all the people share their car but public transportation can be shared betwen many people. Governmens should facilitate  enough public transportation to save energy and keep clean and avoid the air pollution.    Regulate the trafic, and improve the public transporttion are the two main changes that the government could to improve the air quality. The government should fix the stop lights, and increase the ammount of police officers in order to keep the movement of the cars. Second, public transportation should be improved to save energy. This changes are somethings I would like to do to improve in my home city.

column4: Choose the right.A lot of young people don't have orientation today and this is hard to see. I have analized this situation and I found that we have a problem with the time and with our education. I know if we choose the right, we will have more success in our lives.When I was in High School, frequently I saw young people doing bad choices. For example, once I saw a guy stealing the food of other boy and then he sold the food to other people, but this was not the only thing that I saw, I feel that I was wasting my time doing 'nothing'. We had a lot of free time and we was spending time in things that will not bring us the success that everybody wants. This is a big problem when you do not use your time with wisdom.Many studies have been listed with a lot of differents topics about the problems of the young people. The Usco University recognized that their were teaching the teory of each carrer but they needed to add another topic and subject to teach, 'Use Your Time With Wisdom'. I was studing there when it was created and I helped the university to do activities and projects for them. I proposed that the university could have a laboratory open all the day and avery day of the week. Then, we had more young people participating of the laboratory and they were not smoking, taking drugs at the park or in partys having sex, they were studying and practice at nights what they learned in the morning.Other thing that was so important in this process was the kind of education that the High Schools gave to the young people and how the High Schools prepared the students for the University. With the activities that we did, I decided to meet the teachers of each School of the city with the students and let the students tell them what they need to be prepared for the University.The University got to rescue a lot of young people who were losting theirs degree with the activities and projects that we did. We saw an increase of 46% more young people in class room and getting the certificates and the bachelor degree.I know that these projects could help other cities to have more people prepared to do the jobs that cityneeds and then we will have a lot of young people choosing the right.

column4: Recife is a small city in the heart of Brazil , there are a lot of beach there, and most of the time the weather is really hot. Also, you have many outdoor activities that you can do with your family or alone. In Recife, people have a lot of facilities to use, such as public service. For example, you can take a bus for wherever you want and you only need to pay 1 dollar for this service. However these things, we have a huge problem in my city. One of this problem that need to fix is with the security. Recife is very dangerous place, specially if you are  a tourist.     In Recife the case of violence are rate a lot, specially during the important holidays, such as Christmas or New eyear. The people are scarry to stay out of their homes after 10 p.m.There are some things that the gorvenment could do to improve this situation. First of all, focus on educational system, specially with the young people, In Brazil, many young people do not want to go to school, and they do not have a good education, so in a couple years this people probably will not find a job and then they going to start to do bad things to obtain money. So, if the government focus on this, probably the number of violence will be low in a couple years.     Second, The government needs to invest more in the police, hiring more policemen and provide to them an effective trainment, so they will be able to work correctly with the thieves. Also, it is very important have a good tools to work againts the crime. Nowadays, in Recife the police do not have good tools to fight against the crime. So, it is necessary that government provides good tools for the police or the cops will never be efective against the thieves.For example, if the cops have a good technology to work they will be able to recogonize and find faster the crimers and put them in the jail. This improvement will have an immediate result against the violence in this beautiful city.      As we see , In Recife we have a big problem with the crime, and we have two things that we need to work to solve this problem.First of all, work with educational system, specially with the young people, in this case we will prevent for the future because this young people could be the future thieves of our society, if we o not take care about them. Second , and the immendiate consequences. The government needs to provide more cops to the police and better tools to cops, so they will be able to work better and effectivily than now.

column3: I'm currently living  with my brother and his wife . They are great people. They have 5 years married and they have a really interesting schedule. column4: The cities in Mexico are beautiful, but they have some huge security problems. Teenagers and Adults from 18-30 years are getting involved on this situations. Some people said that placing the criminal on jail would make better the society,but the real improvement would be if the goverment could set some educational rules for  people on this ages and also their parents. Education will always be the solution for all the problems of society, and an honest team that could verify the rules that could be setted will provide a hug impact in Mexico. Education will always be the solution for all the problems of the society. Where we grow up, were we live, who we are related to, and the type of ambiance were we live makes a huge impact in our lives. If you live in an area were they have the culture to study and become someone that could help the society, you probably wont notice the other part. Teenagers that live in an area that the best way to gain money is stealing or hurting others, would have a different mind, and would probably dont't care about studying and improving  their way to live. For example, a margin area in Mexico is Tepito, an area were they steal, consume illegal substances, etc. doesn't have the same level of education as  Santa fe, an other rich area from the same city. If tepitos people don't have the same oportunities they would probably become bad people. Education can change the world once we take the chance to experiment its benefits.Rules or laws are needed to control the people in all the countris , but it is more important to have a good team that could verify the laws apliance. A law that allows teenagers to study instead of being 'free' and work in something that they don't deserve is needed. For example, In The United States, it is required for all teenagers to study. It is not optional. If a teenager is not studing or is having problems with attendance, the school and event the state could punish the stundents' parents. The develompent starts on or early years of life. Those laws and a good team that control them would help the society to have a sane generation of teenagers and adults that would take care of themselves and their families in the future. The law along with the education are the perfect combination to at least have a major pecentage of develompent in a country.  It is neccessary that Mexico could set this kind of laws, but also provides the level of educatin that all the Mexicans deserve. Corruption is a bad phenomenon in Mexico. column4: The people who in my age are all facing a big problem: the working time is too long to do anything else. That is not only because the bad situation of labor right but also the extreme high price of the houses in Taiwan. The way to solve this problem is to increase the wage of the labors as high as the other countries where the labors can produce the same quality products as Taiwaneses labors.In the field of manufactur, Taiwan is a great brand for the products. The output with MIT, which means 'made in Taiwan', always is high quality and in affordable price. That is because the labors in Taiwan usually have good education and are honest to their companies. However, even though they create the world-class performance, labors in Taiwan can not receieve a fair wage. The GDP of Taiwan is keeping increasing for more than thirty years. However, the average income of the employers is consistent for sixteen years. The contribute of the labors does not reflect on their salary. In order to support their family spend, young employers have to work for a long time. Although they work more than sixty hours per week, that is twelve hours per day, five days a week, the salary still can not afford to buy an apartment in urban area such as Taipei and Shinchu.If the wage of the labors is increased, young parants won't have to work as long as now. They will have enough money to support they life and have time to compatant with their children, so that they can save some money from babysitter or privant schools, which offer more care to the kids than public school. And if people who do not need to work for very long, they can spend more time on the traffic. Therefore, young people want to live far away the center of the city. And it will cause the price of the apartments in the city decrease. Without the press of the loan of the house, people will have more freedom to spend money. It is not a benefit for the people whose salary is increased but also for the economy of the whole society. In sum, to increase the salary for the labors in Taiwan has a lot of benefits. It can resolve the problem that the lowest brith rate. It also can stop increasing the price of the apartments in the city. The people in my age will be happier than now.

column4: Fortaleza is one of the best city to live in the planet because its people is very kind and solidary. It is very famous for the funny artists and beautiful beaches. Increasing the security and minimizing the traffic are some ares that require a fast improvementThe first improvement should be in the security area. Fortaleza has a high rate of crimes and thiefs. Also, people between 20 and 30 used to hangout a lot with friend and used to return very late to home what make very dangerous. If the government invest more on security people would go enjoy friend more relaxed than actualy. Additionally, this actions should atract more people to the city, increasind the turism rates. However, every year the number of people and cars grow and roads do not have space for all cars. Many people spend more than 4 hours per day driving to work and home. This is so much time to spend inside the car. If the government do not change or make a improviment people will lose a important time of their lives. Also, parents will have more time to spend with their children, and they will have a better education with the presence of their parents.An improvement on the traffic and security will make Fortaleza a better city to people who lives there and people who want know to know one of the most beautiful city in the world.

column3: I am getting married in 8 days. That is why my family came from Mongolia to attend my wedding. Right now, I am living with my dad, mum and younger brother. column4: I believe that younger generations are the future of the country. If I list only one improvement that would make my city a better place to live for people who are my age is job positions. They will work hard and will enjoy what they do. I want to mention few things: First, If it happens someday, the city they live will be much better place to live. Most young people who have such desire to work hard and they have such a good ideas to develop their city, state and country. Those people bring such bright future to the city where they live.Second, there will be many educated people who will work for their companies, businesses and even for the government. For example, they are always on time, they listen to their leaders, boss and supervisors. They are fast learners and motivated souls. Young people are the future of country.

column3: During these days I have been living with roommates. They are from diiferent cities and countries, let 's start with Daivid. column4: My city is Arequipa, it is in Peru, South America. This beautiful city is in the south of Peru, and it have been considered one of the most wonderfull places in Peru. However, it does not mean that this city doesnt need some improvments. Especially for youger people who need this improvments, they will recieve more benefits. Thus, these improvments are infraestructures and education.Infraestructure is one of the most important features to develop in one city. column3: Currently, I live in Provo because I'm studying in English program at BYU. I live with my brother, Keng. I love him so much, and I chose to live with him because a lot of reasons. We are growing up together, and he is like my best friend. He said that he came to United States because of two reasons. First, he wanted to learn English so that when he will go back to Thailand, he can get a great job as a teacher but with higher pay because of English skills. Second reason that he came here is because of me. He said that he wants to spend more time with me before he will get married. If I could give some words to describe him, 'kind, diligent, funny, loving' would be those words. He loves to do fun things outside, but also he loves to be inside as well. He loves watching movie, spending time with me, and studying hard. He reads a lot about biology because that is his goals, which is to go back and continue to be a teacher. He is my idol, and I love him so much.
column4: Improvement is very important act that human can make. We know that we are not perfect, and we are still making mistakes, but improvement is the way that we can be better; improvement is the way that we change our mistakes to our strengths and make them better. People try to improve all the time as well as country and city. I live in Udonthani, Thailand, and there are many things that we can improve to make this city better, especially for students my age in schools. Some people think that giving more money to students in school can make schools and students better. However, I think that changing one little rule of schools can make a lot of differences, which is school should let their students to wear their outfit freely and do not use school uniform anymore. Students that can wear whatever they want, will perform better and will be happier.           Making schools to be without their uniforms can help with the performance of their students. Students that can wear whatever they like to school tend to perform better in their learning and their knowledge. A lot of research confirm that people that can wear anything they like to their test will perform their tests so much better than people that need to wear what people needed them to wear. I agree with this. The example that I saw obviously is the international school in Thailand. There, people can wear anything to their schools, and they are more confident. They learn faster than my school, and they are a top five school in Thailand. According to this exasmple, I believe that students that do not wear school uniform perform better.        Making schools to be without their uniforms can help their students to be happier. This can be proved with many research as well. I believe that one of the goals of many schools is seeing their students being better and happier in their lives. So, I know that if we can wear anything to school can make us be happier. For example, when I was in Thailand, I tried to like my school uniform and thought that it was there for some good reasons. However, in one summer, I went to Bangkok and attended at International school there. I loved their so much and I felt a lot happier because I could wear anything there, and my grades were better as well.          In summary, making school not to have uniforms can help their students to be happier and can help with the performance of their students. Changing this little rule can make a lot of better differences for my city. I believe that changing this can help students in their individual performance and their individual happiness. Making school to not require their students outfit can also help their society to be happier and more successful. Moreover, this little change can develop to the success for the nation. I have a strong believe that everything would be so much better without school uniforms.

column3: This semester was the best with my roommates. Everyone says, and I also think that my apartment is the mos diverse in the whole Riviera. We are 6 people living there, and all from different countries. There is a girl from Africa. Her name is Tata. She is pretty tall and thin. The other roommate is from Japan, she is a very cute girl. Also, there is a girl from Brazil. Her name is Thiffany and she is one of my favorites roomates. she speaks Spanish, maybe that's why we get along better. The other two girls are Americans. I really love them. They are always helping me improving my English. We are all different, and because of that we are very close friends. We are alwasy busy, so we mostly see each other at nights. Everyone works and study at the same time. However, we always find a time to spend together as a little family.
column4: Thinking about one improvement that will help my city being a better place to live is having more security. We all know that crime is everywhere, but to reduce crime and people being hurt it will be good to have police officers on streets. Some people may think it's not necessary, but it is. Two main reasons are the following: people will be protected and this will build trust in everyone.To begin, an innmediate consequence of having police officers on the streets will help people feel secure and protected. We all know that crime is a fact that can affect anyone. For example, today a robber decides entering in your house instead of your neighbor's house. Having police officers surrounding streets can help avoiding crime and bandalism. Everyone would feel secure and can enjoy spending time inside and outside their houses.Moreover, having police officers in every part of the town can help people build trust in others. They can give permission to their children to play outside their houses and meet new people. For example, parents would feel relaxed if their children are playing in the park that is a block away their houses. They would be friendly with other people they meet on the streets and also make good relationships. Last but not least, the entire community would feel safe. If they see police officers, they wouldn't be afraid. Altough there still being bad people with bad intentions, people will feel safe if they see a police officer close to them. All people need heroes, and that is why police officers exists. To take care of them and to stablish peace around the community they live.In summary, this will be the inmediate and long-term consequences of having more police officers in my town. This will not only help people of my age, but everyone. Having a strong security system in the streets will help improving good relationships with everyone. Small things in life would be enjoyed and everyone would live happier and safe having police officers close to them.

column3: people who live with me are very crucial parts of my lfe. All of them, my sister is the best friend in my family. For her apperances, my and her apperance are almost same, so many people said that we looks like twin. We have same hair style, eye shape, face shape, lip shape. However, we have different personalities. She is very sensitive, so she plans everything that she has to do. It is good characteristic for her because it makes her work hard. column4: Sometimes, small change makes the city much better, so it's better to think about the aspect that the city need to improve for us. It will be easy to think just one thing which can only help for your age. For universities' students, changing something for universities will make improvement for our city a better place to live. Therefore, the city need to try to cut universities' tuition because it will give students more chance to enjoy their lives, and makes them study more. As a result, it makes city much better place to live.Less tuition can give more chance to students for enjoying thier lives. It means that they don't need to work for their rest time, and they will have time to find their interests or hobbies. Students who attend national universities in their countries have more free time than others. For example, they make several activities by using money that they don't need to use their tuition. They make groups, enjoy their interests, and share thier hobbies. If they have to work after school, they won't be have time to these activities. It will helpful for city to get improvement because students are important sources of every country. They have a lot of potentiality to make city better in the long-term. It has positvie effects for individuals and societies.The improvement which cut the universities' tuition also makes students study more than before. Because they can save their money from their tuition, they can use that money for studying at other countries and going to academy. These can be the great benefits for students because there are so many students who can't go abroad due to money. For instance, if a student go to abroad, he or she will study English or other languages and get a lot of experiences of other countries. This student would have positive though about the city because it gave she or he special memories. Finally, if she or he gives her or his knowledge to the city, the city and the student can help each other.Because less tuition helps students our age to study and enjoy in better conditions, it's the best imovement for us. If the city have this change, many students want to go to the university in that city. This means that the city will have a lot of intelligent students, and it will be connected with city's improvement. Therefore, it is strongly recommended that cutting tuitions can be the best way in long-term to make the city a better place by having a lot of potential students who have many chances than other countries' sutdents.

column3: Since I moved to Utah I have been living with three roomates. They are awesome; in addition, one of them served his mission in my country and we are closed friends. I have really close relationships with my roomates; ergo, we spend time playing games, going to the gym, and watching movies.
