column4: What make a city a great place to live? Throughout history people have been striving to have a good quality of life. Improvements in the 21st century had been made in many aspects such as health, technology, and science. Nevertheless, recently data had showed that citizens needed to have a good transportations system in order to obtain a healthy existence. Having an effective transportations system will give my generation a better quality of life and maximize our development.Avoiding traffic in our highway system will give us the chance to save time and become more organize while dealing with our daily problems. In addition, people are going to be able to spend more time with their families and friends as well as doing extra curricular activities; for example, they are going to have more chance to eat breakfast with their family; instead of, running to get the bus or driving fast. Recently data has showed that having less problems in transportation help people to avoid anxiety and stress. Therefore, It will be great to have a great transportation system in my city in order to be mentally healthy. On the other hand, people might have other problem such as pollution made by transportations such as cars, trains, motocicles, etc. Moreoever, it is important to control gas emissions from the transportation vehicles. While technology advances improve, people will strive to have the best quality vehicles. Ergo, governments had made some policies for transportations business; in addition,  recenlty advances in technology had developed better engine systems in cars and trains; those advances are supported by many governments all around the globe. Therefore, researchers are working in order to formulate better transportations tools for our cities.In conclusion, having  a better quality of life wraps up many subjects such as health, spend time with your love ones, and be able to manage high technology systems. For all these reason, transportation is the most important point to focus on; changing the transportation system will allow us to become a high developing city as well as organize.

column3: When I was in the Dominican Republic I oviously used to live with my family. My family concists of six members. My mom and dad and my three siblings. I am the youngest in my family, so they all really loved me. I am the favorite son and brother. My dad is 53 years old he looks a lot like me, he is a business administrator, so he is the owner of colgate in DR.  but he has problems in his left knee so he can not do too much physical activity so he is a little overweight right now. My mother is the most beautifull woman on earth. She is also 53 but she seams younger than my dad, she is really short, has long black hear and big eyes. My first sister is the older, she is married and has five children. My next sister is 27 years old she has one baby boy and now is pregnant with tweens. Then my brother, who  is 26 years old and got married two years ago he still studying, so he not planning to have offspring right now.
column4: In the last years Puero Plata has been one of the places with more car accidents in the Dominican Republic. When children start to grow up they turn more adventurous. You must be sixteen yers old to be able to start driving. As soon as my friend and I turned Sixteen we took the test to be able to start driving. They usually give you the permission really easily, but in my oopinion this is not the prblem. They are the massively dangerous aspects of the roads in Puerto Plata that makes them so danegrous: the wether, lack of lights in the roads, and not enough Police officers.      First,  as you should probably know, the Dominican Republic is a tropical rain forrest so we have a lot of rain. When it is reaining the vission for drivers is really not the greatest. It is really difficult to drive with this circumstances because the roads are really thin, so you cannot see the cars that are coming twords you. This is very dangerous my parents would not let me drive when it was raining too much. Also our streets are not the best one because the rain causes many holes in it. When this holes are filled with water and you drive over them it is very easy to lose control and this ncreases the posibily of car accidents. The government should be really worried about this because each year many young people die because the roads are really irregular. With the implementation of better and modern materials in roads this will be realy well prevented.      Second, Puerto Plata is a really small city, most of our parents have their houses in the outside of the cities. when we started going to highschool we started to like to have fun going to the movies or just having dinner in the nights, after school. The outsides of the city are really dark and there is no loght in the streets. It is not hard to se other cars because the have light. The problem is with animals. There are usually many Cows, Horses and Dogs  that cause many accidents. I have lost many good friends because of car accidents in the dark nights of  Puerto Plata. Much more lights should be added not only arround the roads, but also light in the center to that they can see the divissions of each road.       Finally, one of the greatest problems with traffic in Puerto Plata is that we barely have Police Officers in charge of the traffic. They usually do not do their job. They usually go search for woman or spend the whole day drinking in a local bar and this is really sad and dessapointing. Many young people think that they can do whatever they want when they are driving, so they cause many accidents, not only to other young people, but also to adults and to entire families. This is really sad, but it is the relity. This is a problem of education. Anyone could be a oliceman where I live. Maybe if they were better trained and had a better salary they would be much more better in their job        Car accidents can be really tragic, dangerous and fatal. This is a sad reality of the place I live. Some times it just happens and you cannot blame anyone because the local wether is not the best wether for drivers. On the other hand it is really sad when a life is lost because some one was not being responsible , but muh more sad when they could have been saved, but no one was able to help them on time because the person in charged of that area was not doing his job. I know that if we had better officers and better roads many livescould be safe in Puerto Plata and in the Dominican Republic.

column4: Bus are so important in my country, but is it the bus the best alternative? One of the thing that a lot of people used every day when they need to go to work is the transportation, but there are many problem with the bus, for instance, the goverment need to spend more money to fix it because the buses are not comfortable, they are so expensive, and they always are broken.Many people used transportation when they need to go for some places as work, shopping, museum, park, etc; but there are a big problem with the buses because they are not comfortable, for instance, sometimes the chair when you sit are broken, or early in the morning there are a lot of people that used the transportation and you can moved in there, the buses are so crowded. Sometime you need to wait a long time to take a bus because the bus is full and you can't used it, and you lost many time. Also, the most common problem is when you want to leave of the bus, but there are many people so you can't do it. In fact, buses are so incomfortable in all moment and the goverment need to improve or spend more money to fix it.Buses are so expensive for normal workers. Some rich people said that buses need to be expensive because if you don't have car you need to spend more money in transportation. That is a bad idea because if the people don't have car is becase don't have money too, and can't pay it. Every year there are protest about the transportation because every year the buses are more and more expensive. The people protest because the buses are expensive but they are not comfortable or are broken. In sum, the goverment need to fix and reduce the price of the buses because each time the buses are more expensive and broken.The most commom problem with the buses is when they broke in the middle of the trip. It is a big problem because all people need to work and have a time to arrive at work, but sometimes they lost their work because arrive late, and that is because the buses are so old and broken. The buses are like 20 years old and they have a lot of problems. The most commom problems are flat tire, engine. In the same years could be happen a lot of time, that the bus has a problem and the workers need to wait for the next bus that take like 1 hour to arrive there. In conclusion, the goverment need to understand that they need to do change in the transportation because it is too old.In conclusion, goverment need to fix the old buses because if they fix the buses that are really broken the buses will be more comfortable. And if the bus is comfortable the people stay happy and they will not have problem to pay the price of the bus because it is the best alternative and give us a good service. If they do it the people will not protest again and the goverment will not have problem. They need to fix it and spend money.

column3: I usually lived with my shole family in Argentina. I have 4 sibilings Mahonri, who is married, Scott, James and Caitlin. Mahonri is the oldest in my family, he is married now and he has a child. When I was living with Mahonri was a fun time because he loves to play the guitar and sing songs of Alejandro Sanz, a Spanish singer. In addition, Mahonri is the funniest person in the worl, someone can spend the whole day withh him just laughing. Also, I lived with my brother Scott. That experience was literally delicious because Scoot is a proffesional baker. So, he usually brougth food from his work and school and he was practicing how to make different kind of desserts at my home. It was delicious. Furthermore, living with jmaes and Caitlin, the little ones of the family, was really sweet. I could learn many principles for life, that now I apply every day. In conclusion, living with all my 4 sibilings was one of the best experiences in my life because I could take all the virtues, qualities, and talents that they had and bring them with me. column4: There are many different changes that a city or country can do to improve the quality of life of their citizens. If people talk about  improvements, they will focus in different areas, such as, jobs and education.  For people in their twenties work and education are their main focus in life because they want to be prepared and be better to establish a family in the future. Linking this conceived idea with my own city, education is one of the greatest improvements that my city could make to be a better place to live for people my age. Definitely, this change will bring profund impact in our peruvian young society.               First, the city will decrease the number of illetrated people. In many different parts of my city people don't have the opportunity to go to school. At a young age, they need to start to work in farms or in agriculture. They don't learn how to write or how to read.  An example is a city named Pomacocha, in the mountanious part in my country . Children don't attend to shool because they don't have schools in their cities. Of course, if they continue doing the same work everyday, they won't have the opportunity to improve and change their lives. They receive a low payment for their hard work and they loose this time of their lives just working. Some years ago, the statistics in Peru showed that even though the technology has benefited many countries around the world, Peru still have many iletrated people because the government doesn't invest the money for a better education for these rural areas in my country. A visible investment in the education of this people could decrease the number of illetrated people in Peru.             Second,  young people will be able to go to the university and receive the education they deserve. Because the government doesn't invest the money for education, many smart and talented people can't attend to University. It have have been proven that only people who are wealthy are the only ones who can attend University in Peru. Private Univerities are really expensive and other universities have only some places for thousands of young people who need to study there. For example, the universitie of San Marcos is a university which is not private. This is a very good university , but they only accept a limited number of students and there are more than five thousands young people who want to be accepted. In the other hand, universities, such as, San Ignacio de Loyola or  San Martin de Porres are private. In this case, it is not difficult to be accepted by these universities, but they are highly expensive. In fact, people who are not wealthy doesn't have the opportunity to study there. An improvement in education could change this situation and help the young adults to attend  university and receive the education they deserve. In addition, they will be able to be better tools to foster the economy in the country.

column3: I am living in America for about a year and a half,  living with 5 roomates and sharing a room with one of them. Those girls that I live with are the best roomates that I have ever had in my short life. I met two of them here at the ELC, they were in my same class, and we studied together for all this time that we are here in Provo. Ingrid is from Chile and she is awesome! She likes to do outdoors activities and just hanging out with friends. Sariah is from Peru, and she is always dancing bachata and some other latin music. However, even if they are Latin they are white and most of all they love to laugh and to joke with people around them. They also study at the nElc with me and they work at the MTC as custodial. The others tree girls are American, their names are Ariana, Megan and Allyson. They tree have served the mission together in Brazil and even if they were from different parts of the USA, they decided to move together at Raintree to study at BYU.  They love studying, they are really smart and kind. Also, they always prepare food for us and inviting to participate in their activities with their friends. Ariana and Allyson are sisters and they study nursing, and Megan is studying political science, she would like to be a lawyer. I really like to live with them because they are really funny and outgoing, but most of all they are really kind people always thinking about others, they are a really good example for me.
column4: I live in an island in the south of Italy, is called Sardinia, and because is an island people do not have a lot of things comparing with other parts of Italy. An improvement that I would like to do and I think will help in many ways my city, would be :cheap air-transportation, illegal people that are lower paid and having  more places were people can have fun. Those changes in my opinion will help the economy in my country in many ways and a long-term consequence would be increasing jobs for people and more money in the pocket for all of them.First of all, I believe that would be great to have a cheap air-transportation like in other parts of Italy. In the past, we have had cheap air-transportation and a lot of people that I met in the past, went on different parts of Europe without spending a lot of money. In some part of Europe we have a company that is called ' Ryanair' and it is really cheap comparing with other companies. This company stopped to be in Sardinia and now people who live there, need to pay other companies that are really expensive. One example is that to go to Milan from Munich, would cost 40 dollars or less, but traveling from Milan to Sardinia is going to cost 160 or a price around that. With just this little change is going to help a lot of people in the island to help the economy to increase because seeing that are cheaper tickets they are going to travel more.Another change that I think would be great for the city were I live, will be more places to work. In Italy the economy is going not so good, and there are a lot of people that need a job to mantain their families. However, there are a lot of illegal people that are 'stealing' jobs and they have also do not make a lot of money. For that reason, people in my city can not found a job that is really high or normal paid. This problem is causing a lot of Italian people to earn less money that they should earn and not allowing them to have enough money to finish a month without worring about it. I think that if illegal people should not allow to be paid really a little bit of money, them and Italian people will be able to earn enoughf money for mantain their families.The other change that I would like to make in the city were I live would be create more activities to do. In Sardinia there a lot of realy little cities that sometimes we get bored about because there are not a lot of places were you can go to have fun. Comparing here in Provo there are a lot of places such as minigold, bowling and a lot more. In Cagliari, (Sardinia) there are very less ways to have fun, we just have a place were are a lot of games and another place a little bite far away were are the cinema and some places to eat. Also, there are not a lot of malls, we have a lot of little boutique and just 2 malls that are not really big as in other parts of Italy. I think that if there are going to be more places to have fun for teenagers and more malls, will help people to buy more thing and to increase the economy in the city were I used to live.In conclusion, if this change will be possibily in the island where I used to live, there will be more people that will be allowed to explore different parts of Europe, to have a more open mind and to know other culture. Also having a control of illegal people working in my city will allow all of them and all of Italian people to earn enough money and not be paid lower than they should earn normally for their carreer, additionally the fact of having more places to have fun will help the economy and allowing people to live better.

column3: My roomates are pecualiar people. Each of them have their own characteristics and are quite different from the other ones in two important aspects: personality and the way they use their laisure time. The first aspect is about their personalities. For exmaple, Katherine, one of my roomates is studying for becominng an actress. She is outgoing,  loves to talk, tall , always happy and thin. On the other hand, Diana is very shy. She does not like to talk to much with other people. She is chubby, short and has depression. Also, another way that they are different is about the way the spend their free time. To illustrate, Allison loves to espend some free time in the pool, specially after coming home from work at 6pm. On the other hand, Erika,  loves to spend some time reading books in the living room. She is not currentley working, so she stays at home all day long. My roomates are different, but I love spending time with everyone because that is mwhat makes them unique.
column4: Having more libraries in my city will make it a better place to live for people of my age. In big and crowded cities like Lima, Peru,  having libraries are the most important  place that government can build. Thus, there are many beneffits in short and long term for young people of increasing the number of  libraries in Lima. Therefor, having more libraries can help young people to create a habit of reading, help them with their assignment in school or college and allows the  to save money by not buying books that they can rent.First, building more Libraries in Lima will help the youth to create an hanbit of reading.  According to several studies reading helps people, specially in the range of 15-30, to develop their intelligence. As an example, Mexico discovered that having more libraries in its country will make the young people more prone to spend their time in those place.  IF the government can encourage people to reaid they will be having a more prepared mass of work in the future. This goo habit may help people  in short and long terms.Another reason why is so important to have more libraries in my city is because it helps them to do their assignments in school and college. To illustrate, is a student does not have the books that she need to do her homework and their family does no have money to have an internet conection at home, she woukd no have the opportunity to complete her assigments and for that she can have a disadvantage in reference to her classmate, With a library, she can have more access to the information that she needs without any problems. In addition, This helps the youth to be more prepared for their test in school and to have the knowledge that they may need to have better job opportinties in the future.And at last, having more libraries in my Lima allows student to save money by not buying books that they do not have. Renting a book from the library is an important economic help for students. For example, most of the ones who study in college work and study at the same time, and they use their money in paying the tuition for college. Those students are the ones who need the most using the services that the government can give them without any cost, and libraries are not the exception. Also, Saving money for people in tjeir young years is really important because this helps them to avoid debts and student loans. Avoindfing this, will make people more independet with their finances in the future.In conclusion,   to create a habit of reading, help them with their assignment in school or college and allows the  to save money by not buying books that they can rent may help a lot

column3: I live in a complexe building with three roomates. They are all americans, caucasian and over twenty-five years old. Their name are Malorie, Brittany and Amy. Brittany and Amy are sisters and Amy is engaged to Malorie's older brother. Amy and Brittany have a brother living in the same complex building, but in the man side.  I moved in last august but they have been living there for about two years now. I descently get along with them, I do not have major issues with them beside the fact that they are noisy, but I tend to believe that it might come from a culture difference. In France we do not slam doors or speak too loud and we have a better consideration of the poeple living in the same house with us, we care about their peace and we are quiet. The exception is if people are celebrating something or if they do not have good manners. Since I am in the country, I got used to use earplugs to be able to sleep or to simply read a book, because seeking for silence became a sport. And I also allow myself to alude this statement because it has happenned with all the roomates I have had since I am in the country. My current roomates are huge fan of superheroes and the appartment is a testimony of it; I would even say that it is a sanctuary. But lately, Amy got married, she moved out and took all her overwhelming superheroes decoration and let us with a blank living room, which is a chance for us to start over.
column4: A beautiful city represents the heart of the people and how we should feel in it. Having a beautiful downtown can make a city more appealing than another one. Some mayors use flowers or different kind of decorations while some prefer to work on the benefits such as free parking lots or an efficient bus system. I tend to believe that in order to feel comfortable in our cities, we do need both. In the city where I come from, two major problems exist and the first one is the abundance of homless people in big places, where we have coffee or restaurant, and the lack of entertaining event. In order to improve my city, the government should get rid of the homeless people living with their dogs and they should organize more events to entertain the community.Homeless people and their dogs do not reflect the beauty of the city. The culture of the country where I come from, people love to spend afternoons or evenings at a coffee or a bar outside simply drinking while talking. It is a good way to socialize and to encompass the vitality of it. The situation becomes less agreable when you are surrounded by homeless people, from any age category, with their dogs, being loud, sometime fighting and not caring about what is going on around them. This make the area not safe at all and it pushes the people and the tourist to stay away from those places, places made to attract them. This situation is becoming bad for the safety of the population and the well-being of the businesses around. With a change coming from the city, it would not only affect the people's lifestyle but also the economy. With more entertaining event in the city, the community would enjoy more and would stay around. We are having a major problem in my city and it is a lack of monthy activity organized by the city, Now we need to organize our own activities instead of having the chance to be in a area where we have to choose. For example, if you are not a fan of going to club but you want to dance, you might have no activity to join and might have to drive to another city to find what you like. If we always move to another area to find what we need, at the end of the day, what about definitively move there? The underlying message is that, we have many events big event in my city and they are najor and gather a lot of people, but the city neglect the little moment we love to spend together and if we could have at least one big thing per month, it would change the dynamism of the population who like to go out and the other moment could be for those when we either want to stay home or just gather in fewer group, but indoor. Given this, having more entertaining event and the homeless people taken care of, will give a chance to a  brand new kind of people of the community to emerge and  to have the desire to be a part of it. With these changes done, the community will feel safer to circulate wherever they want, and families or group of friends will always have something to do if they want to go out for an activity. It is important for the population to express their desires, to the leaders of our city, in order to help them to understand our needs and to make the necessary changes.

column4: As a student, the only thing we want before university is to relax. If a univesity does not have any sport program, the students are going to think twoice if thay want to go to that university. column3: My roomate Ross         Ross is an amazing girl, and people can learn a lot of things from her. She was the most amazing roomate that someone can have. She is very kind person and cute. She is very beautiful. She has big eyes, long hair and beutiful smile. She is working in the MTC as teacher, she serverd her mission in Ogden,Utah. column4: Arequipa Should have Universities    Having niveristies helps people to be better. Arequipa is a wonderfull city with great people. A considerable part of the popullation are among the ages of 18 -30. People in this city have problems to study at the university for different factors. Young people can revieve more benefits if the goverment do something to find a solution. People in Arequipa can be benefit because, they will not go to other city to study, they will save money and they will recieve education witthout problrmd.    People in Arequipa used to go to other city to revieve education. They need to move to other city because they do not have the facility to study in their own city.This is not comfortable for people because they need to leave their familes. They need to start a new life in a place totally different. If Arequipa had have more universities it will not be a problem. For example, Luccas wish to study in the university. He went to other city to study, and he started to have depression because he missed his famiyly and friends. It is a result because he moved to other country. Arequipa needs to have more universiies to make people feel more comfortabble when ther want to study in the university.    As a result of people move to other city, they will spend more money. Studying in other city gives to people more barriers to reach their goals. They will not spend more money because they will live far away of home. They  need to pay for a home and food. They will also get problems because of that. People used to quit of the university because of this reason. They will not have enough of money to paty their tuttions. Such as, Carolina is studying in other city Medicine. She has spened a lot of money paying their books and the place where she is living. Because of this,  she can not pay next semester in the university. She got this problem because she does not have enough of money. As a result, people spend a lot of money stying in other city.     Finally, people because of all of these problems do not study. People made the decision for not studying because it is the most easy. Sometimes they do not have the facilities to go to other country to study. They start to work or do other things. They lost the opportunity to get education because of that. For example, Ross wants to study, but she does not have enough money to go to other city. She will start to do other things and los the opportunity to study just because Arequipa does not have a university. That is why, Arequipa need to have universities to give the opportunity to people to study.       Arequipa needs to have univerty to help young people to be better. They willfeel more cofortable if they stay in their same city, they will save money because they do not need to pay for home and food and they will have the opportunity to study as first option.

column3: I live with five American roommates, they all go to BYU and have a busy schedule. It is hard to find a time when we are all together. Julie is from Austin, Texas, and is in the pre-accounting program. She served a mission in Brazil, and always try to practice portuguese with me. Reina is also from Austin, Texas. She is going to serve a mission in Bulgaria. From all of my roommates, she is the one that I like less because she is very loud and messy, never cleaning after herself. Sara and Holly are cousins, Sara is from Lehi and Holly from Indiana. Sara changed major four times and still does not know what to do. Holly is in the pre-accounting program. Amy is from Arizona and does not have a major decided yet.
column4: Patos de Minas is a city in southeast of Brazil that has more than five universities and an increasing number of adults at the ages between twenty and thirty years. Most of these people are college students. As part of their life as a student, they want to have fun, but when it comes to entertainment, the city lack options, having only pubs, restaurants and night clubs.To improve the city and make it better for people at their 20s, the administration of the city has to bring more recreational places because people will have more options and will be more phisically active.Building more recreational places int the city, such as paintball, archery tag, trampolin places and courts, will provide the inhabitans, especially those on their 20s more opportunities to have fun. The city in the way it is now, does not have many options. The ones that it has are always related with parties and shows where people get drunk. Providing more options event to those that do not drink or do not like parties will help to create a different culture for these people. They will see that rather than going to a pub and getting drunk, they have different options in which they can enjoy their time with friends in many activities. For that the administration of the city or investors could use the natural resources that the city has, such as its rivers, forests and mountains.Another reason why building these places will be benefitial for people is that they will be more active, practicing more sports. This practice will help them to be heathier and avoid many diseases. Many health problems are related to the lack of exercise. The options that people in Patos de Minas have now do not offer exercises, just sitting with friends and drinking. Offering more options will help to change this culture, improving their health and their habits. Of course that if they go to those places is a matter of choice, but if they do not have the option, there is no way to choose it.Improving people's lives through recreational places help them to be healthier and to have more options of what to do for entertainment. The administration of the city

column3: Today I live with the most important people for me, my family and that is for three main reasons. First, my wife is my best friend, my companion, and is my motivation when the things are not good. She is a Secretary for profession but today she works a lot in our house, I admire her for that. Whit her I can talk about all and she always have a nice word for me. Second, my children. They are my purpose of life because in them I can see the future of this world. They are students, and they are good students, that is enough for me. Sometimes they are a little hiperactive but I love them. They give live and color of our home. Third, my dog. His name is Samy and he is our complement. Today he doesn't live with us because he is in Chile, but we will see again in three more weeks. He is our best friend, even tought he doesn't speak but we can feel his love for us. In summary, I live with my family and they are, include our dog, the most important for me today.
column4: I love my city because has a great weather and has a lot of beach. The name of my city is Antofagasta and is in the north of Chile. Always is spring and the people is nice with others. When I think in my city or how my city could be a better place for live, I think that only two changes Antofagsta could be the best city in Chile for people of my age; this two changes are transportation and environment.First, transportation. Today in Antofagasta the public transportation is bad, old and the trips are slow and longer. Nowadays you take a bus in your house and you need to travel for at least one hour for arrive to the center of the city.  Antofagasta is like Chile thing and large, will be easy to have a subway for example and the public transportation only would move the people between their homes until the central line of subway. The people don't need invest a lot of time in trips and they could enjoy more time with their families. The quality of life will be improve.Second, environment. Antofagasta is in Atacama dessert, the most arid of the world. It is very hard to have parks or a lot of trees because we don't have enough water for that, but we can find other solutions. It is important have good places for our children, places for the families with games for children and machines for practice exercises for example. I know it is a hrad work but we need to find solutions. Today is common use syntetic grass. A great solution could be to have paks with syntetic grass and public pools. Maybe is expensive but you need less money for manain it. We need more public spaces for share with our friends and family. With this invest we could have a better society, more happy and with less stress. In conclusion, if my city, Antofagasta could be improve the transportation and the environment will be the best city for live for people like me. In my opinion, with these two changes we could have a better society, a better city, a better quality of life. In summary a great city.

column3: A few years ago my parents use to serve as directors for an orphanage organization in Ecuador. There people from North America, on its most, use to come to stay at our house for three weeks. They would come to give service to children that lived in orphanages. The age range for the groups that we use to receive were between eighteen and twenty five year old girls. As they reacently finished their high school, they still had a teeanger like behaviour. All of them were loving and fun. Sometimes we would be facing big problems or dramas at home, but it was usual, so we didn't loose control. They had a curfew and rules they had to follow, otherwise they would have been dismissed and sent back home. Some of the rules were to not become very close to the workers at the organization, to not go walking outside without a companion, and to not caress male children older than seventeen. I was fifthteen years when all this experience came to its end and the organization close because of the lack of applicants when the church changed the age for people to go out on their missions. Despite the rules at the place, it was fun and safe. A great experience I am grateful for.
column4: Cities are places surrounded by many people with needs, but are we targeting everyone's needs? They need to do things differently, to advantage their energy at that age and save good memories. This does not mean they have to become ruleless or uncontrollable. column3: Currently, I am living with my sister in a apartment and four american girls that are my roommates. Living with them is being, to be honest, quite an adventure.  Furthermore, I do not know them, their culture is differente, their language, the way they are, and even the food they eat. However, the fact that they are different does not allows me to judge, so I did not judge them, we have our differences; in a lot of things we do not think on the same way, still we know how to cope with each other. Even though we are from different countries and backgrounds, we still learned to be polite and respectful. Additionally, I live with my sister that is a plus, and I share room with her that is even better. I have been sharing room with my sister since I was little I am used to it, so living with strangers it has not been that bad because I do not see them everyday at every hour. Nevertheless, the few moments I have spent with my roommates I have realized that they are not bad people, they are nice and is fun to be around them. In conclusion, even though my roommates are strangers I still know how to enjoy their company and what has been helping me is that my sister is there with me.
column4: Monterrey is a city full of delicuency, the police officers acept bribes, the politicians are not honest, people cannot be outside their houses at late hours of the night, by 10 o'clock they should be in their home with their house locked. Therefore, everything in Monterrey is upside down right now, and a consequence of the security being week is that the youth stopped caring about their aducation. For example, instead of being in the school they are drinking and smoking with their friends, and they are not afraid because they know that the police will not do anything. That is why Monterrey needs an improvement on the security.So the improvement that Monterrey needs would be more and better security, more police officers that are fit, and that will know what to do in a dangerous situation. Also, Monterrey needs police officers that are fit, not police officers that are in bad shape and just are eating in their working hours. Because if they are not fit then they will not be able to chase after the delincuent, also it is more probable for them to die because they will not be ready if there is a gunshot. Considering the fact that it is really dangerous to be in the strees at night, pople can say that there needs to be an improvement on the security that Monterrey has.Furthermore, the security needs to be honest. For example, nowadays they police officers accept bribe. Instead of giving the consequence to the citizen that broke the law, the police officer just ask the citizen for money or something that he wants, and then let him free. That is just unfair and wrong, the person broke the law; stil they let him free. An overcome of thit decisions is that poeple would never want to obey and follow the law because they know that there will not be punishment. In addition, they will stop respecting the law. That is why the goverment should fired those police officers that accept bribe.The final point, is that the security needs to be more prepare. For example, if there is a situation that requieres police officers they should: firstly arrive on time to the place they need to be. Secondly, they should have a plan in order to know what they are going to do when they arrive and when they face the delincuents. Additionally, they need to know what to do with the delicuents. So, from the beginning till the last moment of the situation they need to know what to do. An overcome of that is that, if they know what to do, they will be prepare, and they will know what to do and will not face any surprises.To sum everything up, Monterrey needs an improvement on the security. It needs to be more fit, more honest and more prepare. So, that in the future, the people would not be scared of being outside their house at any time of the day or night.

column3: When I was living at the MTC I had to live with missionaries from different backgrounds, cultures, and  nations too. Futhermore, they had different characteristics and traits in the sense that the had different ways of behaving and acting, but more importantly they all spoke different languages. To be honest I had a challenging and a great time with them because we all were from different countries. I would say that my time with these people was  good and unforgettable because If hadn't lived with them, I wouldn't have had this experience of living with people form other countries. I always respected them in spite of our differences, actually I focused more on the similarities rather than on the differences  because we all are children of Christ and we all have the potential to succeed and progress in life. Focusing on the similarities helped me to develop humility and kindness.  I am extremely grateful for that experience that I had.
column4: Puebla is a lovely and beatiful place to live. It has some many churches, archaeological sites and green areas too. Young people comprises the majority of the population in that city. The proposals that should be implemented are to invest more money in education, help young people to develop their talents, and stop discrimintationFirstly, education is crucial for everyone because with education we can acquire and gain knowledge. However, the government is so unethical and unfair, all the politicians want to to earn a lot of money withou doing anything, that affects the economy of not just a city or state but also the whole country. The state government should raise awareness of this problem. Furthermore, there are many skilled and talented people who were born in in my hometown. Nevertheless, the had to leave the state because they were seekinfg for opportunities to prosper and succeed, but they were not able to receive any support from the government. These people went to countries such as: USA, United Kingdom, Spain, and so forth. It is heartbreaking and devasting to see that all these  great and wonderful people are leaving. The government should stop stealing money because thess actions that they are doing are not going to take my hometown to a good place. To sum up, education has to be provided to everyone equally and the government  needs to invest the money that they have wisely.Secondly, there used to be a organization that helped  young people with special abilities and skills, but unthankfully the local government decided to close this place permanently, they said that they were spending a significant amount of money on this intitution. Moreover, many people went on strikes protesting and complaing about this issue because the government close this place without telling people before hand. Unfortunately the school that was  for people with special abilities is the house of one of the people who works in the government, that is completely unfair. In summary, the government should open the school again because all the people with special abilities and skills deserve to develop and reine their skills.Discrimination is a bifg problem too because there are some young  people  that discriminate the people that work in the the rural areas, they should stop doing that because we all are the same, we all have the same rights and responsibilities as Mexican citizens, if the youth treat the farmers correctly erverything will be better. To conclude,  if we do not discriminate people everything will be better and nicer

column3: Im currentlyliving in a house that I rented in Orem. I share the house with my brother, and for me it is a pretty nivce place to live. I decided to move to Orem for a very precise reason and that one is: that i like to have a big space to live freely and not crowded in a small apartment as much of the students live here. Furthermore, having a regular house help you to learn more about how to take care of a home and some other activities related to household care.In contrast with small apartments regular homes are free of roomates , that let you have total freedom to decorate or arrange the furniture as you prefer to do it. However, the thing that I miss of living in those small and crowden complexes. is that you can make a lot of friends very easily and there always parties to attend. Meanwhile, in your own you sacrifice that party spirit for more privacy and loneliness.For that reason i try to keep in touch with my friends who still living in the complex apartments to invitime there when they have a party, and also I invite them to come over my home to cook a barbeque or have a little party, I think the balance make the difference for you to live happy wherever you chose to live. So, for me I can say that I enjoy the best of both worlds.
column4: The name of my city is Atlixco it is located in the State of Puebla in the great country of Mexico. My city is a very colonial city because it was developed during the spanish reign in Mexico. Wich has many green areas because also it is an agricultural city, and a hill in the downtown of the city, make Atlixco the main target for many national and international travelers. However, it is necessary to develop some changes into the city image to make it more enjoyable for the tourist and for the residents of the city. one of the improvements that I would suggest to the city council is to take in consideration is to develop a city trail, For this i mean a trail for hikers and runer that go all across the city like the ones that many cities in the Unites States has. the reason for developing this idea is because it will generate many important benefits for the city and their people.       The first reason is since Atlixco is a very colonial and historical city and having a trail that go all around the city it will be easy to show many important landmarks and hystorical places to the people who visit the city, and also make more enjoyable the hike or run for those who were exersising over the trail. because it much better runinng or walking with a magnificent landscape that in a treadmill at home.        The second reason is  the visible benefit will be that many people will be encouraged to workout, and have healtier lifestyles, for example: places who have city trails for people  such as New York or Chicago. report to have happier citizens that enjoy going for a walk four to five times a week. that obviously produce an increase on the productivity of the people who are more happier and work more efficiently. also it will be benefitial for my city because Mexico struggle with obesity (actually we held the second place of children obesity in the world). Furthermore, this project will be a perfect strike infavor of public health, making the city government gain recognition for their apportation to solve the problem.   The Third benefit will be to present the city as place where people like to excersive and have a healthy life styles, because places like this are very desirable to live , will increase the real state value of the properties of the city. and according to real state specialist, the price of land can increase at least 7% when there are sport related infraestructure near them. Finally, taking action will benefit everyone in Atlixco, it will promote the city residents hapiness, will make the city even more attractive for tourism, will help with the healt national crissis, and will help to raise the land value in the city. this smart movements only provide benefits and no disadvantages , so it will be a smart move from the city council if they start thinking in the benefit of teh city and do something good for it. and im sure if the do this they will 'make Atlixco great again!'.

column3: There are just three people who I live here since I came to the US and off coure, they are my roomates. They are American, from different states, and the interesting thing is that we are very united. One of my roommates, his name is Kimball, he is 23 years old, and he is getting married in less than a week, he is 6'2 tall, white, blondie hair, blue eyes, and he is very exited about his wedding; his attribute is to be very humble.My second roommate his name is Charles, he is 22 years old, he has many health problems, however, he is always with a positive attitude. He does not have a girlfriend. He is 6'0 tall, white, white hair, blue eyes. His attribute is to very smart; he knows everything about chemistry and science.My third roommate is Will, he is 27 years old, he is authistic. On contrary than my other roommates, he is very bad, aggresive, and offensive as well. He is 5'9 tall, fat, brown hair, brown eyes. He is american as well. I really enjoy living with all my roommates because we can share and experiment many things together. I am very grateful to have them as roommates, even though we are moving out from our apartment this coming semester, we are going to keep in touch. In conclusion, because of their different attitutes and qualities my roommates have, I enjoy living there.
column4: Around the world there are many countries with different problems in it, such as weather, bad management from the government and also high level of delinquency. Ecuador has many problems in it, which have made people go out from their houses and march against laws which are affecting them in different ways. Even though there are a high percentage of people who are in favor of those laws, most people believe that Ecuador will be a better place to live if the government would change the laws reducing the taxes for imports,  and giving help to those who want to start businesses.The first reason that will help the country of Ecuador to improve is by reducion the imports' taxes. the word 'Imports' is related with all the products manufactured in different countries and try to enter in the territory. Ecuador is a small country with a lot of laws, and every President of the Republic has been creating more and more laws which are affecting the induntry there. In addition, Ecuador is a developing country that needs a good administration  in order to progress and succeed. However, those laws against imports are affecting the industry because they do not have the economic sources to import products which are going to cost three times more if are from other countries. For instance, a textile company wanting to improve their knowledge in the quality of products send a great team to gather the knowledge in other country, as a result they need to import a machine which will help them in their purpose to have good quality produts; in addition, this company will need a lot of money if they want to import the machine because of the laws which will be almost impossible for new companies . Although the country is getting the money from those taxes, they are not helping in the growth of the industry. Because of the benefit will have the industry part in the country, most people believe that the best improvement will be that government reduces the taxes from imports.The final reason that will help Ecuador to improve is the correct economy managment foccussed in helping those companies which are starting from the bottom. It is a common knowledge that the problem Ecuador is suffering and the reason why Ecuador is stucked as a developing countries is because they do not have enough progress in the industry part. In addition, the country is investing a lot in things which are not neccesary, and as a common rumor many peoplr think the government is taking their money to become rich people. Therefore, most of people are waiting for the next electoral elections in order to kick the president out, due to the fact that even though the country has been creating protests, these have not been making any effect because the president has the army custodiating him. In fact, the reason why people is with this attitute is because they do not receive help from the government when they want to start something. For example, if someone wants to start a restaurant, that person needs to create documents which will allow he or she to start the business; those documents take so long, more than 6 months if the person does not do brabery. Also, these people who are starting business need to be prepared to spend too much money without loans if they want to import any product from other countries; also if they participate in a loan, they problably will need to pay the amount by four times more. The solution will be the facilitation of getting a loan for those who are starting businesses, and also the help from the government by changing the law.Even though the country is giving loans with high interest rates, I believe that the best solution to improve Ecuador is to help those companies which are starting.In conclusion, because of the benefits Ecuador will has if help those companies which are starting, and reduxing taxes, I believe the best improvement

column3: The complex that I live right now is called Liberty Squre. Liberty Squre is full of wonderful people. Take my first roommate for example, she came from California. Her name is Alisa who likes to draw and chat with people. She always talks to me after I work and always wears a happy smile on her face which makes me feel energy everytime. Second roommate is from Mexico, her name is Izchel. She is a tidy and cleaning girl, she always smells so good. I love to share room with her. Last roommate is from Utah, she is beautiful and is willing to share her job experience with us. Her job is working in a kingardern which is full of little kids.
