In conclusion, living with those people is my pleasure and is my wonderful experience in America. I learned lots of things from them and also, the most important thing is that I have a group of awesome roomates.
column4: The city where I lived is full of people because our city's land is not big as Utah. As a result, people need place to build lots of bulidings to solve the population problem for citizen to live or work there. Wherease, tall buildings limited natural environment such as park. Therefore, if my city can extain the park area will be helpful for people because it can reduce risk of disease, connect nature, and to excercise,  easpecially for the people in my age.First, the explored city have lots of polution problem which cause some physical diseases for the people. However, if we have a park which has lots of trees and plants will decrease some air polution. Furthermore, the park will brings fresh air to the city and makes it clean. The people in my age need a health body to do the things that they want to do, they need numerous energy to sustain their bodies. Thus, if the city is able to make a park wider and fulfille with tress will be an useful environment for those people.          Second, the park provides a place which can let the people have space to connect to the natural system and closer to the origin. For example, people nowadays are rely on electronic eqiupment all the time. They did not notice that those technology is taking away their ability of imagination because technology is too convenience for people to search infomation instead of creating by yourselves. On the other hand, if people are willing to spend time in a park and have interaction with natural environment, they can broud their capacity of imagination and improve themselves.Last, the wide park build a healthy place wich can let people to exercise. The people in my age, they are sledom to move their body because they have the reason that there is no place to do excercise. However, if the city can have a place which can encorage people to have time and motivation to excercise will be good to people. Because of our society, people are lack of knowlege that they should work out outdoor instead of indoor which follows the instructions of Television excercise vedio. The outdoor activities motivates people to have true excercise with sun, air, and natural system. Therefore, a park will benefit people not only their phsical bodies but also mental spirit.In conclusion, the improvement of building a park will let people have energy, connect natural system, and have a place to excercise. The three reasons which will brings the people in my age to improve themselves and have a healthy quality in their lives.

column3: I have been living with my extended family since I came to The United States. My extended family is formed by my grandma, my aunt, and two cousins. I would like to start talking about my grandma. Although she is an elderly person, she goes to work three days a week. She works at a fabric that sells vitamins. She is a very sweet person. She likes to go on walks with our dogs and cook mexican food. My aunt works as a dual-inmersion teacher at Heber City. She is a very fun person once you get to know her. With people that she does not know, she is a little shy; however, once she gets to know them she is very fun. She has two children. One of them is my age, 19. He is studying at UVU right now. He likes to play live with his friends on computer games and xbox. He is a person who keep things to himself, but once you know him he is really funny. My other cousin is 11 years-old. She is in fifth grade and is very smart. She loves animals, specially horses. She says that when she grows up, she wants to have a farm with lots of horses and cattle. Because everyone's personalities, my family is very diverse; however, I feel like that makes it  fun all the time.
column4: I am from Mexico, from a little city in the south of the country. Although it is a small city, there are a lot of traffic accidents. A lot of young people have their own cars. Having a car is a magnific opportunity that young people have; however, they do not appreciate it as they should. Young people spend a lot of time looking at their cellphone while driving, therefore, a lot of car accidents happen. Something that could be done in order to make the city a better place to live for young people would be banninng cellphone usage while driving.       The inmediate consequence of banning cellphones would be preventing car accidents. If young people do not use their cellphones while driving, a lot of car accidents would be prevented. A lot of times, when a car is hit, it is not that persons's fault. It is the other driver's because they were using their phones and driving ant the same time.  In this city on the south of the country, cellphones are not completely banned while driving. Although there are numerous cellphone use constraints, young people do not follow those rules. Instead, they think that they are more cool because they can drive and text at the same time.    One of the long-term consequences would be helping  young people to not being addicted to their phones; and if they are, to gradually eliminate it. Most young people are addicted to their phones and that is why they use it all the time. Young drivers know that they are putting their life at risk and the life of people around them; however, they do not leave their cellphones to the side. Instead they keep using it because they believe that they are capable enough to do two things at the same time. Cellphone adiction is one of the most common adictions among young people that also affects people around them.      Cellphone usage while driving should be banned in order to improve the quality of live among young people. One of the long-term consequences this could draw is eliminate young people's addiction towards their cellphone. However, if we want to talk about the short-term consequences, there would be a lot between th most important ones is preventing car accidents. Young people do not take seriously having a car and all the benefits that is brings to their life; however, this improvement would inconsciously improve their life at a small and large scale.

column3: I live with my wife and two children. My children spend most of their time in a school. After the school, it is usually afternoon, they like to play outside. Everyday, between 5 pm and 7 pm, they do their homework. They are very active and like sport. As an example, the best sport for them is soccer. My wife is taking care of children and house. She also has English classes twice a week. Her interest is painting. She is spending her free time with new paintings. All of my family members like to spend time with eachother and do some  activities toghether. For example, we all like hiking and spend our time outside.
column4: Almaty is the biggest, in terms of size and population, city in Kazakhstan. It is financial and cultural center of Kazakhstan. Due to hard traffic and specific location on bottom of mountains the city suffers from air pollution. Transformation of public transport from gas to electricity or hybrid solutions will help to eliminate this problem. Therefore, air pollution reduction will make Almaty better place to live because of less health problems, clean air is basis for future generations, and green technologies.    One reason why air pollution reduction will make Alamty better place to live is because people will face less health problems. It is obvious that due to lack of clean air people suffers from many respiratory diseases. For example, hard air pollution can be reason of cancer. Furthermore, dust air increase chances to get an allergy.  For this reason air pollution reduction would benefit for my genereation.    Another reason that elimination of air pollution problem will make Almaty better place to live because clean air is important for future generations. Resolving situation with air pollution will help to grow healthier generation of citizens. To illustrate, pollutants that exist in an air influence all aspects of life such as reproduction activity. This problem lead to decreasing of number of people who can have children. Clearly, clean air is a basis for future generations.    Finally, air pollution reduction will make Almaty better place to live because of green technologies. Increasing role of green technology if one of the dominant factors to chose place to live. Current generation is considering green technologies impact while choosing the place to live. It is important to develop green technologies and as an example use of hybrid public transport.   In conclusion, reduction of air pollution is one of the improvements that would make Almaty a better place to live for people of my age. All the -mentioned reasons are clearly state this.

column3: When I was living in Argentina, I lived with my mother and my twin brother. My mom is Maria and my twin brother is Juan. My mom is 52 year old. She work as a nursery of people with disabilities. She loves to serve others. She is always very positive and she likes to do jokes. She loves to do craft and work in the garden. My brother likes the music. He is a DJ but also He works intalling security systems. My brother has a child. He is Dylan and he is 6 years old. Dylan loves to play video games, ride his bike and play with others. He is a kid really friendly. To my whole family love the music. My mom and my brother play the guitar and I play the piano, but also I like to dance. My mom and my brother have kind the same personality, they very passive but when they are mad is better let them alone. They are hard worker people. Some of my favorites things living with them was that in Sundays we spend most of the day together, drinking mate, talking, taking dinner, and playing with my nephew. During the week was really hard find time together because every one has an schedule different. We left early to go work and school and we come back super late to home. I always enjoyed dinner with them, watching some movie. Also, sometimes we like to play table games with Dylan, it was very funny because he always wanted to win. I love my family a lot.
column4: Neuquen is a beatifuI city in the north of the Patagonia but it has some things that can improve and make the city a better place for youth. I think one improvement that would be good in Neuquen is  to have more recreation centers.      First of all, recreation center can add more activities to Neuquen. My city is a nice place with a large population. It is the capital of the Patagonia. All the students from the south of Argentina go to Neuquen to study in the university. There are a lot of students there.  The only problem is that students don't have to much to do. The city needs more enterteinment options for the youth. Options that are no very expensive and good at the same time. A place where youth can play sports or improve their artist skills, or with music.  Therefore, a recreation center can add the activities that the city offers to the students.     Second, a recreation center can decrease the delinquency. There are a lot of youth that don't attend to the school or don't work. Most of these kind of youth don't received support of their parents. A negative consequence of this is that youth go outside to stole, bother people, and consume drugs. A recreation center would help these youths to use they free time in something good. Most of them have really good qualities in sports, but they don't have the sources to play or someone that help them improve their abilities. Therefore, a recreation center can decrease the delinquency.     Third, a recreation center can help to reduce stress in youth. Being a student can be stressful, especially when youth don't know how to manage the stress. A recreation center could be a really good place for youth to release their stress by doing diverse activities. A recreation center that offers different activities would be a place that can help students to socialize and meet new people with their same interests. A recreation center with activities without  alcohol or drugs, with health enterteinment would be a good place for youth. Therefore, a recreation center can hel to reduce stress in youth.     In conclusion, a city where there are a lot of youth that can't provide a good environment for youth to spend a productive time is a city that youth can't enjoy. For these reasons,  a recreation center in the city of Neuquen can add more activities, decrease the delinquency and reduce the stress in youth.

column3: My family is very important for me. Even thought all of them are important, my wife is the most significant person in my life. There are many reasons for that, but because she is so beautiful and kind with me and with my children, I love her so much. First, she is so beautiful. She has long red hear. Also, she has really beautiful smeall. I love to see her happy. Second, she is so kind. Althought my children something did  wrong things, she corrects them with love. For example, last month my son came 3 late from School. Because he loves to play baketball, he lost his time after school playing with friends. We were so worried about him, after looking for him, when we finaly found him, instead of be angry with him, my wife showed him how much she loves him. It was a wonderful moment. Hence, she is the best, it is my privelige to life and learn from her.
column4: Heredia, Costa Rica is a beautiful city. Many people outside the country believe that it is the capital because its beauty and structure. There are many people who believe that Heredia is the perfect place to live. Even though my city is a really good place to live and visit, it would be better if it can help adult people to learn English. With some significant programs, the city, not only can help young people to learn English, but also adult people. When adult people learn English, they will help the tourist to fill confortable, they can work for international companies, and give more resources to local government. First, my city could be better when adult people learned English because they can help the tourists to enjoy the city. Each year, my city recieve more than million visitors from the United States. Because they do not speak Spanish, sometimes it is hard for them to communicate and enjoy the city. Unfortanaly, many adult people do not speak English. Even though that they want to help them, they do not know to do it, they tryied, but it is not enough to help the visitor to feel confortable. However, if our people learn basic English like how to give directions, or have a short converstations, that could make a huge different with the tourits. Thus, it is important the local government promotes that adult people learn English to speak with the visitors. Second, if people from my city speak English, more international companies could establish in town. Costa Rica has many international companies that came to make businesses. Unfortanally, my city only have few of them because we do not have enough people who speak English, and it is required to work with them. However, when people in my city achieve a medium level, they can start working with this companies, if other companies belief that we have enough people with English skills, they will come to our city and help our people to have a better jobs. With these better jobs, people would have more for their families. Therefore, it is important to develop a program that helps people to learn English that help them to get to these international companies. Third, if people have better jobs, they will pay more taxes to help the city to have more resources. If people get better jobs, they will pay more taxes and the local government will have more resources. With these money, they can build better infraestructure in the city. For example, there are many streets that need be repaired, with these money, they can do it as soon as posible. Also, they can build new hotels or parks to promote more tourism. Therefore, my city will be better when its people speak English and pay more taxes because they new jobs.To conclude, if people from my city learn how to learn English, they will help my city to be better. They can help the tourist, they can have better jobs, and have more money to pay taxes and give more sources to local government. This is not a easy task, but it could be possible if they start now. They can start with something simple, and with time, tryieng to get more further. They can join effort with Goverment to receive extra help. Finally, they can start advertacing the classes to promote and more people desire to be part of the program.

column3: Currently, I live with my family: my wife and my daughter. My wife's name is Aleksandra, but friends call her Sasha. She is 29 years old, and she is an cryogenic engineer. Sasha does not work because of her visa, which does not give her a job permition, but it is good for she takes care of our daughter, Kira. Kira is one year and two months old, and she just started to walk. She has very interesting personality. It seems to me that she is already very smart and brave because she acts like a little explorer, all the time. Also, she is very beautiful, just like my wife. Kira has grey eyes, light brown hair, and amazing smile. I believe, she inhereted all best traits from her parents. I love my family and anjoy the time we spand together.
column4: I grew up in a small city in Russia. Its name is Vladikavkaz, and it is located next to the border of Russia and Georgia. Like all the cities in the world, my hometown has both positive and negative characteristics. Vladikavkaz is surrounded by the beautiful Caucas Mountains, so the citizens always have beautiful sights and places to go hiking, camping, and spending time together. However, I wish my city would give people of my age more options to do sports.Vladikavkaz's sport community is famous of its well-known wrestlers, but that is all it has. I believe that building more parks, workout zones, and bike laines would increase the number of sports people like to do and the number of those who do sports. As a consequence, Vladikavkaz and Russia as well will give a chance to more people to develop their skills and to take a part in different competitions in different disciplines. As a long-term effect, the Russian Federation will earn more Olympic Games medals in the future. A few changes  in a small city might cause a great effect on the sport community of the whole country.Furthermore, if more people will start to do more excercises, workout and prefer bikes instead of the cars, environment of the city will change in a good way. Children and adults will be healthier. Some will influence others with their example to choose sports. In my opinion, it will also have positive effect on the number of smokers and alcohol drinkers and will decrease it. Sport makes people happier and decrease the number of people suffering from stress and depression.  Also, that is a fact that bikes do not pollute the air and increase the health level in the city. In addition, city with such a good environment will attract more tourists.To make Vladikavkaz's citizens healthier, happier and to help the city and the whole country in achieving good sports result, the government of the city should make only one improvement. They need to make Vladikavkaz a place in which people, who like to do sports, will have all what they require to excercise and workout. I know that the budget of my hometown is very small, but I also believe that small improvements will have great consequences for many generations of the Vladikavkaz's citizens, so it worth it.

column3: I share my room with another person, but sometimesI feel that I do not have a roommate at all. Sara is the most awesome roommate that I could have ask for. Nevertheless, we have extremely different shedules and we almost do not see each other. She is studying business and she spends her whole day on classes, work or doing homework, so she goes to bed really late in the night. On the other hand, I go to bed really early because I work as a custodio four in the morning. Furthermorr, when I go to work she is sleeping and when I go to bed she is on the library studying. Even though our different schedules and activities during the day, we really like each other. Sara is a very polite and nice woman. She is very dedicated with everything she does. She likes to serve others and do her best to help every time she has an opoortunity do to so. What I most like of living with her is that even when we do not spend time together frequently, we feel confortable with each other.
column4: University campus would be an improvement that Buenos Aires is needing.  We have a lot of universities; however, we do not have campus for them. They are spread along the city, and the students have to travel long hours to study every day.  Campus for colleages would be an improvement that would benefit young people for two main reasons, they would not have to travel long distances to study and also they would have more resources to help them in their studies. First, young people would not have to travel long distances to study if they had a campus in their respectives universities. It is not something universities have in Argentina. Students do not have apartments to live close to colleage. This generates that students have to travel and spend hours per day just to go to colleage and go back home. Furthermore, the time they loss traveling they could spend it studing or working. Many students do not have a chance to work while they are studying even when they need it because they do not have time. University students are the future of every country, and society; hence, the goverment should invest on them and their future. Building campus for universities is one of the solutions, many countries already have them. Buenos Aires should learn from those countries and improve the education ambience. In addition to this point, If students have university campus they will have more resources to help them in their studies. Campus not only provide where to live, but also provide more resources as libraries, groups of study, bookstores, and extracurricular activities. Students need of those resources to have a better education. Many times students who do not have these tools provided by their universities have to go and search fot them in other places, apending much more money. Furthermore, campus provide also an ambience perfect for study and improve. Being srrounded by other students, by teachers, by resources that are there to help them, students can have a better performance and a better experience.  Campus also provide jobs which are close to classes and that can be adjust to your classes schedule. There are many resources that campus provide to students, students in Buenos Aires need them in order to improve their performance. In conclusion, there are some improvements that must be done in my city, and one of them that would benefit people from my age is the construction of university campus. Young people should be dedicated and spend their time in what really matters: studying and sometimes working for paying their studies. Nevertheless, they cannot do that if they spend the majority of their time traveling. Campus can benefit students with many tools that would help them with their performance.

column3: Recently, I moved to Cenntennial Apartments in Provo, Utah.There I live with roomates. First of all, I need to say that they are amazing. My apartments is a  five persons apartment, however the space is enough for everybody. My roomate's names are Sadie, Mariah, Christina, April and Amanda. They are very skill , talented and smart girls. For example, Amanda is studying music at BYU. She knows how to play the violin and the piano. It is a blessing for us in the apartment having her as a roomate. We can hear classical music during the day. This is because she has to practice most of the time for her concerts. All of them are from Utah, so they visit their families during the weekend. However, when they don't go home during the weekend we can spend time togueter. We are very busy during the week, for the school schedule and for our jobs. Nevertheless, Saturday and Sunday are special because we can plan activities or attend the ward activities. I really enjoy living with those girls. They are amazing and wonderful people that I would never forget.
column4: Patzcuaro is a town located in Michoacan, Mexico. This is tipical and a beautiful place to live. It is rich in flora, fauna and architecture. However, not everything is happiness in this town. Youth and all the community are being affected for the public transportation. This is not efficient at all; the buses and the vans are old, they are always late and most the bus drivers are not certificated to drive the buses. Public transportation in Patzcuaro need to improve, this would be benefitial for the students, for the workers and for teh economy of the town. First, having an efficient tranportation will help students to tranport to their schools without problems. Patzcuaro,  is a little town in Michoacan. The transportation is not efficient and the quality of the cars is bad. In the town there are not schools, the schools are located outside the town aproximatly 20 min far away. In the morning most of the students have to wake up early, in order to attend their schools. Everyday they have to use public tranportation to travel to their schools. However, this tranportation is not efficient. Although, not all the buses or vans are old, some of them don't have good conditions. Morover, students  have to wait for a long time in the morning waiting for them. If the public tranportation improve students will be able to be on ther classes on time, and they would have more time to do their homework. Second, workers would be beneficiated for a better public transportantion. Basicly, the main problem of the public transportation is the time that people have to wait for it. People have to be earlier in the stop bus in order to wait for the bus, howver,  the bus is never on time and sometimes is full with people from other town. This is problem because people don't know when is the correct moment for waiting for the bus. For this reason, sometimes people is late at their work; this causes less salary, more problems and that sometimes they have to work extra hours to finish their duties. Workers are not able to work extra hours because probably they are not going to find a bus after their work. If public tranportation improves, people would be able to take laboral decisions and they would be able to earn more money, because they would feel confident that they will find a bus after their work.Finally, having a better public transportation will help to improve the economy of the town. This would be beneficial for the young and the ederly population. Patzcuaro is a touristic site in Michoacan, people from all over the worl come to visit this place. If the tranportation conditions improve, tourism will come more frecuently and more easily to the town. As a consequence, the economy will imporve in the comunity. As a conclusion, there are some things that are vital for the community. Public transportation is one of them. It is vital to have good and efficient public transportation. This is the 'soul' of the town. If the transportation improve, the community would get a lot of benefits. Directly, they wil improve in the  academic, profesional and economic areas. It is important that the government can make changes in the community and they can address this issue, because it is government responsability to improve community conditions, and to have ' their people' to have a better life. Patzcuaro needs a better public transportation. It is a bias that can't wait anymore. As a citizens we deserve a better town, country and world.

Then, we strongly mantained our home as holy place by cleaning and organizing every preparation day. For these reasons, we became close friends. As a result, we bgan servinf each other. Therefore, that was the best t
column4: Police officersNot stress: focus on school.Carrydevices such as computers and Ipad.        Every city has a enormous list of problems to be solved, and the spheres of those issues can be defined as social, economic, and cultural. Therefore, before beginning to find solutions for all topics, policy makers should analyze what of all those issues should be considered at first, that is, what of them may bring more impactful implications to society in a short and long-term consequences. Thus, as everyone knows, the future of any nation is shaped by their young generation. Because most of them are university students, some initiatives should be done in order to protect and facilitate their lives. For this reason, increasing the number of police officers is a vital improvement because it helps students to profoundly focus on their university and study with more efficiency.      Increasing the number of police officers will help students to deeply focus on their study. College time is a stressful time. Young adults not just need to attend to an exaustive study routine but also take care of their on basic needs such as dieting, house organization, laundry, job, and bills. Being worry with life risk because violence outside campus negatively interfers on their learning process. To illustrate, because students need to worry about coming back home safety, their mind do not have space to plan the next day, so when they get home, they start using the time they could be studying and preparing to go to bed to do what they could do if they felt safe outside campus. For some students, coming back home takes about one hour. For these reasons, the presence of a greater sum of police officer inside and outside campus could help students to concentrate deeper on school.     Having a greater quantity of police officers would help students to study with more efficiency. We are in the technology time. Every university relies on information system to employ their learning process. To illustrate, students do not give to their teacher assingments or research papers physicaly anymore: they send to them though e-mail. Thus, the use of eletronic devices such as computers, Ipads, laptops, notebooks, and even cellphones are essential to save time and therefore do more thing in less time. As a result, without safety, students cannot rely on those devices. Therefore, they do not performe as great as they could. Thus, more police officer

column3: I am so grateful for the people whom I live with now and for all the people whom I have ever lived. Because all those people have helped me a lot during my entire life and have had a great influence in my personality and thanks to them I am who I am now.Right now I am living in a shared apartment so I have rommates. They are so lovely and supportive to me. Their names are Kristen, Amy and Sharlee, all three are from the United States, wich is grat because I can practice my English with them.  They work because they have already finished their school, so they leave the apartment early in the morning and comeback in the afternoon. We have a lot of fun togheter and we have shared very special moments.Before I came here, I used to live with my family, whic is composed by my parents, my brother and my sister. I love them and I always was happy living with them. Despite they were busy almost all the time, my parent with their jons and my sibling with their studies, they were always there for me. We loved to spend time all the time hat we could together and we tried to be happy despite our differences.I am really happy for have the opportunitie of know these people and I hope my influence in their lifes is as big as their influence in mine.
column4: My city is a great place to live because there are many activities that people of all ages can do. However, the experience of living there and the impact of the city in young people could be better if we had more libraries, and if in the school and home, teachers and parents would encourages the young adults to read.  Invest money in libraries and education  would carry a huge improvement in people's life now and in the future. If there were more libraries young people could use their time in a more productive way, the crimes rates could be go low and in a long term we could have a more educated generation with more critical ideas that would help the entire society and my city and country could be, finally, a better place.First, most of young people spend all their leisure time with friends in the streets or locked in their homes playing video games. This is not a problem by itself, but when these are the only activities to wich young people dedicate their lifes, the situation could become a problem. If more libraries and educative places would be build, and the young people were concious of the importance of education, they would spend more time learning about a lot of important things that could help them to be better citizens and to discover what they want to do for the rest of their lifes. Therefore, the leisure time could go from useless activities to something that really help them.In the same way, with more espaces like libraries, young people would spend more time indoors instead of in the streets, bored, trying to do something exciting- that is not always legal- or being influenced by older people who only want to take advantage of the influenciable minds of teenagers and young adults. It is in the streets and with bad companions that most of yong people get into bad habits such as drink alcohol frequently, star to use illegal drugs. Besides, those bad habits usually lead people to the delinquence and crime, be that for fun, because they are not aware of what they are doing when are under the effect of those things or simply to get money to buy more alcohol or drugs. Thus, a simple thing as keep the youngs occupied doing good activities, could improve the life all of the community by reducing the crime rates.Another reason to build more libraries and enhance the education in young people is that they would earn more knowlegde  and could be more councious of our country's situation, leading them to take better decision, to be better citizens to be aware of the people and conditions around them and maybe could make them want to do something for other persons and for the place where they live. My city needs a generation that makes the difference and the education is the better way to achieve that.In conclusion, one of the better things that could be done to improve the live of people of my age in the place where I live, is to build more places where young people could go to learn and to have a good time. This is because they would be better persons, and young people could improve individually and as a part of a community. Doing of my city- and why not my country- a totally different place, with more councious people, woth lower rates of crime and with young adults interestd in culture and in help others.

column3: Back when I was in Mexico, I used to live with my mother and siblings. My mother is the most interesting person someone could ever meet. In fact, if you get to know her you might confuse her with me. We are almost like twins. My mother is tall, white, brunette, and quite shy, just as me.  My mom has interest on the science field. Thus, she decided to be a nurse, which she actually employs now. She always watches TV shows related to medicine or health topics.  Every time that she came out from work she would cook for me and my siblings. She would always show her love for us with her food. In fact, she would always try to show her love, not only with food, but also with actions. My siblings,  both are men, and I used to find it very interesting because our personalities were very different. My siblings would always talk about girls and cars, while I would talk about boys and clothing. Even though, we had very different interests, we shared our love for Biology. Ever since I can remember my siblings and I would wait for our mom to come home so that we could all watch health related TV shows. My siblings and I were on the same school. Therefore, we had the same schedule. However,  during the afternoon they went to football practice and I went to softball practice.
column4: Chihuahua is a medium-sized city, in which people can find a few activities to do. Although, the population has grown exponentially, the amount of activities one can do is limited. People can go to the cinema, park, restaurants, mall, but nothing else. Growing with only those activities makes you get used to it. however, going into different cities made me ponder that having a theme park would change things for the better due to the fact that theme parks would give more options for people my age to do on their leisure time. Therefore,  having a theme park would bring many benefits to our city. Firstly, having a theme park would inmediately bring more turism to our city. Turism is one of the sources that Mexico uses to maintain its economy. However,  Chihuahua does not have a variety of turistic places. Hence, building an amusement park would bring people from around this city such as,  Texas, Coahuila, New Mexico, Durango, among other places into the city. Moreover, people my age have a hard time planning fun activities due to the fact that the list is very limitied; thus, people my age always ends up doing the same things. However, if a theme park is built in this city, on the long-term the economy of Chihuahua would increase exponentially, because many people would go and spend money on this theme park. Another reason why a theme park would be an incredible idea is because families would have the opportunity to spend real quality time. Just as in other places of Mexico, having a theme park has strengthened family bonds. Mexico City's theme park called ' Las ferias de Chapultepec' not only has it brought turism into the city, but also it has made leisure time way more fun. Families can go and spend time with their children in relaxed attractions and shows, but also friends can go and experience real adrenaline on the rollercoasters that this park has. However, not all people from Chihuahua and near this city can go all the way to ' Las ferias de Chapultepec' because it would take a 24 hours ride. Thus, having a theme park would make citizens in Chihuahua have more fun activities near the place they live in.All in all,  finding a way of building a theme park in Chihuahua, would be a great investment  that would benefit not only citizens, but also our country's economy. Theme parks would bring turism into the city making our economy increase and more people want to come and visit this beautiful city. Moreover, the benefits of having a theme park in Chihuahua would go beyond increasing the economy in our country. It would simply benefit its own citizens by providing more leisure activities which in the long- term will make  Chihuahua a happierplace with more turism.

column3: The people I live with are American persons. The family is very strong int he gospel and education. They have different types of interests, for example, music, literature, art, and science. The mother and father are working in some projects at BYU, and their children are students at BYU. Something I love about them is their personalities because they are sociable, friendly, lovely, kind and have service for others. Living with them has been an unique experience not only because I can feel a love family, but also because they are a good example in my life. I admire their dedication in the different activities they have to achieve during the day. In addition, having their protection and love makes me feel safe and loved. I have a strong feeling of love for this family, they are my angels. When people make efforts, dedication, have perseverance and diligence to make you feel as If you were at home,  those things are valuable and will be valuable for the rest of your life.
column4: One improvemet that would make my city a better palce to live for people my age is academies of different languages.   The main reasons are because this can empower the economy in El Salvador, develop skills and dicrease violence. Firstly, learning different types of languages can empower the economy in my city. Economy is an important factor if people want to have a better place to live.  Languages are universal tools that can develop systems and strategies to have a better quality in the economy.  If people learn languages, especially English, they would have greater career opportunities, job performances and better relations with different kind of companies, nationally or internationally. Nowadays, languages are changing the world completely because the countries have exterior relationships with different kind of countries. Acquaring knowledge about the benefits of the link between languages and economies can change the point of view in thousand of people. Languages can give the opportunity to develop different skills in different areas. Individuals would be more likely to have a higher IQ and EQ because their brains will start working more and spreading more chemicals. Leaning a new language is not an easy goal because languages have different grammar, lexic and strategies to write. However, because of those levels of difficulty , people will be able to analize and use the logic even more.  The brain needs to have activity in order to improve memory and intelligence. Besides that, learning new areas of different things gives the opportunity to aquire and then share the knowledge with others who do not know. Another important point is learning languages can decrease levels of violence significantly.  El Salvador has a very  high levels of violence and delincuence. The economy is decreasing, the levels of good education are becoming serious but the main core of those issues is violence. The goverment should create programs with good plans and schemes to solve the situation as soon as posible. If people study languages, the violence would improve the range of violence that the country is having daily. There is a strong connection between violence and education, in this case is learning foreign laguages. The more education people get, the less rates of violence a country has. All of those points would be a long-term consequences for the future if people take action now. The potential of the land is strong and enormuos;however, what the country needs is an extensive and powerful improvement to have positive benefits in order to become a better nation.

column3: My roommates are loving and eoncouraga. Recently, I have been living with two roommates. One of them is studying at the Brigham Young University, and the other one is working as a receptionist of one of the property company.  First, they are loving. They always care about others incuding me. For example, since I do not have a car, they always ask me if I need a ride to school or shopping. Also, they know that I am not familiar with this city, they always give me something famous in this city, such as popular bread, soda, and even tickets to concerts. Secondly, they give me hope and encouragement. To illustrate, there is an  exmple of my Engilsh test.  When I took TOEFL for the first time here in this city, I could not get high enough scores, and I was very disappointed. However, they came up to me and encouraged me. Not only that, they had helped me to improve my English skill by correcting my garammar when I said something wrong grammatically. Now, they are literally my best friends.
column4: If people establish new universities with great facilities and faculties, young people will have multiple benefits for some reasons.First, the learning ability of young people may be increased. As they have a new university, youjng people in my city can be motivated to study hard to get into the new university. If the new university has great facilities, young people may want to study there because of the beauty. Nobody wants to syudy in a bad environment. According to the one study, students studying in a tidy and beautiful environment tend to get higher scores on the intelligent test than students who study in an old and dirty places. Therefore, by studing in a beautiful places, their learning abilities may be increased eventually. Secondly, the social abilities of young people in my city may be increased because many young people from other cities may come to the new university and syudy there. Even though my city is located in the country-side, young people in my city may be able to learn more about other cities as they communicate with students from other cities. Also, as they gather together in one place, they may be able to acquire the communication skill, thus it may be able to lead them to have good relationships with others as they start working in the future.In addition, young people can contribute themselves to my city in the future. As they get high education from great faculties, they can increase their knowledge and skills. Also, they may be able to invent new medical technologies, find new methods to teach children, or make the economy of my city better in the future. Since receiving high edications has significant effects on students, they may be able to reduce poverty in my city, the death rate of my city may decrease, and my city may be prospered.In conclusion, young people can be affected positively by establishing new univerities with great faculties and facilities in my city, because their learning and social abilities can be increased, and their cities may be able to prosper in the future.

column3: Every one in my family have different interests and hobbys. Tiago is my son, and Isabel my daughter. They like to spend some time of their days playing with their toys. Tiago likes his cars and the spiderman costume. On the other hand, Isabel likes her dolls and her pricess dresses. Tiago is a funny boy, and he enjoys to make everyone laugh with his attitudes. Isabel is more sweet and refletive. When they play together, they like to running and playing soccer. They both are going to school in the mornings. Tiago has classes until 11:20AM, and Isabel finishes her classes at 2:00PM. My wife Rafhaela get them at school everyday because we don't have access to the school bus. We live too much close to school, but far enough to need our car to drive them. This is my family.
column4: Every city has problems related to particular aspects of the place. In Brazil, Fortaleza is one of the biggest cities with more than two million people living in the urban area. Among the different problem faced to the government, education is the big challenge that need to be solve in order to provide the people better opportunities in the future. Education is essential to support people building a carreer and preparing them to live in society.          First, education is the most important part in the process to build your carreer. Carreer is consequence of the decisions and opportunities that you have along of your life.  Preparation involves formal education and experiences that we acquire interacting with people. Mixing formal education and opportunities is the best way to achieve success in your profissional life. For example, those who can have access to better schoos in their childhood will be more prepared to achieve success. They can attend the best universities and apply for high position in companies which only the best have opportunities to work. For sure, education is a vital part of everyone's recipe for a successful carreer.          In addition to prepare you for a successful carreer, education helps you to be a better citizen and one that can make difference in society. Living in society is more than just be part of a group of people living close one another. Respecting and helping others are important lessons we learn at school that make our society enjoyable and delightful. For instance, some countries where the governments have invested in education and their children grow with principles such as mutual respect have showed better life quality and low criminality. Education is as important as the basic needs such as water and food because it can guide the future generations and the way that people treat one another.          In conclusion, helping to improve society and giving you better opportunites in your carreer are some of the benefits of education. Fortaleza has grown in an extraordinary rate, but unfortunately education is a problem to be solved. If the Brazilian government doesn't pay attention to this problem and put all efforts to solve it, we will see our nation decae and become a worse place to live where people don't respect one another and unprepared profissional. It is recommended that everyone has in mind that this problem can affect everyone even those who have access to good education. Helping others to have the same oportunities you have is essential.

column3: Some people like to live alone. Others like to live with their families or roommates. In my case, I used to live with roommates. There was four of us, we weren't really close to each other, but we got along and helped each other out. My first roommate moved out because she was getting married, she was an English major and her fiance as well. She was very calm and quiet. My second roommate also moved out a month later. She decided to rent a house with her friends and she has been living there ever since. She is a Math major, also she is now is engaged. She's is a very kind person and her family has helped a lot with my illness. She'll get married in May in the San Diego Temple in California. My third roommate is still living in the apartment. She is an Accounting major. She also has been living there for two years aproximately. She is quiet and respectful. She plans on moving out after April is over and she'll be studying abroad this summer. I liked living with my roommates because I learned something different from each one
column4: Cities are considered by most people an unique part of a state. They mostly represent a part of culture and beauty of it, but sometimes cities need improvement. For example, La Paz City is a beautiful city located in Bolivia, South America; but it needs some improvements. One that stands out is more street safety. First, most people are afraid to walk on the streets at night because of the situations that can occur. The news mostly show that people who walk at night by themselves are more likely to suffer a robbery or rape. For example, one can get robbed, or kidnapped. In other words, with the improvement of street safety, these problems can decrease and the citizens can feel safe.Second, with the increase of street safety, parents won't be worrying too much when their kids go outside to play. Street safety is very important and necessary for kids as well, especailly when they are playing because there is always the possibility that some kids may get hurt while playing or even fight. Street safety will help decrease these kind of problems. Third, street safety is also important for schools.  Bullies are everywhere and the kids that are victims often stay quiet. With the help of street safety, these kids who bully innocent kids can be stopped before it is too late. Bullying is a seious matter and it should not be seen as something that will just go away with time.In conclusion, improvement is always important. Some cities need it more than other cities. The point is that improving our city can make it a better place to live, work and have fun. Being able to call a city home is very important and thinking how one can help it become better can even make it a better city.

column3: I believe all the people that I have lived with are my friends except for my real family. Even though they may not have the same culture, very similar personalities, or even the same race, they are all humans and my friends. This is made by a speicial environment here, the United States of America, which makes me feel more excited and grateful for my life.   When I came to USA to study for a graduate program, it was pretty hard for me to adapt to this environment. This was because I'd never lived in a distant countries and I thought I would live in my country for my whole life. As life cannot be imagined and decided in one way, I was able to stay and start to study here. So, my very first roommate was the most impressive friend that I made here. She was from China and the same age as me. She was a student studying Buisness Administration at UVU, and she had been living in USA since 20 years old. As soon as I arrived at our shared house, she welcomed me very gladly and introduced our house and other roommates. She was trying to be closed to me because she found we are Asians and the same age. As I became closed with her, I realized that she was very kind, amazing, and wonderful because whenever I asked her for anything that I didn't know including cleaning the house, studying English and so on, she was always polite and nice to me with patience. I believed that I would not forget her kindness forever. Even though we are living in other states nowadays because of studying, we are still friends and trying to help each other. This makes me feel happy always.
column4: My city, Incheon, is the second biggest city in South Korea, which has been famous because of the worldwide international airport and very beautiful landscapes with lots of small islands and sea. So, whenever I remind my city, I've been always proud of the amazing and convenient benefits of my city. However, there have been several bad things in my city including environmental problems, transportaion troubles, and supports for college students. Specially, our city has been the top of the cities in Korea about poor supports for college students so that many college students in Incheon have to loan money or stop school to earn tuitions for a long time as tuitions have been increasing every year. This causes them to face big debts even after graduating, and it has been a serious problem to students, parents, and even government. So, as I studied in college in Korea and know that this problem should be solved and dealt with very carefully and effectively with a governmental policy.  First, the policy should have the exact and meaurable data about students who are struggling with big tuitions so that the city council should be able to figure out how many students need supports and why students have problems for college tuitions. This must be the first step for enought supports to college students because usually, government just fulfilled some policies to help them for a long time, but those were just temporary to loan money because of approximate research about students. It does not need anymore for better supports to students.   Second, the policy should be able to be more flexible and open to public, especially to students, parents, and educators so that they know what is going on, what they can do to get supports, and even what they have to improve the policy. Almost always, many administrators have been doing some short-sighted solutions for this problem with an excuse that they don't have enough money for them, which does not make sense to people anymore. This kind of awful situation should be removed by opening the process, consequence, and everything about the policy because the correlated ministers should be awere of what they need to do. It is the most democratically necessary steps.  Last, the policy must have reliable and proper solutions in reality to apply to the problem. Although Incheon is the second biggest city in Korea and held an Asian Games 3 years ago successfully so that Incheon has been greater, some of the educational policies and educators are not progressed. One of the reasons is that almost all the policies are not appropriate to solve problems in reality, especially for tuition supports. I will not know why exactly, but it is true that they are reluctant to focus on and handle the problem properly. So, there have been other troubles of it, which are that students who need support do not get it or do not have enough money for tuitions because of some of the rules of the policy. It cannot make sense to anyone who hears it. This problem should be awaken now for the future of students.  With all these steps, college students may be able to immediate supports for loan and debts, so they would not be stressed anymore. Also, in the long-term perspective, the improved and realistic policy will make Incheon citizens feel proud of Incheon more and more. It should take a lot of time to be fixed and solved well, but as this problem has been the most serious ones for a long time, it should be promptly dealt with right now.

column3: I live with my parents and my youngest sister for my whole life, till I moved to the United States. My dad has his master's degree and he was working with the education administration, but he retired now. He is a wise, warm, and humble guy. He is so educated and intelligent, these days his schedule is not that busy because he retired, he usually wakes up early and goes to the vegetables store to buy vegetables for my mother. My mother she is a funny lady with a proceless soul, she is always young even when she is growing up and getting old, but her soul is always young and happy. She works in a store with my uncle, she is the manager there, she loves her work very much because the store is related to women, she usually wakes up early, then she cooks, then she goes to her work. My youngest sister called Hala, she is so funny, strong, humble, intelligent, crazy, and beautiful. Also, she has a good voice, she is studying now  and she is in the secondary level. She is planning to study accounting in BYU. I love lving with them because of no reason, I just love it, they are so humble, simple, funny, warm, and lovable. Honestly, I can not know why I love being with them, maybe bacause they are my family. I love talking with my youngest sister at night, I love arguing with my mother, and I love listening to my dad's historical stories.
column4: Ajloun - Jordan is a simple village which is one hour far from the North of the capital Amman. People between the age of 18 to 30 or teenagers do not have much to do in it. First of all, Ajloun's government should focus on the activities that can make teenagers love it more, because many teenagers are thrilling to move from it, so that if the government focus on the things that can attract teenagers, they will love it more, and they will stay in it. Eventually, when teenagers earn their bachelor's degree, if they do not like their hometown, they won't work in it, and that will make the government lose many benefits from them. Second, there is no good schools in Ajloun - Jordan because it is a small village. Government shouls focus on the education field more in it, so that they will attract more teenagers to it, and that will improve the education level for the next generation. Also, that will decrease poverty and rascism because education is the most powerful method to defeat poverty and rascism. Third, Ajloun - Jordan despite it is a village, and it is a small one, but it has many historical places such as, Mar Al Yas and Ajloun castle. Government should focus on these places to attract tourists to it, and then they will attract many investors to it, and that will open big opportunities for students and teenagers to work and study at the same time. Fourth, churches in Ajloun should focus more on these ages because the only focus on adults and it is a negative thing, because people personalities are shaped since they are children, so that they should start shaping it from a young age. Also, they should give these people enough time to earn the good manners and prinicples from their churches. Eventually, this will lead them to be better people with better and improved personalities, so that they will make Ajloun better place. In conclusion, Ajloun - Jordan has many good historical places which can improve the economic level if the government focus on them, government should focus more on schools so they can improve generations, and churches should focus on all of the ages, so that they can improve people's personalities and make them better and spiritual.

column3: I live with three roommates that come from different parts of the world. First, Maricel is from Peru. She has dark hair and skin. She is skinny as me even though she eats a lot. She loves to dance and cook. She is studying aviation in UVU. Moreover, she works part time as a cashier. That is why she is usually busy during the day. Second, my other roommate is Alicia. She came from Japan but is half American because her father was born in the U.S. She looks Asian and has dark hair too. She is very shy but kind. Although she is introvert, she enjoys playing sports and spending time with friends. Furthermore, she just found a job in a call center, so she spends most of the day working there. Finally, my last roommate is Diana. She is from Ecuador and is also studying English at the ELC like me. She served her mission in Honduras and came to this country in order to learn English because she wants to be a nurse and help people from different cultures. Additionally, she enjoys cooking and talking to her family through social media. She is not working at the moment, but still is usually absent from our apartment during weekends due to the fact that she goes to visit friends from her mission that live in the area.
column4: I live in a small city called Concepcion del Uruguay, which is located in the East part of Argentina. It is a beautiful place that is sorrounded by lakes and rivers. In addition, it has different colleges and universities that are mostly free for everyone, even for foreign people. Nevertheless, people my age are afraid to move to my city because crime has increased dramatically in the last years. For that reason, I highly recommend that a few changes be made in order to attract more youth.First, the City Council should increase the security and send more patrols and cops to the streets. University classes usually end late at night and young people, especially young women, are reluctant to walk the dark streets alone for fear of being attacked by strangers. For example, there have been cases where men have raped students because they were alone in the dark. Consequently, women do not feel safe anymore. Having more cops and security would give them a feel of protection.Second, more lights should be added to the dark parts of the city because criminal acts usually happen where there are no lights on. To illustrate, hundreds of students have reported to be robbed when they left classes. They were unable to recognize or see the thief due to the lack of lightening in the area. Furthermore, many of them were aggressively attacked by the criminal, which left them with injuries. Others have had a different luck and were killed because the agressor used a gun or a knife. For all these reasons, I suggest that lights be placed in strategical areas of the city to ensure the safety of students and neighbors.Finally, an accessible insurance coverage should be made available to students to ensure the value of their belongins. This way, people would feel safe in case their computers, cell phones, and other valuable items are stolen. For example, if students lose their essential tools to learn, they would not be able to continue studying because they cannot afford buying them again. As a result, I recommend that this type of insurance be given to all students. To conclude, having more cops, lights in the city, and insurance for all the students would attract more students from different areas. Besides, students already enrolled in classes would feel secure in the city and would be able to enjoy their time there. Although it might take a few years until these changes are noticed by people, eventually more students would hear and learn about these improvements and would feel the desire to move to the city longing for a better future full of opportunities.

column3: My name is Paulo. I live with my wife Debora and our little Daniel, our 3 year-old boy. We are both lawyers in our homeland, Brazil. I have worked for more than 30 years as a naval officer. Being a military, especially a Navy guy, was no always easy. However, I enjoyed my time there. I am retired since last January. Last year I worked as a peacekeeper for the United Nations in Lebanon. My position was as the Maritime Legal Adviser. It was a hard time because of the loneliness of my job there in southern Lebanon without my family. Because of security reasons, they had tp stay in Brazil and I missed them a lot. My wife is a wonderful stay-at-home mom. She quit her job when Daniel was born. I love my family. They mean everything to me. We love holiday trips and I and my wife share the same passion for basketball. We used to play at college, but now that we are older we are glad to watch it at the televion. We are member of the LDS Church. I baptized my wife. The happiest day in my lefe. Well, to be sincere, the second after our marriage. We are very happy.
column4: I am a mature man. At my age, 46 years old, I love cultural events, as theaters, shows, movies, be it indoor or outdoor. In our family we love being together in social activities in public parks, especially in the spring and summer season.In my hometown Sao Paulo (Brazil), we do not have many public areas where you can go with your family and stay the day. The public parks are rare and always crowded in the weekends.  Therefore, the local authorities and our mayor should invest our money (taxes) and their time to get some solutions that would improve our quality of life. For example, there are sites all over the city that could be transformed into public parks with little or no public investment. This initiative would be a short-term solution to provide older and younger people with places of leisure and fun.  In the long-run, the government should promote initiatives and even issue a policy to bring cultural events to the city at a lower price. This would contribute to the improvement of our cultural level as well as it would increase the level of satisfaction of the population with lower income. Any investment in culture and education increases the overall quality of life and satisfaction, in my opinion. These improvements are simple and easy to make. My city will become a better place to live if these suggestions are implemented. In Utah, I have seen many areas that fit my needs and I am very happy with that because we will stay here studying for about a year.

column3: People are always different, some of them are temporary and always people are going to give eternal lessons. Living in another country is not easy because trials and obstacles are always happen, it is part of the life, so encounter them are going to be challenged. However, it is the only way to learn and develop more skills in a future. For example, living with parents were really different because people have more facilities, but living alone or roommates is more challenging. People will learn patience and have to adapt some activities that were not used to do it. Some roommates were  enjoying activities when I had to work during nights and study during the day. My life was just studying and working, I could not enjoy Provo like them, but I was learning something else like responsibility. I am a doctor in Colombia, I was working in the pregnancy room, so I loved my job. I had more goals in my life and I was struggling a lot with my emotions when a person who promised me a lot of ilusions just hurt me a lot. I decided to change my life and accomplish my dreams, one of them was to study English. As a consequence, I came here and I was learning how to be stronger. At the end, I discovered myself and my self steem was healed. I am a better person because this expericence and every trial just taugth me eternal lessons.
column4: Values are important in people's life and for country's development. In Colombia's case,  especifically, people in Bucaramanga should learn more responsability and honesty, those skills are really important for the human development. Responsabilty and hosnesty are values that have been forgetting and are really important to develop a better country, and there are 2 main reasons which explain why a country is better when it is a culture of responability and honesty. First, comparing to the United States of America , people from Colombia are less responsibles and unfortunately less honest. It is really sad and make the country lazy because are not get used to be on time and  people are  not  going to be serious. When a negative habit is learned is really hard to change it and work on it. For this reason, people should learn not just in 20's aged, it should be learned since child. Children are little sponges learning new skills and habits. When they are learning, they do the same  actions as older people actions. If people example is not good, the culture that children  will be taugth are  going  to be in that maner.  As a consequence, puntuality is affected and  when people arrive late at work can make a difference. For example, if a doctor arrives late and a patient really needs him, this person could die . Now people can see  why it is really needed.  Also, It is really interesting when children are taugth to be responsible since a shorted aged like in America. The culture changed a lot and they will be always on time and their activities in a future are not going to affect other people.Second, honesty is really important too.  At the same as being responsible, being honest is other value that has to be high-lighted. Other people can trust in an honest person , but the population are not going to trust if it is not the case. For example a honest president, people can trust him if that person was honest since childhood and was showing it whith actions, but are not going to  trust in his acts if he showed the oppposite face. In this manner, it is really important to have this culture too. In a future, people can trust that person and can trust not just in his words, but in his actions too because they know that person will care about honesty and how to manage big situations like presidents, more if there is money in the middle. In conclusion Colombia is an amazing country, but unfortunately not all the people are honest and responsible, and on of the major problems is corruption and it starts because a lack of responsible and honest culture. It is really sad to accept it , but changing those inconvenents Colombia will be a better country and fair. As a result, the other people life are not going to be affected because other people actions.

column3: I have 5 roomies, they are all legit. Unlike my roomies from last semester, they are not annoying or anti social so our conversations ran smoothly. One of them is studying linguistics, he speaks spanish and want to create a new program to learn spanish faster. Our schedules never match so we rarely find the 6 of us in the apartment. We all work at byu in a part-time job.  What i like from living with them is that I feel at home, they make me feel part of their family and we have develop such a trust that when we are struggling with whatever we feel comfortable taking about our experiences and emotions with each other. 2 of them are half mexican and half american but we always speak english in the apartment. Speaking english is the rule since only 3 of us speak spanish, one speaks japanese and the other 2 speak only english. One more thing i like from living with them is that we cook together in whe weekends and i think that is something that helped our friendship grow strong.
column4: One improvement that would make the city I live in a better place would be the increasing of job opportunities for young people. In a world that is ever more competitive, having a laboral experience since youth might qualify someone to acquire a future job, it would help youth be more accountable about their actions and feel more independent. Moreover, having more job opportunities for young people would increase the economy as a long-term consequence and would reduce violence and delinquency as a long-term consequence.When a young person finds the opportunity to work, either full-time or have-time, he will start gaining experience that may be necessary in the future. A person who works since he is young will start seeing life from a different perspective. In fact, this person will start to have more realistic thoughts because he will start ti feel what life is all about and awaits him in the future. For example, if a 19 year-old person who studies to become a dentist finds a job that involves being among dentists, either a hospital or a private clinic, this person will have the opportunity to learn from them and apply that learning into their classes and future career. On the other hand, a person who works in a job which might not be related to what he is studying at all may also obtain a benefit from it. This person will start looking at his own life from a different perspective. That person will realize how hard life may get if he does not prepare enough. Therefore, giving young people the opportunity to work in a full-time or a half-time job may help them acquire more experience for their future careers and to obtain another perspective of what life is .When young people start working, they become productive and start following a established schedule that brings balance into their lives. On the other hand. when young people do not work they stop being productive and that is when they start making wrong decisions. It is when someone has too much free time when someone decides to drink alcohol or look after things that are not appropiate. However, giving youth the opportunity to work may help them have a balance in their lives as they become ever more independent and accountable for their actions. For example, when a person starts working since he is young, this person will learn about and value more the sacrifice made by his parents to give them a good education. Moreover, obtaining a job would help him to be more independent and realize that every action he makes in the present may have an impact on who he will become in the future. Thus, obtaining a full-time or part-time job do not only provide an economic benefit to the youth but also principles that will accompany them throughout the rest of their lives.As a matter of fact, Giving young people the opportunity to work may also have short-term and long-term consequences in a society.  GIving the youth the opportunity to work would increase the economy as more people would be willing to invest on it. Furthermore, many people who fell into delinquency due to the lack of employment in a city would start working to obtain a righteous life and provide their family with what they need. Thus, violence and delinquency would be reduce if young people have the opporunity to sustain themselves because they would no longer see delinquency as the only source of money if they can't afford a good education at the moment.In conclusion, providing job opportunities to young people in my city would solve many of the problems that it is facing right now. Helping young people obtain jobs would not only the economy grow but also people.  As people start progressing since they are young they will become more accountable and they will be ready to take the responsabilies that having a family and the society brings.
